 960  78A3                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 78A3              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 78A3              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 78A3              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 78A3              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 78A3 ED 4B A6 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 78A7 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 78A8 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 78A9 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 78AA 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 78AB A8                   xor     b
  11+ 78AC E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 78AE DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 78B0 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 78B1 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 78B3 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 78B4 E5           		push	hl
  17+ 78B5 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 78B7 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 78B8 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 78B9 CD 20 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 78BC 22 3E 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 78BF DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 78C1 32 45 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 78C4 E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 78C5              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 78C5 ED 4B A8 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 78C9 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 78CA 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 78CB 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 78CC 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 78CD 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 78CE A8                   xor     b
  33+ 78CF E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 78D1 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 78D3 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 78D4 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 78D6 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 78D7 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 78D8 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 78DA 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 78DB 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 78DC CD 20 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 78DF 22 40 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 78E2 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 78E4 32 44 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 78E7 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 78E8              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 78E8 ED 4B AA C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 78EC 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 78ED 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 78EE 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 78EF 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 78F0 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 78F1 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 78F2 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 78F4 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 78F6 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 78F7 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 78F9 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 78FA 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 78FC 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 78FD 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 78FE CD 20 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 7901 22 42 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 7904 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 7906 32 46 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 7909              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 7909 2A 3E 7D     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 790C ED 5B 40 7D  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 7910 ED 4B 44 7D  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 7914              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 7914 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 7915 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 7916 AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 7917 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 7918 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 7919 CD 5D 8F     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 791C 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 791D 3A 46 7D     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 7920 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 7921 ED 5B 42 7D  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 7925 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 7926 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 7928 CD 5D 8F     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 792B C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 792C              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 792C
  88+ 792C              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 792C              ;...X cell
  90+ 792C 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 792F CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 7932 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 7933 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 7934 B0           		or		b
  95+ 7935 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 7938 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 7939 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 793C              ;...Y cell
  99+ 793C 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 793F CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 7942 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 7943 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 7944              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 7944 B0           		or		b
 105+ 7945 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 7948 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 7949 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 794C              ;...Z cell
 109+ 794C 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 794F CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 7952 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 7953 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 7954              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 7954 B0           		or		b
 115+ 7955 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 7958 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 7959 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 795C C9                   ret
 119+ 795D
 120+ 795D              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 795D              ;...X cell
 122+ 795D 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 7960 CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 7963 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 7964 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 7965 B0           		or		b
 127+ 7966 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 7969 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 796A 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 796D              ;...Y cell
 131+ 796D 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 7970 CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 7973 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 7974 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 7975              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 7975 B0           		or		b
 137+ 7976 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 7979 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 797A 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 797D              ;...Z cell
 141+ 797D 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 7980 CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 7983 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 7984 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 7985              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 7985 B0           		or		b
 147+ 7986 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 7989 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 798A 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 798D C9                   ret

 152+ 798E              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 798E              ;...X cell
 154+ 798E 21 61 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 7991 CD A3 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 7994 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 7995 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 7996 B0           		or		b
 159+ 7997 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 799A 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 799B 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 799E              ;...Y cell
 163+ 799E 21 67 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1

 166+ 79A5 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 79A6              ;		ld		a,l

  19+ 79E3 21 AC C0     CopyXX12ToXX12Save2:    ld      hl,XX12
  20+ 79E6 11 B8 C0                             ld      de,XX12Save2
  21+ 79E9 01 06 00                             ld      bc,6
  22+ 79EC ED B0                                ldir
  23+ 79EE C9                                   ret
  24+ 79EF
  25+ 79EF 21 B8 C0     CopyXX12Save2ToXX12:    ld      hl,XX12Save2

  28+ 79F8 ED B0                                ldir
  29+ 79FA C9                                   ret

# file closed: ./ModelRender/CopyXX12ToXX15.asm
 962  79FB                  ;;DEFUNCTinclude "./ModelRender/CopyXX15ToXX12.asm"
 963  79FB                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 79FB              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 79FB                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 79FB ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 79FB ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 79FB ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 79FB ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 79FB ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 79FB ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 79FB ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 79FB ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 79FB ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 79FB ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 79FB ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 79FB ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 79FB ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 79FB ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 79FB ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 79FB ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 79FB ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 79FB ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 79FB ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 79FB ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 79FB ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 79FB ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 79FB ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 79FB ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 79FB ~                                    ret
  28+ 79FB                      ELSE
  29+ 79FB 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 79FD 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 79FF 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7A02 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7A03 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7A04 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7A05 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7A06 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7A07 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7A09 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7A0B                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7A0B CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7A0D CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7A0F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7A10 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7A11 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7A12 CD DA 94                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7A15 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7A16 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7A17 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7A18 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7A19                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7A19                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7A19 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7A1B 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7A1C C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7A1D 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7A1E 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7A20 C9                                   ret
  56+ 7A21                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm

 965  7A21                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7A21              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7A21              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7A21              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7A21              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7A21
   6+ 7A21              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7A21              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7A21
   9+ 7A21 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7A22 CD A9 84                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7A25 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7A26 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7A28 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7A29 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7A2B 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7A2C 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7A2D EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7A2E CD A9 84                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7A31 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7A32 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7A33 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7A35 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7A36 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7A37 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7A38 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7A39 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  27+ 7A3C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7A3D F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7A3F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7A40 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7A41 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7A43 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7A44 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7A45 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  35+ 7A48 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7A49 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7A4A E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7A4C B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7A4D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7A4E 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7A4F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7A50 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  43+ 7A53 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7A54 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7A56 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7A57 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7A58 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7A5A E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7A5C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7A5D 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7A5E C9                                   ret
  52+ 7A5F
  53+ 7A5F EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7A60 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  55+ 7A63 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7A65 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7A67 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7A68 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7A6A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7A6B E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7A6D 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7A6E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7A6F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7A70 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  65+ 7A73 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7A74 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7A75 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7A77 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7A78 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7A79 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7A7A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7A7B CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  73+ 7A7E CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7A80 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7A82 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7A83 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7A85 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7A86 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7A87 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7A89 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  82+ 7A8B CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  83+ 7A8E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7A8F 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7A90 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7A92 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7A93 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  90+ 7A96 CD A9 84                             call    doRND
  91+ 7A99 EB                                   ex      de,hl

  93+ 7A9C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7A9D 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7A9E F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7AA0 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7AA2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7AA3 23                                   inc     hl

 101+ 7AA5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7AA5 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7AA7 21 72 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7AAA CD 21 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7AAD 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7AAF C9                                   ret
 107+ 7AB0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7AB0 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7AB2 21 72 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7AB5 CD 5F 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7AB8 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7ABA C9                                   ret
 113+ 7ABB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7ABB FD 21 72 7F  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7ABF DD 21 5C 7F                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7AC3 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7AC5 FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7AC8 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7AC9 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7ACB                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7ACB CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7ACD C2 D6 7A    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7AD0 C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7AD2 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7AD3 C3 DB 7A                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7AD6 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7AD7 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7AD9 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7ADA 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7ADB FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7ADE 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7ADF E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7AE1                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7AE1 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7AE3 C2 EC 7A    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7AE6 C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7AE8 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7AE9 C3 F1 7A                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7AEC 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7AED 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7AEF 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7AF0 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7AF1 DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7AF4 DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7AF7 DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7AF9 DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7AFB FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7AFE 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7B00 ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7B02 E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7B05 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7B07 C9                                   ret
 149+ 7B08
 150+ 7B08              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7B08 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7B0A FD 21 72 7F                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7B0E C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7B0F FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7B12 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7B13 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7B15 3A 5B 7E                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7B18                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7B18 A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7B19 C2 1D 7B    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7B1C 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7B1D 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7B1E 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7B20 CD 66 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7B23                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7B23 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7B25 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7B27                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7B27 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7B29 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7B2B 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7B2C F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7B2E DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7B30 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7B34 66 05
 169+ 7B36 ED 5B 5C 7E                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7B3A CD 4F 90                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7B3D                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7B3D CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7B3F C2 94 7C    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7B42 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7B46 74 05
 173+ 7B48 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7B4C 66 01
 174+ 7B4E 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7B4F E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7B51 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7B52 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7B54 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7B56 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7B57 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7B59 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7B5A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7B5B CD 80 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7B5E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7B5F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7B61                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7B61 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7B63 D2 94 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7B66 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7B6A 74 01
 188+ 7B6C FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7B70 66 03
 189+ 7B72 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7B73 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7B75 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7B76 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7B78 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7B7A 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7B7B E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7B7D B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7B7E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7B7F CD 80 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7B82 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7B83 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7B85                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7B85 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7B87 D2 94 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7B8A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7B8B E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7B8D 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7B8F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7B90                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7B90 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7B92 D2 94 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7B95 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7B99 74 03
 208+ 7B9B              ; Now roll
 209+ 7B9B              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7B9B 3A 7B 7D     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7B9E FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7BA0 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7BA2                                   ;   break
 214+ 7BA2 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7BA3 3A 7D 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7BA6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7BA8 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7BA9 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7BAA 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7BAB 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7BAC FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7BAF 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7BB0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7BB2 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7BB3 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7BB4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7BB6 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7BB7 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7BB9 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7BBA A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7BBB B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7BBC 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7BBD FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7BC1 66 01
 234+ 7BC3 CD 4F 90                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7BC6 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7BCA 74 01
 236+ 7BCC              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7BCC              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7BCC E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7BCD 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7BCE 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7BCF FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7BD2 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7BD3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7BD5 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7BD6 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7BD7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7BD9 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7BDA ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7BDC 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7BDD A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7BDE B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7BDF 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7BE0 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7BE4 66 03
 254+ 7BE6 CD 80 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7BE9 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7BED 74 03
 256+ 7BEF 3A 6F 7D     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7BF2 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7BF4 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7BF6              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7BF6 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7BF7 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7BFA 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7BFB ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7BFD 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7BFE ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7C00                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7C00 CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7C02 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7C04 3A 70 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7C07 B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7C08 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7C09 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7C0D 66 03
 271+ 7C0F CD 80 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7C12 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7C16 74 03
 273+ 7C18              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7C18              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7C18              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7C18              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7C18               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7C18                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7C18              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7C18 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7C1B 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7C1C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7C1E                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7C1E CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7C20 C2 29 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7C23 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7C25 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7C26 C3 2E 7C                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7C29 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7C2A 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7C2C 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7C2D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7C2E FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7C31 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7C32 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7C34                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7C34 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7C36 C2 3F 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7C39 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7C3B 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7C3C C3 44 7C                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7C3F 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7C40 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7C42 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7C43 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7C44 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7C46 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7C47              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7C47 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7C4B CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7C4E FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7C51 C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7C52                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7C52 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7C54 D2 84 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7C57 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7C59 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7C5A C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7C5B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7C5B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7C5F CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7C62 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7C65 C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7C66                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7C66 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7C68 D2 84 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7C6B 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7C6D 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7C6E C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7C6F                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7C6F ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7C73 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7C76 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7C79 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7C7A 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7C7C 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7C7D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7C7D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7C81 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7C84 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7C85 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7C87 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7C88 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7C8C E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7C8D FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7C8F 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7C90 C2 0E 7B                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7C93 C9                                   ret
 337+ 7C94 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7C95 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7C97 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7C98 CD 21 7A                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7C9B C3 85 7C                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7C9E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7C9E FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7CA1 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7CA4 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7CA5 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7CA7 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7CA8 CD F1 94                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7CAB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7CAC                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7CAC CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7CAE C2 B9 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7CB1              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7CB1 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7CB3 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7CB5 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7CB6 C3 C0 7C                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7CB9              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7CB9 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7CBB 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7CBD                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7CBD B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7CBE ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7CC0              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7CC0 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7CC1 32 CA 7F                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7CC4 C9                                   ret
 365+ 7CC5
 366+ 7CC5 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7CC8 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7CCB 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7CCC E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7CCE 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7CCF CD F1 94                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7CD2 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7CD3                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7CD3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7CD5 C2 E0 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7CD8                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7CD8 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7CDA                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7CDA B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7CDB ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7CDD C3 E5 7C                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7CE0              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7CE0 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7CE2 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7CE4 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7CE5              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7CE5 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7CE6 32 CB 7F                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7CE9 C9                                   ret
 387+ 7CEA
 388+ 7CEA
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

 972  7CEA                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7CEA
   2+ 7CEA 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7CEB 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7CEF 7D
   4+ 7CF0 EA 7C        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7CF2 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7CF4 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7CF7 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7CF9 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7CFD              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7CFD
  11+ 7CFD              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7CFD              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7CFD              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7CFD 32 EA 7C     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7D00              .set_target:
  16+ 7D00 22 F7 7C     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7D03              .set_length:
  18+ 7D03 ED 53 F2 7C  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7D07              .write_dma:
  20+ 7D07 21 EB 7C     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7D0A 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7D0C 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7D0E ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7D10 C9           	ret
  25+ 7D11
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 973  7D11                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7D11
   2+ 7D11 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7D15 7D
   3+ 7D16 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7D18 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7D1A 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7D1D 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7D1F 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7D23              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7D23
  10+ 7D23              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7D23              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7D23              .set_target:
  13+ 7D23 22 1D 7D     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7D26              .set_source:
  15+ 7D26 ED 53 16 7D  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7D2A              .set_length:
  17+ 7D2A ED 43 18 7D  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7D2E              .write_dma:
  19+ 7D2E 21 11 7D     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7D31 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7D33 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7D35 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7D37 C9           	ret
  24+ 7D38

 194+ 7D47              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 195+ 7D47              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 196+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 197+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
 198+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
 199+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
 200+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
 201+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
 202+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
 203+ 7D47              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle

 354+ 8047
 355+ 8047              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 356+ 8047              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 357+ 8047              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 358+ 8047              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 359+ 8047              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 360+ 8047              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 361+ 8047              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 362+ 8047              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 363+ 8047              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 364+ 8047              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 365+ 8047              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 366+ 8047              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 367+ 8047              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 368+ 8047              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 369+ 8047

 407+ 8194              ; $FF no missile targettting enabled
 408+ 8194              ; $FE missile targetting, no target selected

 410+ 8194              ; bit 7 clear launch at selected target in lower nibble

 139+ 8372 3A 94 81     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 8375 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 8377 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 8379 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 837B CA 80 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 837E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 837E B7          >                        or a
 145+ 837F C9                                   ret
 146+ 8380              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 146+ 8380 21 20 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 146+ 8383 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 146+ 8385 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 146+ 8386 3C          >                        inc     a
 146+ 8387 CA 8D 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 146+ 838A 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 147+ 838B                                      SetCarryFlag
 147+ 838B 37          >                        scf
 148+ 838C C9                                   ret
 149+ 838D 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNotTargeting     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 150+ 838F 32 94 81                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 151+ 8392 C9                                   ret
 152+ 8393
# file closed: ./Variables/general_variablesRoutines.asm

   1+ 8393              ; Note this code is core code and can not be in a memory bank unless do explosion code is changed too

   3+ 8394 21 20 80                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
   4+ 8397 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize ; prbably not needed + UniverseSlotTypeSize
   5+ 8399 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   6+ 839A 23                                   inc     hl
   7+ 839B 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   8+ 839D C9                                   ret

 988  84A8                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 84A8              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 84A8              doRND2:
   3+ 84A8 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 84A9              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 84A9              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 84A9              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 84A9              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 84A9 3A 57 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 84AC CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 84AE 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 84AF 21 59 7D     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 84B2 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 84B3 32 57 7D     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 84B6 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 84B7 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 84B8 32 59 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 84BB 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 84BC 3A 58 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 84BF 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 84C0 21 5A 7D     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 84C3 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 84C4 32 58 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 84C7 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 84C8 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 84C9 32 5A 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 84CC 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 84CD                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 84CD C9                                   ret
  29+ 84CE
  30+ 84CE 21 57 7D     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 84D1 11 5B 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 84D4 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 84D7 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 84D9 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 84DB ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 84DD ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 84DF C9                                   ret
  38+ 84E0
  39+ 84E0 21 5B 7D     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 84E3 11 57 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 84E6 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 84E9 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 84EB ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 84ED ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 84EF ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 84F1 C9                                   ret

   1+ 84F2 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 84F6 58 59 53 45
   1+ 84FA 45 44
   2+ 84FC 21 F1 7E     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 84FF 11 CD 7E                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 8502 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 8504 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 8506 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 8508 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 850A ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 850C ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 850E C9                                   ret

  12+ 850F 21 CD 7E     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 8512 11 F1 7E                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 8515 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 8517
  16+ 8517 21 F1 7E     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 851A 11 E5 7E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 851D 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 851F
  20+ 851F 21 E5 7E     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 8522 11 F1 7E                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 8525 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 8527
  24+ 8527 21 E5 7E     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 852A 11 CD 7E                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 852D 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 852F
  28+ 852F 21 CD 7E     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 8532 11 E5 7E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 8535 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 8537
  32+ 8537              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 8537 CD 3A 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 853A              .NextStep:
  35+ 853A CD 3D 85     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 853D              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 853D 3A CD 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 8540 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 8541 21 CF 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 8544 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 8545 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 8546 3A CE 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8549 21 D0 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 854C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 854D 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 854E 3A CF 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 8551 32 CD 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 8554 3A D0 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8557 32 CE 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 855A 3A D2 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 855D 32 D0 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 8560 3A D1 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 8563 32 CF 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 8566 B7           		or		a
  55+ 8567 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8568 21 CF 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 856B 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 856C 32 D1 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 856F 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8570 21 D0 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 8573 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 8574 32 D2 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8577 C9           		ret
  64+ 8578
  65+ 8578              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8578 CD 7B 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 857B              .NextStep:
  68+ 857B CD 7E 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 857E              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 857E              ; x = a + c
  71+ 857E 3A E5 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8581 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8582 21 E7 7E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 8585 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 8586 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 8587              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 8587 3A E6 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 858A 21 E8 7E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 858D 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 858E 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 858F 3A E7 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8592 32 E5 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 8595 3A E8 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 8598 32 E6 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 859B 3A EA 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 859E 32 E8 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 85A1 3A E9 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 85A4 32 E7 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 85A7 B7           		or		a
  90+ 85A8 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 85A9 21 E7 7E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 85AC 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 85AD 32 E9 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 85B0 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 85B1 21 E8 7E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 85B4 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 85B5 32 EA 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 85B8 C9           		ret
  99+ 85B9
 100+ 85B9 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 85BA 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 85BB 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 85BC
 104+ 85BC AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 85BD 32 66 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 85C0 3A CE 7E     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 85C3 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 85C4 3A F8 7E     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 85C7 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 85C8 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 85C9 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 85CA CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 85CC 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 85CE ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 85D0 32 BB 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 85D3 ED 5B B9 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 85D7 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 85D8 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 85DA 3A D0 7E     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 85DD 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 85DE 3A F7 7E                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 85E1 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 85E2 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 85E3 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 85E4 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 85E6 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 85E8 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 85EA 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 85EB BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 85EC 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 85EE 3A BB 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 85F1 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 85F2 ED 43 B9 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 85F6 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 85F7 CD 2F 85                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 85FA C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 85FB 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 85FC B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 85FD C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 85FE CD 37 85     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8601 3A 66 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 8604 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 8605 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8607 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8608 32 66 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 860B 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 860D
 148+ 860D              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 860D 3A E6 7E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8610 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 8612 32 12 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 8615 3A E7 7E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 8618 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 861A CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 861C CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 861E CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8620 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 8622 32 13 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 8625 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 8627 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 8629 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 862B              .Fedual:
 163+ 862B 3A 12 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 862E F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8630 32 12 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 8633              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 8633 3A 12 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 8636 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 8638 32 14 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 863B 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 863C 3A E8 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 863F E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 8641 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 8642 32 14 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 8645 3A 13 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8648 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 864A 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 864B 3A 14 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 864E 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 864F 32 14 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 8652 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 8654 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 8656 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8657 3A 12 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 865A 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 865B 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 865C 3A 13 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 865F 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 8660 32 15 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 8663 3A 12 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 8666 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8668 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 866A 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 866B 3A 13 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 866E C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8670 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 8671 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 8673 3A 15 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8676 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8677 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8679 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 867B CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 867D CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 867F CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8681 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8683 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 8685 ED 53 17 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 8689              .DoRadius:
 209+ 8689 3A E8 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 868C 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 868D 3A EA 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8690 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8692 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 8694 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 8695 ED 43 1B 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 8699 C9           		ret
 217+ 869A
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  52+ 87F6
  53+ 87F6              getTableText:
  54+ 87F6              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 87F6              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 87F6 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 87F7 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 87F9 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 87FB 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 87FC 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 87FD 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 87FE EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 87FF D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8800 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 8801
  66+ 8801
  67+ 8801              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 8801              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 8801              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 8801              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 8801              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 8801              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 8801              getRankIndex:
  74+ 8801              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 8801              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 8801 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 8802 B3           	or		e
  78+ 8803 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 8805 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 8806 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 8807 21 3F 87     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 880A              .testLoop:
  83+ 880A 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 880B 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 880C 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 880D E5           	push	hl
  87+ 880E 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 880F 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8810 CD 50 98     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 8813 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 8815              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 8815 E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 8816 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 8817 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 8818 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 8819 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 881B              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 881B E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 881C C9           	ret
 100+ 881D
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 227+ 8E37 F4 8D F7 8D  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 227+ 8E3B FD 8D FA 8D
 227+ 8E3F 06 8E 00 8E
 227+ 8E43 03 8E 09 8E
 228+ 8E47 0C 8E        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 229+ 8E49 0F 8E 13 8E  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 230+ 8E4D 18 8E        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 231+ 8E4F 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 232+ 8E70
 233+ 8E70              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8E70              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8E70
 236+ 8E70              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8E70              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8E70              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8E70 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8E71 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8E72 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8E74 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8E75 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8E77 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E79 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E7B 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E7D              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8E7D C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8E7F 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E80 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 251+ 8E82
 252+ 8E82 21 69 8D     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8E85 C3 8B 8E                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8E88
 255+ 8E88 21 9B 8C     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8E8B ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8E8D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8E8F D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8E90 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8E91 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8E92 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8E93 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8E94 D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8E95 C9                                   ret
 265+ 8E96
 266+ 8E96
 267+ 8E96              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8E96              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 269+ 8E96 21 19 8E     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 270+ 8E99 CD F6 87     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8E9C 11 4F 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8E9F              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8E9F 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8EA0 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8EA2 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8EA4 E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8EA5 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8EA6 21 9B 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8EA9 CD F6 87     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8EAC D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8EAD              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8EAD 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8EAE FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8EB0 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8EB2              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8EB2 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8EB3 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8EB4 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8EB5 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8EB7              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8EB7 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8EB9 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8EBA 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8EBB E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8EBC 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8EBD 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8EBF              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8EBF 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8EC0 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8EC1 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8EC2 C9           	ret

 219+ 8F5D              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8F5D              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8F5D              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8F5D              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8F5D              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8F5D              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8F5D              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character

 229+ 8F5D              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8F5D              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8F5D              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8F5D              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8F5D              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8F5D              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8F5D              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17

 237+ 8F5D              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8F5D              ;
 239+ 8F5D              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8F5D              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 8F5D              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 8F5D              ;

 246+ 8F5D              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 8F5D              ;

 251+ 8F5D              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
