 995  8F5D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_add.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
   1+ 8F5D              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ 8F5D              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ 8F5D              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ 8F5D
   5+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLSAHLEquBHLaddCDE:        ld      a,b
   6+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        xor     c
   7+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        and     SignOnly8Bit
   8+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative   .OppositeSigns
   9+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.SameSigns:             ld      ixh,b                      ; ixh = b
  10+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit b                     ; b = ABS b
  11+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        add     hl,de                      ; hl = hl + de
  12+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = b + c + carry
  13+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        adc     c                          ;
  14+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ;
  15+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ;
  16+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ;
  17+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ;
  18+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ;
  19+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeSigns:         ld      ixh,b                      ; save signed into ixh and ixl
  20+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      ixl,c                      ; .
  21+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit c                     ; c = ABS C
  22+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = abs b
  23+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBitA                      ; .
  24+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     c                          ; a = a - c
  25+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL  ; if c is positive
  26+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        push    hl
  27+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     hl,de                      ; then subtract de from hl
  28+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .HLDEWasNegative   ; if sub was positive
  29+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        pop     de                         ; at this stage the stack is just junk
  30+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ; then copy results to AHL
  31+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ; by just handling sign
  32+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ; .
  33+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ; .
  34+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ; .
  35+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeCDEgtBHL:      ex      de,hl                      ; save hl
  36+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      c,ixh                      ; swap signs over
  37+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,ixl                      ;
  38+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeSigns             ; and do calc again
  39+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.HLDEWasNegative:       pop     hl                         ; get back hl swap values and try again
  40+ 8F5D              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  41+ 8F5D              ; example
  42+ 8F5D              ; bhl - 00 00 06 CDE - 80 00 0B so equates to 000006 + (-00000B) or -000005 or 800005
  43+ 8F5D
  44+ 8F5D 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  45+ 8F5E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  46+ 8F60 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  47+ 8F61                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  47+ 8F61 FA 6F 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  48+ 8F64 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  49+ 8F65 B1                                   or      c
  50+ 8F66                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  50+ 8F66 FA 6B 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  51+ 8F69 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  52+ 8F6A C9                                   ret
  53+ 8F6B 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  54+ 8F6C 78                                   ld      a,b
  55+ 8F6D B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  56+ 8F6E C9                                   ret
  57+ 8F6F              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 8F6F B7          >                        or a
  58+ 8F70 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  59+ 8F72 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  60+ 8F74 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  61+ 8F75 C9                                   ret
  62+ 8F76              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  62+ 8F76 AF          >                    xor a
  62+ 8F77 95          >                    sub l
  62+ 8F78 6F          >                    ld l,a
  62+ 8F79 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  62+ 8F7A 94          >                    sub h
  62+ 8F7B 67          >                    ld h,a
  63+ 8F7C 78                                   ld      a,b
  64+ 8F7D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  65+ 8F7F C9                                   ret
  66+ 8F80
  67+ 8F80 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
  68+ 8F81 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  69+ 8F83 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  70+ 8F84 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  71+ 8F85                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  71+ 8F85 FA 9D 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  72+ 8F88 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  73+ 8F89 B2                                   or      d
  74+ 8F8A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  74+ 8F8A FA 8F 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  75+ 8F8D 19                                   add     hl,de
  76+ 8F8E C9                                   ret
  77+ 8F8F 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  78+ 8F90 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  79+ 8F92 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 8F93 7A                                   ld      a,d
  81+ 8F94 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  82+ 8F96 57                                   ld      d,a
  83+ 8F97 19                                   add     hl,de
  84+ 8F98 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  85+ 8F9A B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  86+ 8F9B 67                                   ld      h,a
  87+ 8F9C C9                                   ret
  88+ 8F9D 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  89+ 8F9E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  90+ 8FA0 67                                   ld      h,a
  91+ 8FA1 7A                                   ld      a,d
  92+ 8FA2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ 8FA4 57                                   ld      d,a
  94+ 8FA5                                      ClearCarryFlag
  94+ 8FA5 B7          >                        or a
  95+ 8FA6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  96+ 8FA8 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  97+ 8FAA 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  98+ 8FAB B4                                   or      h
  99+ 8FAC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 100+ 8FAD C9                                   ret
 101+ 8FAE              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 101+ 8FAE AF          >                    xor a
 101+ 8FAF 95          >                    sub l
 101+ 8FB0 6F          >                    ld l,a
 101+ 8FB1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 101+ 8FB2 94          >                    sub h
 101+ 8FB3 67          >                    ld h,a
 102+ 8FB4 78                                   ld      a,b
 103+ 8FB5 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 104+ 8FB7 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 8FB8 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 106+ 8FB9 C9                                   ret

 108+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED addhldesigned:          bit     7,h

 110+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16hl
 111+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED .noneghl:               bit     7,d
 112+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED                         jr      nz,.nonegde
 113+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16de

 120+ 8FBA              ;;;NOT USED                         ret

 131+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
 132+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
 133+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c

 135+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? ; 06 06 2022 not used

 138+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         and     SignMask8Bit

 140+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
 141+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         add     hl,a
 142+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 143+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
 144+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C

 148+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive

 150+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 151+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 152+ 8FBA              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret

 155+ 8FBA              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 156+ 8FBA              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 157+ 8FBA 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 158+ 8FBB 5C                                   ld      e,h
 159+ 8FBC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 160+ 8FBD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8FBF 67                                   ld      h,a
 162+ 8FC0 7A                                   ld      a,d
 163+ 8FC1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 164+ 8FC3 7B                                   ld      a,e
 165+ 8FC4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 166+ 8FC6 B4                                   or      h
 167+ 8FC7 C9                                   ret
 168+ 8FC8              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 169+ 8FC8              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 170+ 8FC8 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 171+ 8FC9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 172+ 8FCA 78                                   ld      a,b
 173+ 8FCB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 174+ 8FCD 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 175+ 8FCF EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 176+ 8FD0 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 177+ 8FD2 69                                   ld      l,c
 178+ 8FD3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 178+ 8FD3 B7          >                        or a
 179+ 8FD4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 180+ 8FD6 C9                                   ret
 181+ 8FD7 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 182+ 8FD8 ED 31                                add hl,a
 183+ 8FDA C9                                   ret
 184+ 8FDB              ;tested mathstestsun2
 185+ 8FDB              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 186+ 8FDB 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 187+ 8FDC AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 188+ 8FDD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 189+ 8FDF 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 190+ 8FE1 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 191+ 8FE2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 192+ 8FE4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 193+ 8FE6 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 194+ 8FE7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 195+ 8FE9 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 196+ 8FEA 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 197+ 8FEB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 198+ 8FED 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 199+ 8FEE 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 200+ 8FEF 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 201+ 8FF0 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 202+ 8FF1 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 203+ 8FF2 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 204+ 8FF3 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 205+ 8FF4 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 206+ 8FF5 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 207+ 8FF6 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 208+ 8FF8 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 209+ 8FF9 C9                                   ret                         ; done
 210+ 8FFA 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 211+ 8FFB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 212+ 8FFD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ 8FFF 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 214+ 9000 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 215+ 9001 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 216+ 9003 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ 9005 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 218+ 9006 E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 219+ 9007 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 220+ 9009 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 221+ 900B E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 222+ 900C 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 223+ 900E 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 224+ 9010 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 225+ 9011                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 225+ 9011 BD          >                        cp      l
 225+ 9012 DA 1C 90    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 226+ 9015 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 227+ 9017              ; The same so its just zero
 228+ 9017 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 229+ 9018 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 230+ 9019 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 231+ 901A 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 232+ 901B C9                                   ret                        ; .
 233+ 901C              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 234+ 901C 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 235+ 901D 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 236+ 901E 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 237+ 901F 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 238+ 9020 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 239+ 9021 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 240+ 9022 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 241+ 9023 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 242+ 9024 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 243+ 9025 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 244+ 9027 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 245+ 9029 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 246+ 902A 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 247+ 902B C9                                   ret
 248+ 902C 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 249+ 902D 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 250+ 902E 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 251+ 902F 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 252+ 9030 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 253+ 9031 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 254+ 9032 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 255+ 9033 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 256+ 9034 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 257+ 9035 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 258+ 9037 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 259+ 9039 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 260+ 903A 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 261+ 903B C9                                   ret
 262+ 903C
 263+ 903C              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 264+ 903C              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 265+ 903C 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 266+ 903D 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 267+ 903E A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 268+ 903F CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 269+ 9041 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 270+ 9043 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 271+ 9044 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 272+ 9045 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 273+ 9047 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 274+ 9048 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 275+ 9049 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 276+ 904A A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 277+ 904B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 278+ 904D 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 279+ 904E C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 280+ 904F
 281+ 904F
 282+ 904F              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 283+ 904F              ; a = value to add
 284+ 904F              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 285+ 904F              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 286+ 904F              ; NOT USED addINWKbasigned:
 287+ 904F              ; NOT USED 		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 288+ 904F              ; NOT USED 		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 289+ 904F              ; NOT USED 		ld		a,b
 290+ 904F              ; NOT USED 		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 291+ 904F              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 292+ 904F              ; NOT USED         and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 293+ 904F              ; NOT USED         ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 294+ 904F              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 295+ 904F              ; NOT USED         and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 296+ 904F              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 297+ 904F              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 298+ 904F              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 299+ 904F              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 300+ 904F              ; NOTUSEDaddhlcsigned:
 301+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 302+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 303+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      d,(hl)
 304+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 305+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 306+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 307+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 308+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 309+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        jr      z,.postivecalc
 310+ 904F              ; NOTUSED.negativecalc:
 311+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,h
 312+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 313+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 314+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 315+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 316+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        sbc     hl,bc
 317+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 318+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 319+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 320+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 321+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 322+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 323+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 324+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a
 325+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 326+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 327+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 328+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 329+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 330+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 331+ 904F              ; NOTUSED.nocarry:
 332+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 333+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        or      b                           ; b is still varT
 334+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 335+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 336+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 337+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 338+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 339+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 340+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 341+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ret
 342+ 904F              ; NOTUSED.postivecalc:
 343+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b
 344+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0
 345+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        add     hl,de
 346+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl
 347+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 348+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 349+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 350+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 351+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 352+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 353+ 904F              ; NOTUSED        ret
 354+ 904F
 355+ 904F              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 356+ 904F              ;MVT1
 357+ 904F              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 358+ 904F              ;    A = sign bit => T
 359+ 904F              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 360+ 904F              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 361+ 904F              ;
 362+ 904F              ;        and h, 7F
 363+ 904F              ;        b = 0
 364+ 904F              ;        c = varS
 365+ 904F              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 366+ 904F              ;        retain carry
 367+ 904F              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 368+ 904F              ;        and 7F
 369+ 904F              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 370+ 904F              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 371+ 904F              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 372+ 904F              ;
 373+ 904F              ;    else
 374+ 904F              ;MV10.
 375+ 904F              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 376+ 904F              ;        or      sign bit
 377+ 904F
 378+ 904F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
 996  904F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_subtract.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
   1+ 904F              ;...subtract routines
   2+ 904F              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
   3+ 904F 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
   4+ 9050 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   5+ 9052 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
   6+ 9053 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ 9054                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
   7+ 9054 FA 82 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
   8+ 9057 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
   9+ 9058 B2                                   or      d
  10+ 9059                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ 9059 FA 63 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  11+ 905C                                      ClearCarryFlag
  11+ 905C B7          >                        or a
  12+ 905D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  13+ 905F                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  13+ 905F FA 76 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  14+ 9062 C9                                   ret
  15+ 9063 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  16+ 9064 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  17+ 9066 67                                   ld      h,a
  18+ 9067 7A                                   ld      a,d
  19+ 9068 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ 906A 57                                   ld      d,a
  21+ 906B                                      ClearCarryFlag
  21+ 906B B7          >                        or a
  22+ 906C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  23+ 906E                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  23+ 906E FA 76 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  24+ 9071 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  25+ 9072 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  26+ 9074 67                                   ld      h,a
  27+ 9075 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9076              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  28+ 9076 AF          >                    xor a
  28+ 9077 95          >                    sub l
  28+ 9078 6F          >                    ld l,a
  28+ 9079 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  28+ 907A 94          >                    sub h
  28+ 907B 67          >                    ld h,a
  29+ 907C 78                                   ld      a,b
  30+ 907D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  31+ 907F B4                                   or      h
  32+ 9080 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  33+ 9081 C9                                   ret
  34+ 9082 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  35+ 9083 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  36+ 9084 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  37+ 9086 67                                   ld      h,a
  38+ 9087 7A                                   ld      a,d
  39+ 9088 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  40+ 908A 57                                   ld      d,a
  41+ 908B 19                                   add     hl,de
  42+ 908C 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  43+ 908D B4                                   or      h
  44+ 908E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  45+ 908F C9                                   ret
  46+ 9090
  47+ 9090
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
 997  9090                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ 9090              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 9090 2A 6E 84     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 9093 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 9094 22 6E 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 9097 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 909A 2A 70 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 909D ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 909F 22 70 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 90A2 C9                                   ret
  10+ 90A3
  11+ 90A3 2A 6E 84     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 90A6 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 90A7 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 90A8 2A 70 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 90AB B4                                   or      h
  16+ 90AC B5                                   or      l
  17+ 90AD C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 90AE B7                                   or      a
  19+ 90AF 2A 6E 84                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 90B2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 90B4 22 6E 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 90B7 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 90BA 2A 70 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 90BD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 90BF 22 70 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 90C2                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 90C2 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 90C4 C2 C8 90    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 90C7 C9                                   ret
  28+ 90C8 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 90CB 22 6E 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 90CE 22 70 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 90D1 C9                                   ret
  32+ 90D2

 998  90D2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 90D2              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 90D2              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 90D2 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 90D3 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 90D4 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 90D6 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 90D8 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 90D9 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 90DA 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 90DB 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 90DC DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 90DE CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 90E0 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 90E2 17                                   rla
  15+ 90E3 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 90E4 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 90E6 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 90E8 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 90EA 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 90EB 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 90ED ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 90EF 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 90F0 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 90F2 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 90F3 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 90F4 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 90F5 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 90F7 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 90F8 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 90F9 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 90FB D1                                   pop de
  32+ 90FC C9                                   ret
  33+ 90FD
  34+ 90FD FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 90FF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9101 CD D2 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 9104 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 9105 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 9107 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 9109 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 910A 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 910B F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 910C C9                                   ret
  44+ 910D
  45+ 910D                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 910D FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 910F A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9110 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 9112 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 9114 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 9115 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 9117 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 9118 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 911A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 911C CD D2 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 911F FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 9121 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 9123 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 9124 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 9126 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 9127 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 9129 C9                                   ret
  63+ 912A
  64+ 912A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 912A              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 912A              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 912A              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 912A 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 912B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 912D 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 912F 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 9132 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 9133 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 9136 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 9137 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 9139 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 913B 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 913C ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 913E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9140 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 9142 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 9143 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 9144 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 9146 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 9147 32 62 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 914A C9                                   ret
  87+ 914B
  88+ 914B
  89+ 914B
  90+ 914B
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
 999  914B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"

   1+ 914B              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 914B 2A 62 7E                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 914E 3A 61 7E                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 9151 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 9153 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9156 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 9157                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 9157 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 9159 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 915B CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 915D 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 915F EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 9160 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 9161 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 9162              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 9162 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 9164 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 9166 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 9168 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 916A 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 916C EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 916D D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 916F C9                                   ret
  20+ 9170
  21+ 9170
  22+ 9170              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ 9170 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ 9170 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ 9170 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ 9170 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ 9170 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ 9170 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ 9170 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ 9170 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 9170 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ 9170 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ 9170 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ 9170 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ 9170 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ 9170 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ 9170 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ 9170 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ 9170                                      ENDM

  43+ 9170                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ 9170              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ 9170 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ 9171 3A 61 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ 9174 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 9175 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ 9176 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ 9178 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ 9179 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ 917A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 917C 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ 917D 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ 917E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 9180 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 9181 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ 9183 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ 9184 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ 9185 57          >                        ld      d,a
