  48+ 918D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ 918D B7          >                        or a
  49+ 918E DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ 9190 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ 9191 C9                                   ret
  52+ 9192
  53+ 9192              madDEequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  53+ 9192 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  53+ 9193 3A 61 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  53+ 9196 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 9197 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  53+ 9198 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  53+ 919A 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  53+ 919B 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  53+ 919C E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 919E 57          >                        ld      d,a
  53+ 919F 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  53+ 91A0 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 91A2 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 91A3 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  53+ 91A5 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  53+ 91A6 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  53+ 91A7 57          >                        ld      d,a
  54+ 91A8 2A 62 7E                             ld		hl,(varR)
  55+ 91AB CD B1 91                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  56+ 91AE EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  57+ 91AF                                      ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 91AF B7          >                        or a
  58+ 91B0 C9                                   ret
  59+ 91B1
  60+ 91B1 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  61+ 91B2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  62+ 91B4 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  63+ 91B5 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  64+ 91B6                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  64+ 91B6 FA CE 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  65+ 91B9 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  66+ 91BA B2                                   or      d
  67+ 91BB                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  67+ 91BB FA C0 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  68+ 91BE 19                                   add     hl,de
  69+ 91BF C9                                   ret
  70+ 91C0 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  71+ 91C1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  72+ 91C3 67                                   ld      h,a
  73+ 91C4 7A                                   ld      a,d
  74+ 91C5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 91C7 57                                   ld      d,a
  76+ 91C8 19                                   add     hl,de
  77+ 91C9 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  78+ 91CB B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  79+ 91CC 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 91CD C9                                   ret
  81+ 91CE 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  82+ 91CF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  83+ 91D1 67                                   ld      h,a
  84+ 91D2 7A                                   ld      a,d
  85+ 91D3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  86+ 91D5 57                                   ld      d,a
  87+ 91D6 B7                                   or      a
  88+ 91D7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  89+ 91D9 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  90+ 91DB 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  91+ 91DC B4                                   or      h
  92+ 91DD 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  93+ 91DE C9                                   ret
  94+ 91DF              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  94+ 91DF AF          >                    xor a
  94+ 91E0 95          >                    sub l
  94+ 91E1 6F          >                    ld l,a
  94+ 91E2 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  94+ 91E3 94          >                    sub h
  94+ 91E4 67          >                    ld h,a
  95+ 91E5 78                                   ld      a,b
  96+ 91E6 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  97+ 91E8 B4                                   or      h
  98+ 91E9 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  99+ 91EA C9                                   ret
 100+ 91EB
 101+ 91EB
 102+ 91EB                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 103+ 91EB                  ;
 104+ 91EB                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 105+ 91EB                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 106+ 91EB                  ;
 107+ 91EB                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 108+ 91EB                  ;         carry reset
 109+ 91EB                  ;
 110+ 91EB                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 111+ 91EB 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 112+ 91EC 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 113+ 91ED ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 114+ 91EF EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ 91F0 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 116+ 91F2
 117+ 91F2 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 118+ 91F3 85                                   add a,l
 119+ 91F4 57                                   ld  d,a
 120+ 91F5 EB                                   ex de,hl
 121+ 91F6
 122+ 91F6 7A                                   ld  a,d
 123+ 91F7 CE 00                                adc a,0
 124+ 91F9 C9                                   ret
 125+ 91FA
 126+ 91FA 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 127+ 91FB 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 128+ 91FC ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 129+ 91FE EB                                   ex      de,hl
 130+ 91FF C9                                   ret
 131+ 9200
 132+ 9200                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 133+ 9200                 ;
 134+ 9200                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 135+ 9200                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 136+ 9200                 ;
 137+ 9200                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 138+ 9200                 ;         carry reset
 139+ 9200                 ;
 140+ 9200                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 141+ 9200
 142+ 9200
 143+ 9200
 144+ 9200 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 145+ 9201 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 146+ 9202 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 147+ 9203 6A                                   ld l,d
 148+ 9204 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 149+ 9205 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 150+ 9206              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 151+ 9206 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 152+ 9208 EB                                   ex de,hl
 153+ 9209 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 154+ 920B
 155+ 920B AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 156+ 920C 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 157+ 920D 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 158+ 920E
 159+ 920E 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 160+ 920F 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 161+ 9210 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 162+ 9212
 163+ 9212 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 164+ 9213 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 165+ 9214
 166+ 9214 7A                                   ld a,d
 167+ 9215 85                                   add a,l
 168+ 9216 67                                   ld h,a
 169+ 9217 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 170+ 9218
 171+ 9218 D1                                   pop de
 172+ 9219 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 173+ 921B
 174+ 921B EB                                   ex de,hl
 175+ 921C ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 176+ 921E EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 177+ 921F
 178+ 921F C9                                   ret
 179+ 9220
 180+ 9220              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 181+ 9220              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 182+ 9220              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 183+ 9220              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 184+ 9220              ;         carry reset
 185+ 9220              ; maths is
 186+ 9220              ;        hl = y , de= x
 187+ 9220              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 188+ 9220              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 189+ 9220              ;
 190+ 9220              ;
 191+ 9220              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 192+ 9220 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 193+ 9221 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 194+ 9222 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 195+ 9223 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 196+ 9224 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 197+ 9225 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 198+ 9226 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 199+ 9228 EB                                   ex de,hl
 200+ 9229 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 201+ 922B 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 202+ 922C 59                                   ld e,c
 203+ 922D 50                                   ld d,b
 204+ 922E ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 205+ 9230 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 206+ 9231 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 207+ 9232 67                                   ld h,a
 208+ 9233 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 209+ 9234                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 210+ 9234 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 211+ 9235 C1                                   pop     bc
 212+ 9236 C9                                   ret
 213+ 9237
 214+ 9237
 215+ 9237              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 216+ 9237              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 217+ 9237 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 218+ 9238 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 219+ 9239 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 220+ 923B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 221+ 923D 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 222+ 923E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 223+ 9240 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 224+ 9241 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 225+ 9242 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 226+ 9244              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 227+ 9244 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 228+ 9245 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 229+ 9246 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 230+ 9248 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 231+ 9249 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 232+ 924A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 233+ 924B 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 234+ 924C 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 235+ 924D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 236+ 924E ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 237+ 9250 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 238+ 9251 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 239+ 9252 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 240+ 9253 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 241+ 9254 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 242+ 9255 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 243+ 9256 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 244+ 9257 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 245+ 9259 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 246+ 925A 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 247+ 925B FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 248+ 925D 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 249+ 925E C9                                   ret
 250+ 925F
 251+ 925F              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 252+ 925F              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 253+ 925F              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 254+ 925F              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 255+ 925F              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 256+ 925F              ;mult3
 257+ 925F              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 258+ 925F              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 259+ 925F              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 260+ 925F              ; Algorithm
 261+ 925F              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 262+ 925F              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 263+ 925F              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 264+ 925F              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 265+ 925F              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 266+ 925F              ;
 267+ 925F              ;
 268+ 925F 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 269+ 9260 AC                                   xor     h
 270+ 9261 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 271+ 9263 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 272+ 9265 7C                                   ld      a,h
 273+ 9266 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 274+ 9268 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 275+ 926A              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 275+ 926A AF          >                    xor a
 275+ 926B 95          >                    sub l
 275+ 926C 6F          >                    ld l,a
 275+ 926D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 275+ 926E 94          >                    sub h
 275+ 926F 67          >                    ld h,a
 276+ 9270 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 277+ 9271 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 278+ 9273 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 279+ 9275              .DENegative:            NegDE
 279+ 9275 AF          >                    xor a
 279+ 9276 93          >                    sub e
 279+ 9277 5F          >                    ld e,a
 279+ 9278 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 279+ 9279 92          >                    sub d
 279+ 927A 57          >                    ld d,a
 280+ 927B CD 20 92     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 281+ 927E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 282+ 9280 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 283+ 9281 C8                                   ret     z
 284+ 9282
 285+ 9282
 286+ 9282
 287+ 9282 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 288+ 9283 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 289+ 9284 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 290+ 9286 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 291+ 9288 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 292+ 9289 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 293+ 928B 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 294+ 928C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 295+ 928D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 296+ 928F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 297+ 9290 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 298+ 9291 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 299+ 9293 7C                                   ld      a,h
 300+ 9294 B5                                   or      l
 301+ 9295 B3                                   or      e
 302+ 9296 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 303+ 9298              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 304+ 9298 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 305+ 9299 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 306+ 929B 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 307+ 929C FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 308+ 929E 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 309+ 929F 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 310+ 92A0 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 311+ 92A2 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 312+ 92A4 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 313+ 92A5 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 314+ 92A6 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 315+ 92A8 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 316+ 92A9 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 317+ 92AA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 318+ 92AC FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 319+ 92AE 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 320+ 92AF 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 321+ 92B0 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 322+ 92B1 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 323+ 92B3 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 324+ 92B5 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 325+ 92B6 C9                                   ret
 326+ 92B7 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 327+ 92BA                                      ZeroA
 327+ 92BA AF          >                        xor a
 328+ 92BB 4F                                   ld      c,a
 329+ 92BC 6F                                   ld      l,a
 330+ 92BD C9                                   ret
 331+ 92BE
 332+ 92BE              ;;;
 333+ 92BE              ;;;
 334+ 92BE              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 335+ 92BE              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 336+ 92BE              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 337+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 338+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 339+ 92BE              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 340+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 341+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 342+ 92BE              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 343+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 344+ 92BE              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 345+ 92BE              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 346+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 347+ 92BE              ;;;                        or      l
 348+ 92BE              ;;;                        or      e
 349+ 92BE              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 350+ 92BE              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 351+ 92BE              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 352+ 92BE              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 353+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 354+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 355+ 92BE              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 356+ 92BE              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 357+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 358+ 92BE              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 359+ 92BE              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 360+ 92BE              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 361+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 362+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 363+ 92BE              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 364+ 92BE              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 365+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 366+ 92BE              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 367+ 92BE              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 368+ 92BE              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 369+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 370+ 92BE              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 371+ 92BE              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 372+ 92BE              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 373+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 374+ 92BE              ;;;                        ret
 375+ 92BE              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 376+ 92BE              ;;;                        ZeroA
 377+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 378+ 92BE              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 379+ 92BE              ;;;                        ret
 380+ 92BE
 381+ 92BE              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 382+ 92BE              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 383+ 92BE              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 384+ 92BE              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 385+ 92BE              ;         carry reset
 386+ 92BE              ;
 387+ 92BE              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 388+ 92BE 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 389+ 92BF AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 390+ 92C0 32 BE 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 391+ 92C3 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 392+ 92C4 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 393+ 92C7 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 394+ 92C9 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 395+ 92CB 57                                   ld      d,a
 396+ 92CC 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 397+ 92CE 32 BE 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 398+ 92D1 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 399+ 92D2 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 400+ 92D5 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 401+ 92D7 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 402+ 92D9 67                                   ld      h,a
 403+ 92DA 3A BE 92                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 404+ 92DD EE 80                                xor     $80
 405+ 92DF 32 BE 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 406+ 92E2 CD 20 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 407+ 92E5 3A BE 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 408+ 92E8 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 409+ 92EB C8                                   ret     z
 410+ 92EC AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 411+ 92ED 95                                   sub 	l
 412+ 92EE 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 413+ 92EF 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 414+ 92F0 94                                   sub 	h
 415+ 92F1 67                                   ld 		h,a
 416+ 92F2 C9                                   ret
 417+ 92F3
 418+ 92F3 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 419+ 92F4 32 BE 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 420+ 92F7 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 421+ 92F8 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 92FB 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 423+ 92FD E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 424+ 92FF 57                                   ld      d,a
 425+ 9300 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 426+ 9302 32 BE 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 427+ 9305 CD 20 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 428+ 9308 3A BE 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 429+ 930B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 430+ 930E C8                                   ret     z
 431+ 930F AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 432+ 9310 95                                   sub 	l
 433+ 9311 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 434+ 9312 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 435+ 9313 94                                   sub 	h
 436+ 9314 67                                   ld 		h,a
 437+ 9315 C9                                   ret
 438+ 9316
 439+ 9316
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1000  9316                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 9316              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9316              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 9316
   4+ 9316              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 9316 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 9316 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 9316 ~            			mul
   8+ 9316              			ENDM
   9+ 9316
  10+ 9316              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 9316 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 9316 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 9316 ~            			mul
  14+ 9316 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 9316              			ENDM
  16+ 9316
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1001  9316                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 9316              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9316              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 9316              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 9316              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 9316              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 9316              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 9316 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 9319 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 931A 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 931B              .sqrloop:
  11+ 931B CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 931D CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 931F 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 9320 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9321 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9323 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 9325 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9326 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9327 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9329              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9329 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 932A EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 932B B7           	or a
  24+ 932C ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 932E              .sqrfi:
  26+ 932E CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 9330 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 9332 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 9334 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 9336 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 9338 C9           	ret
  32+ 9339
  33+ 9339
  34+ 9339              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 9339 3A 61 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 933C 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 933D 3A 62 7E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 9340 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 9341 CD 16 93     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 9344 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 9345 32 61 7E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 9348 C9           	ret
  43+ 9349
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1002  9349                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9349              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9349              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9349                      ; Input:
   4+ 9349                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9349                      ; Output:
   6+ 9349                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9349                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9349                      ;       AF
   9+ 9349                      ;
  10+ 9349              negate16:
  11+ 9349 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 934A 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 934B 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 934C 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 934D 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 934E 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 934F C9                               ret
  18+ 9350
  19+ 9350 AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 9351 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 9352 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 9353 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 9354 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 9355 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 9356 C9                               ret
  26+ 9357
  27+ 9357 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 9358 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 9359 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 935A 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 935B 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 935C 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 935D C9                               ret
  34+ 935E
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1003  935E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 935E
   2+ 935E
   3+ 935E
   4+ 935E              ;
   5+ 935E              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ 935E              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ 935E              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ 935E              ;               if a >= D
   9+ 935E              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ 935E              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ 935E              ;           else
  12+ 935E
  13+ 935E              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ 935E              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ 935E              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ 935E              ;
  17+ 935E              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ 935E              ;
  19+ 935E              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ 935E              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ 935E
  22+ 935E 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  23+ 935F 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 9362 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
  25+ 9363 3A 62 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
  26+ 9366 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  27+ 9367                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  28+ 9367 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  29+ 9368 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  30+ 9369 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  31+ 936B 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
  32+ 936C A7                                   and     a                       ;
  33+ 936D 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
  34+ 936F 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  35+ 9370 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  36+ 9371 E6 80                                and     $80
  37+ 9373 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  38+ 9374 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  39+ 9376 06 10                                ld      b,16
  40+ 9378                                      ShiftDELeft1
  40+ 9378 CB 23       >			   sla e
  40+ 937A CB 12       >			   rl  d
  41+ 937C CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  42+ 937E CB 39                                srl     c
  43+ 9380 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  44+ 9382                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  44+ 9382 B9          >                        cp      c
  44+ 9383 DA 89 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  45+ 9386                                      ClearCarryFlag
  45+ 9386 B7          >                        or a
  46+ 9387 99                                   sbc     c
  47+ 9388                                      ClearCarryFlag
  47+ 9388 B7          >                        or a
  48+ 9389 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  49+ 938A CB 13                                rl      e
  50+ 938C CB 12                                rl      d
  51+ 938E 05                                   dec     b
  52+ 938F 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  53+ 9391 7B                                   ld      a,e
  54+ 9392 B5                                   or      l
  55+ 9393 42                                   ld      b,d
  56+ 9394 C9                                   ret
  57+ 9395              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  57+ 9395 AF          >                        xor a
  58+ 9396 47                                   ld      b,a
  59+ 9397 C9                                   ret
  60+ 9398 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
  61+ 939A 47                                   ld      b,a
  62+ 939B C9                                   ret
  63+ 939C
  64+ 939C 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  65+ 939D 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  66+ 93A0 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
  67+ 93A2 3A 62 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
  68+ 93A5 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  69+ 93A6                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  70+ 93A6 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  71+ 93A7 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  72+ 93A8 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  73+ 93AA 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  74+ 93AB A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  75+ 93AC E6 80                                and     $80
  76+ 93AE 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  77+ 93AF 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  78+ 93B1 06 10                                ld      b,16
  79+ 93B3                                      ShiftDELeft1
  79+ 93B3 CB 23       >			   sla e
  79+ 93B5 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  80+ 93B7 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  81+ 93B9 CB 39                                srl     c
  82+ 93BB CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  83+ 93BD                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  83+ 93BD B9          >                        cp      c
  83+ 93BE DA C4 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  84+ 93C1                                      ClearCarryFlag
  84+ 93C1 B7          >                        or a
  85+ 93C2 99                                   sbc     c
  86+ 93C3                                      ClearCarryFlag
  86+ 93C3 B7          >                        or a
  87+ 93C4 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  88+ 93C5 CB 13                                rl      e
  89+ 93C7 CB 12                                rl      d
  90+ 93C9 05                                   dec     b
  91+ 93CA 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  92+ 93CC 7B                                   ld      a,e
  93+ 93CD B5                                   or      l
  94+ 93CE 42                                   ld      b,d
  95+ 93CF C9                                   ret
  96+ 93D0              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  96+ 93D0 AF          >                        xor a
  97+ 93D1 47                                   ld      b,a
  98+ 93D2 C9                                   ret
  99+ 93D3
 100+ 93D3 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 101+ 93D4 15                                   dec     d
 102+ 93D5 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 103+ 93D7 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 104+ 93D9 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 105+ 93DB 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 106+ 93DC B3                                   or      e
 107+ 93DD 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 108+ 93DF 14                                   inc     d
 109+ 93E0 15                                   dec     d
 110+ 93E1 CD 66 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 111+ 93E4                                      ZeroA
 111+ 93E4 AF          >                        xor a
 112+ 93E5 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 113+ 93E6 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 114+ 93E8 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 115+ 93E9 C9                                   ret
 116+ 93EA AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 117+ 93EB 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 118+ 93EC 67                                   ld      h,a
 119+ 93ED 6F                                   ld      l,a
 120+ 93EE C9                                   ret
 121+ 93EF 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 122+ 93F1 67                                   ld      h,a
 123+ 93F2 6F                                   ld      l,a
 124+ 93F3                                      SetCarryFlag
 124+ 93F3 37          >                        scf
 125+ 93F4 C9                                   ret
 126+ 93F5
 127+ 93F5              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 128+ 93F5 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 129+ 93F7 CB 27                                sla		a							;
 130+ 93F9 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 131+ 93FA CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 132+ 93FC 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 133+ 93FE BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 134+ 93FF 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 135+ 9401              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 135+ 9401 B7          >                        or a
 136+ 9402 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 137+ 9403                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 137+ 9403 B7          >                        or a
 138+ 9404 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 139+ 9405 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 140+ 9407 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 141+ 9409 BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 142+ 940A 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 143+ 940C                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 143+ 940C B7          >                        or a
 144+ 940D 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 145+ 940F 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 146+ 9410 CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 147+ 9412 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 148+ 9414 BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 149+ 9415 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 150+ 9417 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 151+ 9418 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 152+ 9419 CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 153+ 941B 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 154+ 941D C9                                   ret
 155+ 941E 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 156+ 941F                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 156+ 941F 37          >                        scf
 157+ 9420 CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
 158+ 9422 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 159+ 9424 C9                                   ret
 160+ 9425 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 161+ 9427 C9                                   ret
 162+ 9428
 163+ 9428 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 164+ 9429 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 165+ 942B 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 166+ 942D 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 167+ 942F CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 168+ 9431 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 169+ 9433                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 169+ 9433 BA          >                        cp      d
 169+ 9434 DA 39 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 170+ 9437 92                                   sub     d
 171+ 9438                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 171+ 9438 B7          >                        or a
 172+ 9439              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 172+ 9439 3F          >                        ccf
 173+ 943A CB 13                                rl      e
 174+ 943C 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 175+ 943E 7B                                   ld      a,e
 176+ 943F C9                                   ret
 177+ 9440 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 178+ 9441                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 178+ 9441 37          >                        scf
 179+ 9442 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 180+ 9444 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 181+ 9446 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 182+ 9447 C9                                   ret
 183+ 9448 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 184+ 944A C9                                   ret
 185+ 944B 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 186+ 944D C9                                   ret
 187+ 944E
 188+ 944E
 189+ 944E              ; Divide 8-bit values
 190+ 944E              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 191+ 944E              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 192+ 944E              ;
 193+ 944E              ;;;Div8:
 194+ 944E              ;;;    xor a
 195+ 944E              ;;;    ld b,8
 196+ 944E              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 197+ 944E              ;;;    rl e
 198+ 944E              ;;;    rla
 199+ 944E              ;;;    sub c
 200+ 944E              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 201+ 944E              ;;;    add a,c
 202+ 944E              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 203+ 944E              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 204+ 944E              ;;;    ld b,a0
 205+ 944E              ;;;    ld a,e
 206+ 944E              ;;;    rla
 207+ 944E              ;;;    cpl
 208+ 944E              ;;;    ret
 209+ 944E
 210+ 944E              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 211+ 944E              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 212+ 944E              ;;         A is a copy of E
 213+ 944E              ;;         HL is the remainder
 214+ 944E              ;;         BC is not changed
 215+ 944E              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 216+ 944E              ;140 bytes
 217+ 944E              ;145cc
 218+ 944E
 219+ 944E              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 220+ 944E ~                                rla
 221+ 944E ~                                adc     hl,hl
 222+ 944E ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 223+ 944E ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 224+ 944E ~                                add     hl,bc
 225+ 944E                                  ENDM
 226+ 944E
 227+ 944E AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 228+ 944F ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 229+ 9451 7A                               ld a,d
 230+ 9452                                  MacroDEDivBC
 230+ 9452 17          >                    rla
 230+ 9453 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 230+ 9455 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 230+ 9457 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 230+ 9459 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 231+ 945D ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

 231+ 9461 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 232+ 9469 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 253+ 94D8 5F                               ld e,a
 254+ 94D9 C9                               ret
 255+ 94DA              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 256+ 94DA              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 257+ 94DA              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 258+ 94DA              ; Our use
 259+ 94DA              ; BC = A0
 260+ 94DA              ; DE = 0C
 261+ 94DA              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 262+ 94DA              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 262+ 94DA B9          >                        cp     c
 262+ 94DB D2 06 95    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 263+ 94DE 47                                   ld      b,a
 264+ 94DF 59                                   ld      e,c
 265+ 94E0 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 266+ 94E2 16 00                                ld      d,0
 267+ 94E4 C3 F1 94                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 268+ 94E7 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 269+ 94E8 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 270+ 94EA 21 61 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
 271+ 94ED 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 272+ 94EE 16 00                                ld      d,0
 273+ 94F0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 274+ 94F1              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 275+ 94F1 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 276+ 94F4 78                                   ld      a,b
 277+ 94F5 06 10                                ld      b,16
 278+ 94F7 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 279+ 94F9 17                                   rla			; ...
 280+ 94FA ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 281+ 94FC ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 282+ 94FE 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 283+ 9500 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 284+ 9501 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 285+ 9502 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 286+ 9504 47                                   ld   b,a
 287+ 9505 C9                                   ret
 288+ 9506 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 289+ 9509 C9                                   ret
 290+ 950A              ; switch to logarithm version
 291+ 950A              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 292+ 950A 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 293+ 950C AF                                   xor a
 294+ 950D CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 295+ 950F 17                                   rla
 296+ 9510 BA                                   cp d
 297+ 9511 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 297+ 9513
 298+ 9513 0C                                   inc c
 299+ 9514 92                                   sub d
 300+ 9515 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 301+ 9517 C9                                   ret
 302+ 9518              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 303+ 9518 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 304+ 951A AF                                   xor a
 305+ 951B CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 306+ 951D CB 14                                rl	h
 307+ 951F              ;    add hl,hl
 308+ 951F 17                                   rla
 309+ 9520 B9                                   cp c
 310+ 9521 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 311+ 9523 2C                                   inc l
 312+ 9524 91                                   sub c
 313+ 9525 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 314+ 9527 C9                                   ret
 315+ 9528              ;
 316+ 9528              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 317+ 9528              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 318+ 9528              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 319+ 9528              ;
 320+ 9528              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 321+ 9528 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 322+ 9528 ~                                    rla				; ...
 323+ 9528 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 324+ 9528 ~                                    jr	1F
 325+ 9528 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 326+ 9528 ~            1:
 327+ 9528 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 328+ 9528                                      ENDM
 329+ 9528
 330+ 9528              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 331+ 9528 ~                                    rl  e
 332+ 9528 ~                                    rla
 333+ 9528 ~                                    sub c
 334+ 9528 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 335+ 9528 ~                                    add a,c
 336+ 9528 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 337+ 9528                                      ENDM
 338+ 9528

 340+ 9528              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 341+ 9528              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 341+ 9528 AF          >                        xor a
 342+ 9529                                      EDivC_Iteration
 342+ 9529 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 342+ 952B 17          >                        rla

 343+ 9532 17          >                        rla

 343+ 9536 81          >                        add a,c

 344+ 9537 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 344+ 9539 17          >                        rla
 344+ 953A 91          >                        sub c

 344+ 953D 81          >                        add a,c

 345+ 9540 17          >                        rla

 345+ 9544 81          >                        add a,c

 347+ 9552 81          >                        add a,c

 348+ 9555 17          >                        rla

 348+ 9559 81          >                        add a,c
 348+ 955A             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 349+ 955A                                      EDivC_Iteration
 349+ 955A CB 13       >                        rl  e
 349+ 955C 17          >                        rla
 349+ 955D 91          >                        sub c
 349+ 955E 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 349+ 9560 81          >                        add a,c
 349+ 9561             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 350+ 9561 47                                   ld      b,a
 351+ 9562 7B                                   ld      a,e
 352+ 9563 17                                   rla
 353+ 9564 2F                                   cpl
 354+ 9565 C9                                   ret
 355+ 9566
 356+ 9566
 357+ 9566              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 358+ 9566 ~                                    rla
 359+ 9566 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 360+ 9566 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 361+ 9566 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 362+ 9566 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 363+ 9566 ~            1:
 364+ 9566                                      ENDM
 365+ 9566
 366+ 9566
 367+ 9566              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 368+ 9566              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 369+ 9566              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 370+ 9566              ;min: 738cc
 371+ 9566              ;max: 898cc
 372+ 9566              ;avg: 818cc
 373+ 9566              ;144 bytes
 374+ 9566 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 375+ 9567 67                                   ld h,a
 376+ 9568 6F                                   ld l,a
 377+ 9569 93                                   sub e
 378+ 956A 5F                                   ld e,a
 379+ 956B 9F                                   sbc a,a
 380+ 956C 92                                   sub d
 381+ 956D 57                                   ld d,a
 382+ 956E 78                                   ld a,b
 383+ 956F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 383+ 956F 17          >                        rla
 383+ 9570 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 383+ 9572 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 383+ 9573 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 383+ 9575 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 383+ 9577             >1:
 384+ 9577                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 384+ 9577 17          >                        rla
 384+ 9578 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 384+ 957A 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 384+ 957B 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F

 405+ 95F5              ; BC = BC / DE
 406+ 95F5              ; HL = BC % DE
 407+ 95F5              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 408+ 95F5 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 409+ 95F6 B3                                   or      e
 410+ 95F7 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 411+ 95F9 D5                                   push    de
 412+ 95FA CD 66 95     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 413+ 95FD D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 414+ 95FE CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 415+ 9600 C2 10 96                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 416+ 9603 7A                                   ld      a,d
 417+ 9604 B3                                   or      e
 418+ 9605 CA 10 96                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 419+ 9608 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 420+ 960A C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 421+ 960B 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 422+ 960C                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 422+ 960C B7          >                        or a
 423+ 960D ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 424+ 960F C9                                   ret
 425+ 9610 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 426+ 9612 C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 427+ 9613 7C                                   ld      a,h
 428+ 9614 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 429+ 9615 C8                                   ret     z
 430+ 9616 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 431+ 9617                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 431+ 9617 B7          >                        or a
 432+ 9618 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 433+ 961A C9                                   ret

 441+ 9622              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 442+ 9622 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 443+ 9622 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 444+ 9622 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 445+ 9622 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 446+ 9622 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 447+ 9622 ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 448+ 9622 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 449+ 9622 ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 450+ 9622 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 451+ 9622 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 452+ 9622 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry

 454+ 9622 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 455+ 9622 ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 456+ 9622 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 457+ 9622 ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 458+ 9622                                      ENDM

 476+ 974B 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 477+ 974E              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 477+ 974E CB 25       >			   sla l
 477+ 9750 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 478+ 9752 7C                                   ld      a,h
 479+ 9753 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 480+ 9755                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 480+ 9755 B9          >                        cp      c
 480+ 9756 DA 61 97    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 481+ 9759 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 482+ 975A 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 483+ 975B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 484+ 975C 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 485+ 975D DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 486+ 975F 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 487+ 9760 3F                                   ccf
 488+ 9761              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 488+ 9761 CB 13       >               rl  e
 488+ 9763 CB 12       >               rl  d
 489+ 9765 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 490+ 9767 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 491+ 9768 C9                                   ret
 492+ 9769
 493+ 9769
 494+ 9769 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 495+ 976A 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 496+ 976C 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 497+ 976D 17                                   rla
 498+ 976E 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 499+ 9770 B9                                   cp	c
 500+ 9771 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 501+ 9773 91                                   sub	c
 502+ 9774 2C                                   inc	l
 503+ 9775 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 504+ 9777 C9                                   ret
 505+ 9778              ;l_div, signed division
 506+ 9778              ; comes in with DE and HL
 507+ 9778              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 508+ 9778 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 509+ 9779 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 510+ 977A C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 511+ 977B 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 512+ 977C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 513+ 977D B7                                   or      a
 514+ 977E F2 87 97                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 515+ 9781              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 515+ 9781 AF          >					xor 	a
 515+ 9782 93          >                    sub 	e
 515+ 9783 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 515+ 9784 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 515+ 9785 92          >                    sub 	d
 515+ 9786 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 516+ 9787 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 517+ 9788 B7                                   or      a
 518+ 9789 F2 92 97                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 519+ 978C                                      macronegate16bc
 519+ 978C AF          >					xor 	a
 519+ 978D 91          >                    sub 	c
 519+ 978E 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 519+ 978F 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 519+ 9790 90          >                    sub 	b
 519+ 9791 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 520+ 9792 CD 22 96     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 521+ 9795                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 522+ 9795 C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 523+ 9796 78                                   ld      a,b
 524+ 9797 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 525+ 9798 F2 A1 97                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 526+ 979B                                      macronegate16hl
 526+ 979B AF          >					xor 	a
 526+ 979C 95          >					sub 	l
 526+ 979D 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 526+ 979E 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 526+ 979F 94          >					sub 	h
 526+ 97A0 67          >					ld 		h,a
 527+ 97A1 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 528+ 97A2 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 529+ 97A3 F0                                   ret     p
 530+ 97A4                                      macronegate16de
 530+ 97A4 AF          >					xor 	a
 530+ 97A5 93          >                    sub 	e
 530+ 97A6 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 530+ 97A7 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 530+ 97A8 92          >                    sub 	d
 530+ 97A9 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 531+ 97AA C9                                   ret
