1004  97AB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 97AB              asm_tis2:
   2+ 97AB              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 97AB              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 97AB F5           	push af
   5+ 97AC E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 97AE 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 97AF 3A 61 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 97B2 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 97B3 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 97B4 BB           	cp e
  11+ 97B5 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 97B7 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 97B9 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 97BB EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 97BC 3A 61 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 97BF 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 97C0 CD 18 95     	call asm_div16
  18+ 97C3 F1           	pop af
  19+ 97C4 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 97C6 B5           	or l
  21+ 97C7 C9           	ret
  22+ 97C8              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 97C8 F1           	pop af
  24+ 97C9 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 97CB F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 97CD C9           	ret
  27+ 97CE
  28+ 97CE
  29+ 97CE              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 97CE              squareregfx:
  31+ 97CE 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 97D1 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 97D2 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 97D3 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 97D5 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 97D6              squareregfy:
  37+ 97D6 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 97D9 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 97DA 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 97DB ED 30        	mul
  41+ 97DD 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 97DE              squareregfz:
  43+ 97DE 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 97E1 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 97E2 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 97E3 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 97E5 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 97E6 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 97E7              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 97E7 CD 16 93     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 97EA E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 97EB E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 97EC E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 97ED              normfx:
  55+ 97ED 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 97F0 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 97F1 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 97F2 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 97F3 CD AB 97     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 97F6 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 97F9              normfy:
  62+ 97F9 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 97FC E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 97FD 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 97FE 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 97FF CD AB 97     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9802 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 9805              normfz:
  69+ 9805 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9808 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9809 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 980A 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 980B CD AB 97     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 980E 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9811              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9811 C9           	ret
  77+ 9812
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1005  9812                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9812              ; Input:
   2+ 9812              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9812              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9812              ; Output:
   5+ 9812              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9812              ;
   7+ 9812              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9812              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9812              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9812              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9812              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9812              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9812              ;
  14+ 9812
  15+ 9812
  16+ 9812 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 9813 A7                               and     a
  18+ 9814 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9816 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 9818 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9819 C9                               ret
  22+ 981A
  23+ 981A E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 981B A7                               and     a
  25+ 981C 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 981E ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9820 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9821 C9                               ret
  29+ 9822
  30+ 9822
  31+ 9822              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9822              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9822 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 9823 AA                               xor d
  35+ 9824 FA 2E 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 9827 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9829 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 982B 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 982C                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 982C 37          >                        scf
  40+ 982D C9                               ret
  41+ 982E CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9830 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9832              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9832 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 9833 C9                               ret
  45+ 9834 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 9835                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 9835 B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9836 C9                               ret
  48+ 9837              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 9837 37          >                        scf
  49+ 9838 C9                               ret
  50+ 9839
  51+ 9839              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9839 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 983A BA                               cp  d
  54+ 983B C0                               ret nz
  55+ 983C 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 983D BB                               cp  e
  57+ 983E C9                               ret
  58+ 983F
  59+ 983F
  60+ 983F
  61+ 983F 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9840 A8                               xor b
  63+ 9841 FA 4A 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9844 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9846 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 9848              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 9848 37          >                        scf
  67+ 9849 C9                               ret
  68+ 984A CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 984C 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 984E              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 984E B7          >                        or a
  71+ 984F C9                               ret
  72+ 9850
  73+ 9850              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 9850 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 9851 A7                               and     a
  76+ 9852 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9854 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 9855 C9                               ret
  79+ 9856              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 9856 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 9857 A7                               and     a
  82+ 9858 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 985A E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 985B C9                               ret
  85+ 985C
  86+ 985C              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 985C              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 985C
  89+ 985C E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 985E 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 985F E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 9861 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 9862 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 9863 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 9865 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9866 A7                               and     a
  97+ 9867 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 9869 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 986B C9                               ret
 100+ 986C
 101+ 986C
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1006  986C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 986C              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 986C
   3+ 986C
   4+ 986C
   5+ 986C              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
   6+ 986C 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
   7+ 986F DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
   8+ 9871 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   9+ 9873              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   9+ 9873 5F          >			ld	e,a
   9+ 9874 57          >			ld  d,a
   9+ 9875 ED 30       >			mul
  10+ 9877 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  11+ 9878 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  12+ 9879 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  13+ 987C DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  14+ 987E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  15+ 9880                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  15+ 9880 5F          >			ld	e,a
  15+ 9881 57          >			ld  d,a
  15+ 9882 ED 30       >			mul
  16+ 9884 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  17+ 9885 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  18+ 9888 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  19+ 988A E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  20+ 988C                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  20+ 988C 5F          >			ld	e,a
  20+ 988D 57          >			ld  d,a
  20+ 988E ED 30       >			mul
  21+ 9890 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  22+ 9891 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  23+ 9892 CD 16 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  24+ 9895 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  25+ 9898 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  26+ 989A 4F                                   ld		c,a
  27+ 989B 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  28+ 989C CD 2F 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  29+ 989F 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  30+ 98A0 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  31+ 98A2 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  32+ 98A4 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  33+ 98A5 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  34+ 98A8 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  35+ 98AB E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  36+ 98AD 4F                                   ld		c,a
  37+ 98AE 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  38+ 98AF CD 2F 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  39+ 98B2 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  40+ 98B3 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  41+ 98B5 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  42+ 98B7 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  43+ 98B8 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  44+ 98BB 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  45+ 98BE E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  46+ 98C0 4F                                   ld		c,a
  47+ 98C1 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  48+ 98C2 CD 2F 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  49+ 98C5 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  50+ 98C6 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  51+ 98C8 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  52+ 98CA B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  53+ 98CB 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  54+ 98CE C9                                   ret
  55+ 98CF
  56+ 98CF              ; Normalise vector
  57+ 98CF              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  58+ 98CF              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  59+ 98CF              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  60+ 98CF              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  61+ 98CF
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1007  98CF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 98CF              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 98CF              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 98CF              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 98CF              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 98CF              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 98CF              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 98CF              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 98CF 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 98D2 CD E8 98     	call	Num1
  10+ 98D5 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 98D8 CD E8 98     	call	Num1
  12+ 98DB 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 98DE CD E8 98     	call	Num1
  14+ 98E1 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 98E3 CD E8 98     	call	Num1
  16+ 98E6 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 98E8              Num1:
  18+ 98E8 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 98EA              .Num2:
  20+ 98EA 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 98EB 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 98EC 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 98EE ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 98F0 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 98F1 13           	inc	de
  26+ 98F2 C9           	ret
  27+ 98F3
  28+ 98F3              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 98F3 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 98F5 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 98F6 C3 CF 98     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 98F9
  33+ 98F9              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 98F9 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 98FB 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 98FC 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 98FF CD 0F 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9902 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9904 CD E8 98     	call	Num1
  40+ 9907 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9909 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ 990A 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ 990B 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ 990D 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ 990F              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ 990F 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ 9911              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ 9911 3C           	inc	a
  49+ 9912 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ 9913 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ 9915 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ 9917 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ 9919              .Blank:
  54+ 9919 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ 991B              .DontBlank:
  56+ 991B ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ 991D 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ 991E 13           	inc	de
  59+ 991F C9           	ret
  60+ 9920
  61+ 9920              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ 9920 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ 9922 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ 9924 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ 9926 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ 9927 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ 992A CD 36 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ 992D 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ 992F CD 36 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ 9932 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ 9934 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ 9936              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ 9936 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ 9938              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ 9938 3C           	inc	a
  76+ 9939 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ 993A 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ 993C FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ 993E 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ 9940              .Blank:
  81+ 9940 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ 9942              .DontBlank:
  83+ 9942 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ 9944 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ 9945 13           	inc	de
  86+ 9946 C9           	ret
  87+ 9947              .NoStock:
  88+ 9947 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ 9949 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ 994A 13           	inc	de
  91+ 994B 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ 994C 13           	inc	de
  93+ 994D 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ 994F 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ 9950 13           	inc de
  96+ 9951 C9           	ret
  97+ 9952
  98+ 9952
  99+ 9952              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ 9952              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ 9952              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ 9952              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ 9952 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ 9956 0A 00 00 00
 103+ 995A 64 00 00 00
 103+ 995E E8 03 00 00
 103+ 9962 10 27 00 00
 104+ 9966 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ 996A 40 42 0F 00
 104+ 996E 80 96 98 00
 104+ 9972 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ 9976 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ 997A 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ 997E
 107+ 997E              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ 997E CD 8D 99     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ 9981 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ 9984 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ 9987 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ 9989 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ 998C C9                                   ret
 114+ 998D
 115+ 998D DD 22 7A 99  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ 9991 ED 53 7C 99                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ 9995 DD 21 76 99                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ 9999 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ 999B 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ 999D 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ 999F B7                                   or a
 122+ 99A0 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ 99A3 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ 99A6 2A 7A 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ 99A9 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ 99AB 22 7A 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ 99AE DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ 99B1 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ 99B4 2A 7C 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ 99B7 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ 99B9 22 7C 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ 99BC 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ 99BE 0C                                   inc c
 134+ 99BF 3C                                   inc a
 135+ 99C0 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ 99C2 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ 99C5 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ 99C8 2A 7A 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ 99CB 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ 99CC 22 7A 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ 99CF DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ 99D2 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ 99D5 2A 7C 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ 99D8 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ 99DA 22 7C 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ 99DD 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ 99E0 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ 99E2 0C                                   inc c
 149+ 99E3 0D                                   dec c
 150+ 99E4 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ 99E6 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ 99E9 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ 99EB 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ 99ED 3A 7A 99                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ 99F0 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ 99F2 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ 99F5 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ 99F9 C9                                   ret
 159+ 99FA
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1008  99FA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 99FA              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 99FA BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 99FB D2 16 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 99FE 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9A00 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9A02                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9A02 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9A03 DA 19 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9A06 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9A07 37                                   scf
   7+ 9A08 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9A0A 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9A0C 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9A0D CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9A0F CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9A11 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9A12 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9A14 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9A15 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9A16 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9A18 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9A19 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9A1A CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9A1C 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9A1E C3 0C 9A                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9A21
  23+ 9A21
  24+ 9A21              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9A21              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9A21              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9A21 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9A23 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9A25 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9A27 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9A29              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9A29              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9A29              TIS2:
  34+ 9A29 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9A2A 3A 61 7E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9A2D 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9A2E 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9A2F              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9A2F 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9A30 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9A31 CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9A33 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9A35              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9A35 B7               or          a
  45+ 9A36 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9A38
  47+ 9A38 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9A39 E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9A3B CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9A3D 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9A3E 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9A3F E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9A41 B0               or          b
  54+ 9A42 C3 46 9A         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9A45              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9A45 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9A46              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9A46 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9A47 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9A49              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9A49 BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9A4A D2 6A 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9A4D 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9A4F              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9A4F CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9A51              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9A51 BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9A52 DA 70 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9A55 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9A56 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9A57 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9A59 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9A5B              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9A5B 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9A5C CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9A5E CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9A60 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9A61 CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9A63 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9A64 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9A65 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9A66 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9A68 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9A69 C9           	ret
  81+ 9A6A              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9A6A              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9A6A 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9A6B E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9A6D F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9A6F C9           	ret
  87+ 9A70              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9A70              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9A70 B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9A71 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9A73 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9A75 C3 5B 9A     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9A78
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1009  9A78                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9A78              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9A78              fmltu:
   3+ 9A78 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9A79 3A 61 7E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9A7C 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9A7D ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9A7F 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9A80 C9                                   ret
   9+ 9A81
  10+ 9A81 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9A82 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9A84 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9A85 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9A86
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1010  9A86                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9A86              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9A86              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9A86 21 F8 7F     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9A89 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9A8B ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9A8D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9A8E C3 9A 9A     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9A91              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9A91 21 F8 7F     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9A94 3A 4C 7D     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9A97 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9A99 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9A9A              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9A9A 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9A9B 3A 5B 7E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9A9E              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9A9E 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9AA0 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9AA2 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9AA3 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9AA4              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9AA4 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9AA6 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9AA8 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9AA9 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9AAB              DV8:
  27+ 9AAB 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9AAC 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9AAD              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9AAD CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9AAF 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9AB1              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9AB1              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9AB1 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9AB3 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9AB4              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9AB4 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9AB6 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9AB8 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9AB9 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9ABB              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9ABB 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9ABC              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9ABC CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9ABE 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9AC0 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9AC1 32 62 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9AC4 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9AC5 32 62 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9AC8 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9AC9              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9AC9 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9ACA 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9ACB CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9ACD 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9ACF 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9AD0 32 62 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9AD3 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9AD4 32 62 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9AD7 C9           		ret
  61+ 9AD8              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9AD8 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9ADA 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9ADB 32 62 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9ADE 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9ADF 32 62 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9AE2 C9           		ret
  68+ 9AE3
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm

   2+ 9AE3              asm_defmutl:
   3+ 9AE3              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ 9AE3              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ 9AE3 ED 30        	mul
   6+ 9AE5 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low

   9+ 9AE7

1012  9AE7
1013  9AE7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9AE7              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9AE7              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9AE7              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9AE7 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9AE9 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9AEB 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9AEC 3A 61 7E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9AEF 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9AF0 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9AF2 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9AF4 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9AF5 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9AF7 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9AF8 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9AF9 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9AFB 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9AFC 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9AFD E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9AFF 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9B00 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9B02 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9B03 32 62 7D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9B06 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9B07 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9B08 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9B09 C9           	ret
  27+ 9B0A              .mul0:
  28+ 9B0A AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9B0B 32 62 7D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9B0E 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9B0F 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9B10 C9           	ret
  33+ 9B11
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1014  9B11                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9B11              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9B11              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9B11              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9B11              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9B11              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9B11              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9B11              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9B11              LL38:
   9+ 9B11              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9B11              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9B11              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9B11              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9B11              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9B11              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9B11              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9B11              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9B11              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9B11              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9B11              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9B11              ;	ret
  21+ 9B11              ; calculation table
  22+ 9B11              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9B11              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9B11              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9B11              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9B11              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9B11              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9B11              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9B11              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9B11              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9B11
  32+ 9B11              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9B11              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9B11              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9B11              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9B11
  37+ 9B11
  38+ 9B11              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9B11 21 63 7E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9B14 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9B15 FA 20 9B     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9B18 3A 61 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9B1B 21 62 7E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9B1E 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9B1F C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9B20              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9B20 3A 62 7E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9B23 21 61 7E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9B26              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9B26              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9B26 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9B27 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9B28 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9B2A              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9B2A              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9B2A              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9B2A C9           	ret
  57+ 9B2B              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9B2B FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9B2D 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9B2F ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9B31 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9B32 3A 63 7E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9B35 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9B37 32 63 7E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9B3A 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9B3B                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9B3B B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9B3C C9           	ret
  68+ 9B3D              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9B3D 32 63 7E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9B40                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9B40 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9B41 C9               ret
  72+ 9B42              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9B42              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9B42              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9B42              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9B42              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9B42              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9B42              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9B42              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9B42              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9B42              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9B42              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9B42              ;--	ret
  84+ 9B42
  85+ 9B42              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9B42              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9B42              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9B42              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9B42              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9B42              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9B42              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9B42              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9B42              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9B42              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9B42              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9B42              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9B42              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9B42              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9B42              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9B42              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9B42              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9B42              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9B42              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9B42              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9B42              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9B42              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9B42              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9B42              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9B42              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9B42              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9B42              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9B42              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9B42              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9B42              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9B42              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9B42              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9B42              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9B42              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9B42              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9B42              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9B42              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9B42              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9B42              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9B42              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9B42
 142+ 9B42
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1015  9B42              ;;DEFUNCT    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
1016  9B42
1017  9B42                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9B42              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9B42              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9B42              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9B42              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9B42              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9B42              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9B42              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9B42              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9B42              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9B42              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9B42              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9B42              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9B42              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9B42              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9B42              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9B42              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9B42              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9B42              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9B42              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9B42              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9B42              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9B42              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9B42              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9B42              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9B42              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9B42              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9B42              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9B42              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9B42              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9B42
  40+ 9B42              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9B42 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9B43 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9B44 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9B46              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9B46 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9B47 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9B48 C8             ret z
  48+ 9B49 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9B4C 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9B4E              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9B4E ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9B50 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9B51 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9B53 C9             ret
  55+ 9B54
  56+ 9B54              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9B54              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9B54              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9B54              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9B54 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9B56 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9B57              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9B57 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9B58 17                   rla
  65+ 9B59 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9B5A 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9B5C 91                   sub c
  68+ 9B5D 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9B5E              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9B5E 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9B60 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9B61 32 62 7E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9B64 C9                   ret
  74+ 9B65
  75+ 9B65
  76+ 9B65
  77+ 9B65              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9B65              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9B65              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9B65 F5           		push	af
  81+ 9B66 3A 61 7E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9B69 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9B6A F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9B6B FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9B6D CA 84 9B     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9B70              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9B70 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9B72 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9B73              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9B73 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9B75 AF           		xor a
  92+ 9B76              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9B76 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9B77 17           		rla
  95+ 9B78 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9B79 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9B7B 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9B7C 91           		sub c
  99+ 9B7D              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9B7D 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9B7F 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9B80 32 62 7E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9B83 C9           		ret
 104+ 9B84              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9B84 32 62 7E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9B87 C9           		ret
 107+ 9B88              ;	push	af
 108+ 9B88              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9B88              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9B88              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9B88              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9B88              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9B88              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9B88              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9B88              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9B88              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9B88              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9B88              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9B88              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9B88              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9B88              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9B88              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9B88              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9B88              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9B88              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9B88              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9B88              ;	scf
 128+ 9B88              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9B88              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9B88              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9B88              ;LL2:
 132+ 9B88              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9B88              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9B88              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9B88              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9B88              ;	ret
 137+ 9B88
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1018  9B88                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9B88              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9B88              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9B88              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9B88 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9B89 3A 61 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9B8C FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9B8E 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9B90 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9B91 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9B93 AF               xor a
  11+ 9B94              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9B94 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9B96 17               rla
  14+ 9B97 BA               cp d
  15+ 9B98 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9B9A 0C               inc c
  17+ 9B9B 92               sub d
  18+ 9B9C              LL64:
  19+ 9B9C 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9B9E 32 60 7E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9BA1 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9BA2 32 62 7E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9BA5 C9               ret
  24+ 9BA6              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9BA6 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9BA8 32 62 7E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9BAB 32 60 7E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9BAE C9           	ret
  29+ 9BAF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
1019  9BAF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9BAF              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9BAF              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9BAF              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9BAF CD E7 9A     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9BB2 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9BB3 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9BB4 32 63 7E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9BB7 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9BB8 32 62 7E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9BBB 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9BBC C9           	ret
  12+ 9BBD
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm

1023  9C4D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ 9C4D              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9C4D              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ 9C4D              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ 9C4D              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9C4D              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ 9C4D              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14
   7+ 9C4D              ;rotmap1xLo: DB	0				; INWK +15
   8+ 9C4D              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ 9C4D              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ 9C4D              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ 9C4D              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ 9C4D              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ 9C4D              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26
  19+ 9C4D              ;
  20+ 9C4D              ;rotmatFx	equ	rotmat0xHi
  21+ 9C4D              ;rotmatFy	equ	rotmat0yHi
  22+ 9C4D              ;rotmatFz	equ	rotmat0zHi
  23+ 9C4D              ;rotmatUx	equ	rotmat1xHi
  24+ 9C4D              ;rotmatUy	equ	rotmat1yHi
  25+ 9C4D              ;rotmatUz	equ	rotmat1zHi
  26+ 9C4D              ;
  27+ 9C4D              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ 9C4D
  29+ 9C4D
  30+ 9C4D
  31+ 9C4D
  32+ 9C4D              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9C4D
  34+ 9C4D              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9C4D              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9C4D              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9C4D
  38+ 9C4D
  39+ 9C4D 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9C50 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9C53 E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9C55 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9C57 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9C58 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9C59 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9C5B 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9C5D 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9C5E E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9C60 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9C62 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9C63 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9C64 ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9C66 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9C67 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9C68 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9C6A DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9C6C 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9C6D 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9C6E ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9C70 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9C71 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9C72 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9C73 CD 16 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9C76 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9C77 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9C79 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9C7B CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9C7E 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9C7F 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9C82 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9C84 B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9C85 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9C88 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9C8A 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9C8B CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9C8E 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9C8F 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9C92 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9C94 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9C95 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9C98 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9C9A 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9C9B CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9C9E 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9C9F 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9CA2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9CA4 B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9CA5 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9CA8 C9                                   ret
  90+ 9CA9
  91+ 9CA9              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9CA9                                      ENDM
  96+ 9CA9              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9CA9 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9CA9                                      ENDM
 101+ 9CA9
 102+ 9CA9
 103+ 9CA9              TidyUbnK:               ;break
 104+ 9CA9                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 104+ 9CA9 CD BD 9B    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 104+ 9CAC CD 4D 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ 9CAF CD F6 9B    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 105+ 9CB2 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 106+ 9CB5 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ 9CB7 C2 4F 9D                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ 9CBA 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ 9CBD E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ 9CBF 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9CC1              ;...roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 112+ 9CC1 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ 9CC4 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 114+ 9CC7 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 115+ 9CCA CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 116+ 9CCD 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 117+ 9CD0 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 118+ 9CD3 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 119+ 9CD6 CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 120+ 9CD9 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ 9CDA EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ 9CDC 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ 9CDD 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ 9CE0 32 61 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ 9CE3 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ 9CE4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ 9CE6 B3                                   or      e
 128+ 9CE7 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ 9CE9 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ 9CEB                                      ZeroA
 130+ 9CEB AF          >                        xor a
 131+ 9CEC C3 49 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ 9CEF FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 133+ 9CF1 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 134+ 9CF3 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 135+ 9CF5 B2                                   or      d
 136+ 9CF6 C3 49 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 137+ 9CF9 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 138+ 9CFA 32 62 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 139+ 9CFD 7A                                   ld      a,d
 140+ 9CFE CD 5E 93                             call    DVIDT
 141+ 9D01 78                                   ld      a,b
 142+ 9D02 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ 9D05 C3 93 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof
 144+ 9D08              ;...roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 145+ 9D08 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 146+ 9D0B 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 147+ 9D0E 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 148+ 9D11 CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 149+ 9D14 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 150+ 9D17 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 151+ 9D1A 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 152+ 9D1D CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 153+ 9D20 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 154+ 9D21 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 155+ 9D23 57                                   ld      d,a
 156+ 9D24 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 157+ 9D27 32 61 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 158+ 9D2A 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 159+ 9D2B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 160+ 9D2D B3                                   or      e
 161+ 9D2E FE 00                                cp      0
 162+ 9D30 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 163+ 9D32                                      ZeroA
 163+ 9D32 AF          >                        xor a
 164+ 9D33 C3 49 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 165+ 9D36 FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 166+ 9D38 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 167+ 9D3A 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 168+ 9D3C B2                                   or      d
 169+ 9D3D C3 49 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 170+ 9D40 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 171+ 9D41 32 62 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 172+ 9D44 7A                                   ld      a,d
 173+ 9D45 CD 5E 93                             call    DVIDT
 174+ 9D48 78                                   ld      a,b
 175+ 9D49 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 176+ 9D4C C3 93 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ 9D4F              ;...roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 178+ 9D4F 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ 9D52 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 180+ 9D55 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 181+ 9D58 CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 182+ 9D5B 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 183+ 9D5E 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 184+ 9D61 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 185+ 9D64 CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 186+ 9D67 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 187+ 9D68 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 188+ 9D6A 57                                   ld      d,a
 189+ 9D6B 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ 9D6E 32 61 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 191+ 9D71 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 192+ 9D72 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 193+ 9D74 B3                                   or      e
 194+ 9D75 FE 00                                cp      0
 195+ 9D77 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 196+ 9D79                                      ZeroA
 196+ 9D79 AF          >                        xor a
 197+ 9D7A C3 49 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 198+ 9D7D FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 199+ 9D7F 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 200+ 9D81 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 201+ 9D83 B2                                   or      d
 202+ 9D84 C3 90 9D                             jp      .SetRoofX
 203+ 9D87 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 204+ 9D88 32 62 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 205+ 9D8B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 206+ 9D8C CD 5E 93                             call    DVIDT
 207+ 9D8F 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ 9D90 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 209+ 9D93              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 209+ 9D93 CD D0 9B    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 209+ 9D96 CD 4D 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 209+ 9D99 CD 13 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9D9C              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9D9C 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9D9F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9DA1 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9DA4 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ 9DA7 CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 216+ 9DAA 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 217+ 9DAD 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 218+ 9DB0 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ 9DB3 CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9DB6 CD A6 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9DB9 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9DBA 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9DBD              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9DBD 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ 9DC0 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ 9DC2 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9DC5 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9DC8 CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ 9DCB 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ 9DCE 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 231+ 9DD1 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 232+ 9DD4 CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 233+ 9DD7 CD A6 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ 9DDA 78                                   ld      a,b
 235+ 9DDB 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 236+ 9DDE              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 237+ 9DDE 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 238+ 9DE1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ 9DE3 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 240+ 9DE6 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 241+ 9DE9 CD AF 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 242+ 9DEC 3A 36 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 243+ 9DEF 32 61 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 244+ 9DF2 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ 9DF5 CD 92 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ 9DF8 CD A6 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ 9DFB 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ 9DFC 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ 9DFF                                      ZeroA
 249+ 9DFF AF          >                        xor a
 250+ 9E00 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 251+ 9E03 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 252+ 9E06 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 253+ 9E09 C9                                   ret
 254+ 9E0A
 255+ 9E0A
 256+ 9E0A              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9E0A              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9E0A              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9E0A 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9E0B 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9E0C 32 61 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9E0F 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9E10 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9E12 CD 70 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9E15              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9E15              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9E15              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9E15 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9E16 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9E18 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9E19 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9E1A E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9E1C 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9E1E              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9E1E CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9E20              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9E20 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9E22 DA 2F 9E    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9E25 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9E27 37           		scf
 279+ 9E28 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9E2A 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9E2C              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9E2C 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9E2D B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9E2E C9           		ret
 285+ 9E2F              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9E2F B7           	or			a
 287+ 9E30 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9E32 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9E34 C3 2C 9E     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9E37
 291+ 9E37              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9E37              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz

 302+ 9E40              TidyRotXSmall:

 323+ 9E60 CD F6 9B     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 324+ 9E63              .CheckNXSmall:

 327+ 9E68 CA 40 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall

 331+ 9E71              NormaliseRoofV:

 334+ 9E77              ;calc sidev x

 336+ 9E7A 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 337+ 9E7D 32 61 7E     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 338+ 9E80 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 339+ 9E83 CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA

 341+ 9E89 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 342+ 9E8A 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 343+ 9E8D CD 0A 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 344+ 9E90                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 344+ 9E90 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 344+ 9E91 CA 96 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ 9E94 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 346+ 9E96              NormSideXNoNeg:

 352+ 9EA2 CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 353+ 9EA5 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x

 355+ 9EA9 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z

 365+ 9EC1 CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 366+ 9EC4 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y

 370+ 9ECE                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 370+ 9ECE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 370+ 9ECF CA D4 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg

 372+ 9ED4              NormSideZNoNeg:
 373+ 9ED4 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 374+ 9ED7              .ClearLoBytes:
 375+ 9ED7 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ 9EDA 06 09        		ld		b,9
 377+ 9EDC AF                   xor     a
 378+ 9EDD              .ClearLoLoop:
 379+ 9EDD 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 380+ 9EDE 23           		inc		hl
 381+ 9EDF 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9EE0 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 383+ 9EE2 CD E3 9B     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 384+ 9EE5 CD 6C 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof

 391+ 9EEC              CalcRoofvX:
 392+ 9EEC              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 393+ 9EEC              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 393+ 9EEC 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 393+ 9EEF 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 394+ 9EF2 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 395+ 9EF5 CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 396+ 9EF8              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 396+ 9EF8 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 396+ 9EFB 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 397+ 9EFE 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 398+ 9F01 CD 70 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs

 400+ 9F05 E6 80        		and 	$80
 401+ 9F07 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
