 403+ 9F09 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 404+ 9F0C 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 405+ 9F0D E6 80        		and		$80
 406+ 9F0F FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 407+ 9F11 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 408+ 9F13 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 409+ 9F14 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 410+ 9F16 42           		ld		b,d
 411+ 9F17 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 412+ 9F18 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 413+ 9F19 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 414+ 9F1B CD 66 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 415+ 9F1E FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 416+ 9F20 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 417+ 9F22 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 418+ 9F24 B0           		or		b
 419+ 9F25 C9           		ret
 420+ 9F26
 421+ 9F26
 422+ 9F26              CalcRoofvY:
 423+ 9F26              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 424+ 9F26              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 424+ 9F26 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 424+ 9F29 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 425+ 9F2C 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 426+ 9F2F CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 427+ 9F32              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 427+ 9F32 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 427+ 9F35 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 428+ 9F38 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 429+ 9F3B CD 70 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 430+ 9F3E 7A           		ld		a,d
 431+ 9F3F E6 80        		and 	$80
 432+ 9F41 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 433+ 9F43 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 434+ 9F46 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 435+ 9F47 E6 80        		and		$80
 436+ 9F49 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 437+ 9F4B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 438+ 9F4D 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 439+ 9F4E E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 440+ 9F50 42           		ld		b,d
 441+ 9F51 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 442+ 9F52 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 443+ 9F53 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 444+ 9F55 CD 66 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 445+ 9F58 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 446+ 9F5A EE 80        		xor		$80
 447+ 9F5C E6 80        		and		$80
 448+ 9F5E B0           		or		b
 449+ 9F5F C9           		ret
 450+ 9F60
 451+ 9F60              CalcRoofvZ:
 452+ 9F60              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 453+ 9F60              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 453+ 9F60 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 453+ 9F63 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454+ 9F66 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 455+ 9F69 CD AF 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 456+ 9F6C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 456+ 9F6C 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 456+ 9F6F 32 61 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 457+ 9F72 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 458+ 9F75 CD 70 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 459+ 9F78 7A           		ld		a,d
 460+ 9F79 E6 80        		and 	$80
 461+ 9F7B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 462+ 9F7D 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 463+ 9F80 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 464+ 9F81 E6 80        		and		$80
 465+ 9F83 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 466+ 9F85 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 467+ 9F87 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 468+ 9F88 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 469+ 9F8A 42           		ld		b,d
 470+ 9F8B 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 471+ 9F8C 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 472+ 9F8D 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 473+ 9F8F CD 66 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 474+ 9F92 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 475+ 9F94 EE 80        		xor		$80
 476+ 9F96 E6 80        		and		$80
 477+ 9F98 B0           		or		b
 478+ 9F99 C9           		ret
 479+ 9F9A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1024  9F9A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ 9F9A
   2+ 9F9A              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ 9F9A BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ 9F9B D2 B9 9F    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ 9F9E 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ 9FA0 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ 9FA2 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ 9FA4                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ 9FA4 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ 9FA5 DA AA 9F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ 9FA8 92                                   sub     d
   8+ 9FA9                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ 9FA9 B7          >                        or a
   9+ 9FAA 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ 9FAB CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ 9FAD 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ 9FAF 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ 9FB0 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9FB1 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ 9FB2 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ 9FB3 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ 9FB5 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ 9FB7 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ 9FB8 C9                                   ret
  20+ 9FB9 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ 9FBB C9                                   ret
  22+ 9FBC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1025  9FBC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ 9FBC              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ 9FBC              TIS1:
   3+ 9FBC 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ 9FBD 3A 4B 7D     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ 9FC0 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ 9FC1 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ 9FC2              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ 9FC2 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ 9FC3 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ 9FC4 32 61 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ 9FC7 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ 9FC8 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ 9FCA CD 70 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ 9FCD              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ 9FCD              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ 9FCD              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ 9FCD 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ 9FCE E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ 9FD0 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ 9FD1 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ 9FD2 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ 9FD4 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ 9FD6 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ 9FD7              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ 9FD7 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ 9FD9 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ 9FDB 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ 9FDD DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ 9FDF              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ 9FDF CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ 9FE1 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ 9FE3 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ 9FE4 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ 9FE5 C9           		ret
  35+ 9FE6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  30+ 9FEA 16 A0 17 A0
  30+ 9FEE 18 A0
  31+ 9FF0 19 A0 1A A0                        DW    ThargoidAI, NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI
  31+ 9FF4 1A A0 1A A0
  31+ 9FF8 1A A0
  32+ 9FFA              ShipAiJumpTableMax:   EQU ($ - ShipAIJumpTable)/2
  33+ 9FFA

  35+ 9FFA
  36+ 9FFA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ 9FFA              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  38+ 9FFA              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS
  39+ 9FFA 21 90 69                            ld      hl,TidyCounter
  40+ 9FFD 35                                  dec     (hl)
  41+ 9FFE                                     ;call     z,TidyUbnK  ;TODO SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE
  42+ 9FFE                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  43+ 9FFE 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  44+ A000 32 90 69                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  45+ A003                                     ;call    TidyUbnK
  46+ A003                                     ; add AI in here too
  47+ A003 3A 0D C4                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  48+ A006                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  48+ A006 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  48+ A008 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  49+ A009 21 E6 9F                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  50+ A00C ED 31                               add      hl,a
  51+ A00E ED 31                               add      hl,a
  52+ A010 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  53+ A011 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  54+ A012 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  55+ A013 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  56+ A014 E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  57+ A015 C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this
  58+ A016
  59+ A016
  60+ A016
  61+ A016              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
  62+ A016
  63+ A016
  64+ A016 C9           StationAI:              ret
  65+ A017 C9           JunkAI:                 ret
  66+ A018 C9           ScoopableAI:            ret
  67+ A019 C9           ThargoidAI:             ret
  68+ A01A C9           NoAI:                   ret
  69+ A01B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ A01B              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  71+ A01B ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  72+ A01B                                      ENDIF
  73+ A01B 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  74+ A01E 47                                   ld      b,a
  75+ A01F E6 02                                and     %00000010
  76+ A021 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  77+ A023 78                                   ld      a,b
  78+ A024 E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  79+ A026 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  80+ A029 B6                                   or      (hl)
  81+ A02A 47                                   ld      b,a
  82+ A02B 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  83+ A02E E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  84+ A030 B0                                   or      b
  85+ A031 47                                   ld      b,a
  86+ A032 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  87+ A035                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  87+ A035 FE 40       >                        cp      64
  87+ A037 DA 3E A0    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  88+ A03A 78                                   ld      a,b
  89+ A03B F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  90+ A03D 47                                   ld      b,a
  91+ A03E 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  92+ A03F 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  93+ A042 C9                                   ret
  94+ A043 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  95+ A045 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  96+ A048 C9                                   ret
  97+ A049              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  98+ A049              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
  99+ A049 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 100+ A04C                                      ;break
 101+ A04C                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 101+ A04C 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 101+ A04F FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 101+ A051 CA 70 A0    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 102+ A054 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 103+ A056 C4 AA A0                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 104+ A059 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 105+ A05C                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 105+ A05C CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 105+ A05E C8          >                        ret		z
 106+ A05F 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 107+ A060                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 107+ A060 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 107+ A062 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 108+ A065 CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 109+ A067 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 110+ A06A 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 111+ A06D                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 111+ A06D E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 111+ A06F C8          >                        ret     z
 112+ A070 CD 1A C6     .SetNewbHostile:        call    SetShipHostile
 113+ A073 C9                                   ret
 114+ A074
 115+ A074              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 116+ A074 C9           MissileDidHitUs:        ret ; TODO
 117+ A075
 118+ A075              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 119+ A075              PlayerHitByMissile:     MMUSelectLayer1
 119+ A075 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 120+ A079 3E 05                                ld      a,L1ColourInkCyan
 121+ A07B CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 122+ A07E 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileBlastDamage)
 123+ A081 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; b = damage
 124+ A082 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 125+ A085 E6 80                                and     $80
 126+ A087 20 0A                                jr      nz,.HitRear
 127+ A089 3A 8F 81     .HitFront:              ld      a,(ForeShield)
 128+ A08C CD 4A 65                             call    ApplyDamage
 129+ A08F 32 8F 81                             ld      (ForeShield),a
 130+ A092 C9                                   ret
 131+ A093 3A 90 81     .HitRear:               ld      a,(AftShield)
 132+ A096 CD 4A 65                             call    ApplyDamage
 133+ A099 32 90 81                             ld      (AftShield),a
 134+ A09C C9                                   ret; TODO , do hit set up blast radius etc
 135+ A09D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 136+ A09D              MissileHitShipA:        MMUSelectLayer1
 136+ A09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 137+ A0A1 3E 02                                ld      a,L1ColourInkRed
 138+ A0A3 CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 139+ A0A6 CD 45 C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip
 140+ A0A9 C9                                   ret; TODO hit ship do explosion, check for near by and if player is near and missile type logic, e.g. AP or HE
 141+ A0AA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 142+ A0AA CD 3A 84     SetStationHostile:      call    IsSpaceStationPresent                   ; only if present
 143+ A0AD D8                                   ret     c
 144+ A0AE 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
 145+ A0B1 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 146+ A0B3                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
 146+ A0B3 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 147+ A0B7 CD 1A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 148+ A0BA FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
 149+ A0BC                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
 149+ A0BC C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 149+ A0BE ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 150+ A0C1 C9                                   ret
 151+ A0C2
 152+ A0C2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 153+ A0C2              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
 153+ A0C2 AF          >                        xor a
 154+ A0C3 32 1E 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 155+ A0C6 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
 156+ A0C9 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
 157+ A0CC 11 25 7F                             ld      de,MissileXPos
 158+ A0CF ED B0                                ldir
 159+ A0D1                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
 159+ A0D1 AF          >                        xor a
 160+ A0D2 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
 161+ A0D5 CD 92 A1                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
 162+ A0D8 DC 74 A0                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
 163+ A0DB C9                                   ret
 164+ A0DC
 165+ A0DC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 166+ A0DC              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 167+ A0DC ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 168+ A0DC ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 169+ A0DC ~                                    xor     (hl)
 170+ A0DC ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 171+ A0DC ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 172+ A0DC ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 173+ A0DC ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 174+ A0DC ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 175+ A0DC ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 176+ A0DC ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 177+ A0DC ~                                    NegHL
 178+ A0DC ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 179+ A0DC ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 180+ A0DC ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 181+ A0DC ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 182+ A0DC ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 183+ A0DC ~                                    ld      a,l
 184+ A0DC ~                                    and     a
 185+ A0DC ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 186+ A0DC                                      ENDM
 187+ A0DC              ;...................................................................
 188+ A0DC              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 189+ A0DC 3A 1E 80     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 190+ A0DF                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A0DF FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A0E1 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 191+ A0E2 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 192+ A0E4 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 193+ A0E5 32 1E 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a

   1++A268                                      DEFINE MISSILEDEBUG 1
   2++A268                                      DEFINE MISSILEDOHIT 1
   3++A268
   4++A268              MISSILEMAXACCEL         equ 3
   5++A268              MISSILEMAXDECEL         equ -3
   6++A268                                      ;DEFINE MISSILEBREAK
   7++A268              ;.. Thsi version uses new kind logic
   8++A268              ;... Now the tactics if current ship is the missile, when we enter this SelectedUniverseSlot holds slot of missile
   9++A268              MissileAIV3:            ;ld      a,(ShipAIEnabled)
  10++A268                                      ;ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr
  11++A268                                      IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
  12++A268                                          JumpIfMemTrue UBnKMissleHitToProcess, .ProcessMissileHit
  12++A268 3A 44 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKMissleHitToProcess)
  12++A26B A7          >                        and     a
  12++A26C CA CE A3    >                        jp      z, .ProcessMissileHit
  13++A26F                                      ENDIF
  14++A26F              .CheckForECM:           JumpIfMemNotZero ECMCountDown,.ECMIsActive  ; If ECM is running then kill the missile
  14++A26F 3A 76 7D    >                        ld  a,(ECMCountDown)
  14++A272 A7          >                        and a
  14++A273 C2 D7 A3    >                        jp  nz,.ECMIsActive
  15++A276              .IsMissileHostile:      IsShipHostile                               ; is missle attacking us?

  16++A27B                                      JumpIfZero .MissileTargetingShip            ; Missile is friendly then z is set else targetting us
  16++A27B CA A1 A2    >                        jp	z,.MissileTargetingShip

  20++A285 CD 9D A1                             call    MissileHitUsCheckPos

  22++A28B CD 75 A0     .MissleHitUs:           call    PlayerHitByMissile

  28++A29C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  29++A29E C3 AC A3                             jp      .NormaliseDirection
  30++A2A1              ;--- Missile is targeting other ship
  31++A2A1 3A 11 80     .MissileTargetingShip:  ld      a,(SelectedUniverseSlot)            ; we will use this quite a lot with next bank switching
  32++A2A4 C6 46        .SaveMissileBank:       add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  33++A2A6 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  34++A2A8                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  35++A2A8 32 CE A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileBank),a
  36++A2AB                                      ENDIF
  37++A2AB 3A 45 C0     .SaveTargetBank:        ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)               ; target will be used a lot too
  38++A2AE C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  39++A2B0 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                               ; save target
  40++A2B2                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  41++A2B2 32 CF A1                                 ld  (TacticsTargetBank),a
  42++A2B5                                      ENDIF
  43++A2B5              .IsMissleTargetGone:    JumpIfSlotAEmpty    .ECMIsActive            ; if the target was blown up then detonate
  43++A2B5 21 20 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  43++A2B8 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
  43++A2BA 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  43++A2BB 3C          >                        inc     a
  43++A2BC CA D7 A3    >                        jp      z,.ECMIsActive    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  43++A2BF 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  44++A2C0              ;... Note we don't have to check for impact as we already have a loop doing that
  45++A2C0              .SelectTargetShip:      SelectTargetBank
  45++A2C0 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  45++A2C2             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  45++A2C2 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  46++A2C5 3A 54 C0     .IsShipExploding:       ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                    ; check exploding status
  47++A2C8 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ; as if exploding then the missile will also explode
  48++A2CA 28 08                                jr      z,.UpdateTargetingShipX
  49++A2CC              .ShipIsExploding:       SelectMissileBank                           ; get missile back into memory
  49++A2CC FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  49++A2CE             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  49++A2CE ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  50++A2D1 C3 D7 A3                             jp      .ECMIsActive
  51++A2D4              ;--- At this point we already have the target banked in ready for calculating vector
  52++A2D4              ; Tactics vector = missile - target
  53++A2D4              .UpdateTargetingShipX:  IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
  54++A2D4 ~                                        break
  55++A2D4                                      ENDIF
  56++A2D4 ED 5B 20 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get target ship X
  57++A2D8 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
  58++A2DB                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  59++A2DB ED 53 01 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetX),de
  60++A2DF 32 03 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetX+2),a
  61++A2E2                                      ENDIF
  62++A2E2                                      FlipSignBitA
  62++A2E2 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  63++A2E4 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  64++A2E5                                      SelectMissileBank
  64++A2E5 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  64++A2E7             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  64++A2E7 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  65++A2EA 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
  66++A2ED 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  67++A2F0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  68++A2F0 22 E1 A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX),hl
  69++A2F3 32 E3 A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX+2),a
  70++A2F6                                      ENDIF
  71++A2F6 47                                   ld      b,a
  72++A2F7 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  73++A2FA 22 11 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
  74++A2FD 32 13 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
  75++A300              .UpdateTargetingShipY:  SelectTargetBank
  75++A300 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  75++A302             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  75++A302 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  76++A305 ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKylo)                        ; get target ship X
  77++A309 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  78++A30C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

  81++A313                                      ENDIF
  82++A313                                      FlipSignBitA
  82++A313 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  83++A315 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  84++A316                                      SelectMissileBank
  84++A316 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  84++A318             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  84++A318 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a

  86++A31E 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  87++A321                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  88++A321 22 E5 A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY),hl
  89++A324 32 E7 A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY+2),a
  90++A327                                      ENDIF
  91++A327 47                                   ld      b,a
  92++A328 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  93++A32B 22 15 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
  94++A32E 32 17 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
  95++A331              .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  SelectTargetBank
  95++A331 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  95++A333             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  95++A333 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  96++A336 ED 5B 26 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get target ship X
  97++A33A 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  98++A33D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  99++A33D ED 53 07 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetZ),de
 100++A341 32 09 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetZ+2),a
 101++A344                                      ENDIF
 102++A344                                      FlipSignBitA
 102++A344 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 103++A346 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 104++A347                                      SelectMissileBank
 104++A347 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 104++A349             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 104++A349 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 105++A34C 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 106++A34F 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 107++A352                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 108++A352 22 E9 A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ),hl
 109++A355 32 EB A1                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ+2),a
 110++A358                                      ENDIF
 111++A358
 112++A358 47                                   ld      b,a
 113++A359 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 114++A35C 22 19 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 115++A35F 32 1B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 116++A362              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 117++A362              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A362              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A362 2A 12 A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A365 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A366 ED 5B 16 A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A36A B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A36B ED 4B 1A A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A36F B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A370                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A370 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A372                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A372 C2 81 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A375 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A376 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A377 B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A378                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A378 C2 81 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A37B                                      ELSE
 132++A37B ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A37B                                      ENDIF
 134++A37B              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A37B 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A37E C3 9D A0                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A381              ;   *far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0
 138++A381              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A381 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A383             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A383 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A386                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A386 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 139++A389 A7          >                        and     a
 139++A38A C2 A7 A3    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A38D                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A38D 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A390 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A392 DA A7 A3    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 141++A395                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 141++A395 3A 76 7D    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 141++A398 A7          >                        and     a
 141++A399 C2 A7 A3    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 142++A39C 3A 59 7D     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A39F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A39F FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A3A1 D2 A7 A3    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A3A4              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A3A4 C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A3A7              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A3A7              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A3A7              .NoECM:
 149++A3A7                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A3A7                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A3A7              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A3A7              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A3A7                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A3A7 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A3A9             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A3A9 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A3AC                                      ;break
 155++A3AC                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A3AC              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A3AC ~                                        break
 158++A3AC                                      ENDIF
 159++A3AC CD 0B A9                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A3AF                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A3AF CD D2 A7                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A3B2                                      ENDIF
 163++A3B2              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A3B2 3A 13 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A3B5 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A3B7 32 13 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A3BA                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A3BA 3A 17 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A3BD EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A3BF 32 17 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A3C2                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A3C2 3A 1B A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A3C5 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A3C7 32 1B A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A3CA CD E1 A3                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A3CD C9                                   ret
 168++A3CE 3A 1E 80     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A3D1                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A3D1 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A3D3 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A3D4 C3 C2 A0     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A3D7                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A3D7 CD 45 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A3DA                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A3DA AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A3DB 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A3DE C3 CE A3                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A3E1                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A3E1
 177++A3E1 CD 17 A8     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A3E4 32 D4 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A3E7 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A3EA 32 D8 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A3ED CD 6D A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A3F0 32 D7 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A3F3 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A3F6 32 D8 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A3F9 CD 03 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A3FC CD 27 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A3FF CD 55 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A402 C9                                   ret
 189++A403
 190++A403              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A403 2A D7 A1                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A406 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A407 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A409 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A40B 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A40C 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A40D CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A40F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A40F FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A411 D2 1D A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A414                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A414 AF          >                        xor a
 200++A415 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A416 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A419                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A419 32 64 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A41C                                      ENDIF
 205++A41C C9                                   ret
 206++A41D 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A41F B4                                   or      h
 208++A420 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A423                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A423 32 64 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A426                                      ENDIF
 212++A426 C9                                   ret
 213++A427
 214++A427              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A427              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A427              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A427              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A427              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A427              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A427              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A427              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A427              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A427              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A427
 225++A427
 226++A427
 227++A427              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A427                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A427                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A427 CD 73 A8                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A42A 32 DA A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A42D 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A42E 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A431 32 DB A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A434 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A435 3A D8 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A438                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A438                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A438                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A438                                      ;xor $80
 241++A438 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A439 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A43A CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A43C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A43C FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A43E D2 4A A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A441                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A441 AF          >                        xor a
 246++A442 B0                                   or      b
 247++A443 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 248++A446                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A446 32 62 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A449                                      ENDIF
 251++A449 C9                                   ret
 252++A44A 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A44C B4                                   or      h
 254++A44D A8                                   xor     b
 255++A44E 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 256++A451                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A451 32 62 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 258++A454                                      ENDIF
 259++A454 C9                                   ret
 260++A455
 261++A455 2A D4 A1     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A458 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A459 A7                                   and     a
 264++A45A 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A45C ED 5B D7 A1                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A460 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A461                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A461 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A463 DA 6F A4    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A466 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A468 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A46B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A46B 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A46E                                      ENDIF
 273++A46E C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A46F              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A46F FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A471 DA 7D A4    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A474 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A476 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A479                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A479 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A47C                                      ENDIF
 280++A47C C9                                   ret
 281++A47D              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A47D AF          >                        xor a
 282++A47E 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 283++A481                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A481 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A484                                      ENDIF
 286++A484 C9                                   ret
 287++A485
 288++A485
 289++A485 CD C4 A4     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 290++A488 7C                                   ld      a,h
 291++A489 A7                                   and     a
 292++A48A 06 16                                ld      b,22
 293++A48C 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 294++A48E 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 295++A48F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A48F FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 295++A491 D2 96 A4    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 296++A494 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 297++A496 2A D4 A1     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A499 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A49A E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A49C C2 AD A4                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A49F 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A4A0                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A4A0 B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A4A1 DA AD A4    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A4A4 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 304++A4A6 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 305++A4A9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A4A9 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A4AC                                      ENDIF
 308++A4AC C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A4AD 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A4AE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A4AE FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A4B0 D2 BB A4    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 311++A4B3              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 311++A4B3 AF          >                        xor a
 312++A4B4 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 313++A4B7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A4B7 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 315++A4BA                                      ENDIF
 316++A4BA C9                                   ret
 317++A4BB 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 318++A4BD 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 319++A4C0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 320++A4C0 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 321++A4C3                                      ENDIF
 322++A4C3 C9                                   ret
 323++A4C4
 324++A4C4 2A 11 A2     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 325++A4C7 ED 5B 15 A2                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 326++A4CB ED 4B 19 A2                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 327++A4CF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 328++A4D0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A4D2 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A4D3 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A4D4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A4D6 47                                   ld      b,a
 333++A4D7 7A                                   ld      a,d
 334++A4D8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 335++A4DA 57                                   ld      d,a
 336++A4DB 09                                   add     hl,bc
 337++A4DC 19                                   add     hl,de
 338++A4DD                                      ShiftHLRight1
 338++A4DD CB 3C       >			   srl h
 338++A4DF CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A4E1                                      ShiftHLRight1
 339++A4E1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 339++A4E3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 340++A4E5 C9                                   ret

   6++A4EF

   8++A501 00           NewLaunchSpeed          DS 1
   9++A502 00           NewLaunchRotX           DS 1
  10++A503 00           NewLaunchRotZ           DS 1
  11++A504
  12++A504              NewLaunchDataBlockSize  equ (3*3) + (3*3*2)
  13++A504              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  14++A504              ; a = y offset negative from center of ship
  15++A504 21 20 C0     CalcLaunchOffset:       ld      hl,UBnKxlo
  16++A507 11 E6 A4                             ld      de,NewLaunchUBnKX
  17++A50A 01 1B 00                             ld      bc,NewLaunchDataBlockSize
  18++A50D ED B0                                ldir
  19++A50F CB 27        .ApplyOffset:           sla     a
  20++A511 CB 27                                sla     a
  21++A513 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                          ; save pre calculated speed
  22++A515              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  22++A515 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  22++A516 2A 2F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  22++A519 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  22++A51A             >                        ClearSignBitA
  22++A51A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  22++A51C 57          >                        ld      d,a
  22++A51D ED 30       >                        mul     de
  22++A51F 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  22++A520             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  22++A520 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  22++A522 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  22++A523 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  22++A524 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  23++A526 78                                   ld      a,b
  24++A527 EE 80                                xor     $80
  25++A529 47                                   ld      b,a
  26++A52A              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert NewLaunchUBnKX
  26++A52A ED 5B E7 A4 >                        ld      de,(NewLaunchUBnKX+1)
  26++A52E 3A E6 A4    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKX)
  26++A531 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  26++A532 CD DB 8F    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  26++A535 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  26++A536 32 E6 A4    >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKX),a
  26++A539 ED 53 E7 A4 >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKX+1),de
  27++A53D              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  27++A53D FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  27++A53F 2A 31 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  27++A542 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27++A543             >                        ClearSignBitA
  27++A543 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  27++A545 57          >                        ld      d,a
  27++A546 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  27++A548 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27++A549             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  27++A549 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  27++A54B 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  27++A54C 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  27++A54D 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  28++A54F 78                                   ld      a,b
  29++A550 EE 80                                xor     $80
  30++A552 47                                   ld      b,a
  31++A553              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert NewLaunchUBnKY
  31++A553 ED 5B EA A4 >                        ld      de,(NewLaunchUBnKY+1)
  31++A557 3A E9 A4    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKY)
  31++A55A 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  31++A55B CD DB 8F    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  31++A55E 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  31++A55F 32 E9 A4    >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKY),a
  31++A562 ED 53 EA A4 >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKY+1),de
  32++A566              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  32++A566 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  32++A568 2A 33 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  32++A56B 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++A56C             >                        ClearSignBitA
  32++A56C E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  32++A56E 57          >                        ld      d,a
  32++A56F ED 30       >                        mul     de
  32++A571 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++A572             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  32++A572 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  32++A574 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  32++A575 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  32++A576 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  33++A578 78                                   ld      a,b
  34++A579 EE 80                                xor     $80
  35++A57B 47                                   ld      b,a

  36++A580 3A EC A4    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKZ)

  36++A587 7D          >                        ld      a,l

  47++A593 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  48++A596 E6 01        .IsItATrader:           and     ShipIsTrader

  51++A59D                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 100                    ; 61% chance do nothing
  51++A59D FE 64       >                        cp    100
  51++A59F D8          >                        ret	 c
  52++A5A0                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEHOSTILE

  57++A5A0                                      ENDIF
  58++A5A0              .NotATrader:
  59++A5A0 3A 0E C4     .IsItBountyHunter:      ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)

  61++A5A5 20 08                                jr      nz, .NotBountyHunter

  62++A5AA FE 28       >                        cp      40

  68++A5B9 E6 10                                and     ShipIsDocking                   ; if bit 4 is not clear
  69++A5BB 20 01                                jr      nz,.NotDocking

  71++A5BD                                      ;       do docking algorithm
  72++A5BD                                      ;       return

  77++A5BE                                      ;       return
  78++A5BE C9                                   ret

  80++A5C2 E6 08        .IsItPirate:            and     ShipIsPirate

  84++A5C9 F6 81                                or      Bit7Only | ShipIsTrader

  88++A5D4              .NotAPirate:

  91++A5D8 28 0C                                jr      z,.NoFighters

 135++A63D B6                                   or      (hl)
 136++A63E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 160, .TooFarForLaser   ; if in laser range (all highs order together < 160)
 136++A63E FE A0       >                        cp     160
 136++A640 D2 67 A6    >                        jp		nc,.TooFarForLaser

 138++A646 47                                   ld      b,a
 139++A647 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)

 154++A66A 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)
 155++A66D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 155++A66D FE 03       >                        cp     3
 155++A66F D2 7D A6    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway

 157++A675 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 158++A678 B6                                   or      (hl)
 159++A679 E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++A67B 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway

 162++A680                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .

 163++A680 21 53 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 163++A683 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++A684 D2 A3 A6    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++A687                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++A687 3A 13 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++A68A EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A68C 32 13 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++A68F                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++A68F 3A 17 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++A692 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A694 32 17 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a

 166++A697 3A 1B A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)

 173++A6A7 CD 17 A8     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A6AA 32 D4 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A6AD 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A6B0 32 D8 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A6B3 CD 6D A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A6B6 32 D7 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A6B9 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A6BC 32 D8 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A6BF CD C9 A6                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A6C2 CD ED A6                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A6C5 CD 1B A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A6C8 C9                                   ret
 185++A6C9
 186++A6C9 2A D7 A1     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A6CC 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A6CD EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A6CF E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A6D1 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A6D2 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A6D3 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A6D5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A6D5 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A6D7 D2 E3 A6    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A6DA                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A6DA AF          >                        xor a
 195++A6DB B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A6DC 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A6DF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A6DF 32 64 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A6E2                                      ENDIF
 200++A6E2 C9                                   ret
 201++A6E3 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A6E5 B4                                   or      h
 203++A6E6 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A6E9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A6E9 32 64 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A6EC                                      ENDIF
 207++A6EC C9                                   ret
 208++A6ED
 209++A6ED CD 73 A8     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A6F0 32 DA A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A6F3 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A6F4 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A6F7 32 DB A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A6FA 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A6FB 3A D8 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A6FE 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A6FF 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A700 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A702                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A702 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A704 D2 10 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A707                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A707 AF          >                        xor a
 221++A708 B0                                   or      b
 222++A709 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A70C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A70C 32 62 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A70F                                      ENDIF
 226++A70F C9                                   ret
 227++A710 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A712 B4                                   or      h
 229++A713 A8                                   xor     b
 230++A714 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A717                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A717 32 62 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A71A                                      ENDIF
 234++A71A C9                                   ret
 235++A71B
 236++A71B 2A D4 A1     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A71E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A71F A7                                   and     a
 239++A720 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A722 ED 5B D7 A1                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A726 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A727                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A727 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A729 DA 35 A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A72C 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A72E 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A731                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A731 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A734                                      ENDIF
 248++A734 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A735              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A735 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A737 DA 43 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A73A 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A73C 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A73F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A73F 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A742                                      ENDIF
 255++A742 C9                                   ret
 256++A743              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A743 AF          >                        xor a
 257++A744 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A747                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A747 32 66 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A74A                                      ENDIF
 261++A74A C9                                   ret
