 333++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 334++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 335++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 336++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 337++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 338++A74B              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 339++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 340++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 341++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 342++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 343++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 344++A74B              ;;;
 345++A74B              ;;;
 346++A74B              ;;;
 347++A74B              ;;;RAT2 equ    4           ; roll pitch threshold
 348++A74B              ;;;RAT  equ    3           ; magnitude of counter
 349++A74B              ;;;CNT2 equ    22          ; angle for ship slowdown
 350++A74B              ;;;
 351++A74B              ;;;
 352++A74B              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 353++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 354++A74B              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 355++A74B              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 356++A74B              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 357++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 358++A74B              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 359++A74B              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 360++A74B              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 361++A74B              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 362++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 363++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 364++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 365++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 366++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 367++A74B              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 368++A74B              ;;;                        or      h
 369++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 370++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 371++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 372++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 373++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 374++A74B              ;;;
 375++A74B              ;;;
 376++A74B              ;;;                        ;
 377++A74B              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 378++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 379++A74B              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 380++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++A74B              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++A74B              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 385++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++A74B              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 387++A74B              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;
 388++A74B              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 389++A74B              ;;;                        or      b
 390++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 391++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 392++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 393++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 394++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 395++A74B              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++A74B              ;;;                        or      h
 397++A74B              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 403++A74B              ;;;
 404++A74B              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 405++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 406++A74B              ;;;                        and     a
 407++A74B              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 408++A74B              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 409++A74B              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++A74B              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++A74B              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++A74B              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++A74B              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 418++A74B              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 419++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 420++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 421++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 422++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 423++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 424++A74B              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 425++A74B              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 426++A74B              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 427++A74B              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 428++A74B              ;;;                        ENDIF
 429++A74B              ;;;                        ret
 430++A74B
# file closed: ./GameEngine/../GameEngine/NormalAI.asm
 266+ A74B
 267+ A74B              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 268+ A74B              ; on exit a == new roll
 269+ A74B EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 270+ A74D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 271+ A74F 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 272+ A750 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 273+ A752 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 274+ A755 C9                                   ret
 275+ A756
 276+ A756 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 277+ A758 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 278+ A759 3A D7 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 279+ A75C                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 279+ A75C FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 279+ A75E DA 6B A7    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 280+ A761 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ A762 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 282+ A764                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 283+ A764                                     ; ld      a,
 284+ A764 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 285+ A766 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 286+ A767 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 287+ A76A C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 288+ A76B B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 289+ A76C 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 290+ A76F C9                                   ret                                     ;
 291+ A770
 292+ A770 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 293+ A773 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 294+ A775 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 295+ A777 F6 05                                or      5
 296+ A779 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 297+ A77C C9                                   ret
 298+ A77D
 299+ A77D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ A77E F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 301+ A780 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 302+ A783 C9                                   ret
 303+ A784
 304+ A784
 305+ A784
 306+ A784 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 307+ A786 47                                   ld      b,a
 308+ A787 3A D7 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 309+ A78A                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 309+ A78A FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 309+ A78C DA 96 A7    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 310+ A78F 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 311+ A791 B1                                   or      c
 312+ A792 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313+ A795 C9                                   ret
 314+ A796 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 315+ A797 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 316+ A79A C9                                   ret

 318+ A79B
 319+ A79B 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 320+ A79E C3 AA A7                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 321+ A7A1
 322+ A7A1 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 323+ A7A4 C3 AA A7                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 324+ A7A7
 325+ A7A7 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 326+ A7AA              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 327+ A7AA 11 F5 A1     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 328+ A7AD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 329+ A7AE 47                                   ld      b,a
 330+ A7AF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 331+ A7B1 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 332+ A7B2 13                                   inc     de
 333+ A7B3 78                                   ld      a,b
 334+ A7B4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 335+ A7B6 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 336+ A7B7 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 337+ A7B8 23                                   inc     hl
 338+ A7B9 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 339+ A7BA 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 340+ A7BB 47                                   ld      b,a
 341+ A7BC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 342+ A7BE 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 343+ A7BF 13                                   inc     de
 344+ A7C0 78                                   ld      a,b
 345+ A7C1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 346+ A7C3 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 347+ A7C4 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 348+ A7C5 23                                   inc     hl
 349+ A7C6 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 350+ A7C7 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 351+ A7C8 47                                   ld      b,a
 352+ A7C9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 353+ A7CB 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 354+ A7CC 13                                   inc     de
 355+ A7CD 78                                   ld      a,b
 356+ A7CE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 357+ A7D0 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 358+ A7D1 C9                                   ret
 359+ A7D2
 360+ A7D2                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 361+ A7D2              DebugTacticsCopy:
 362+ A7D2 2A 29 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 363+ A7D5 ED 5B 2B C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 364+ A7D9 ED 4B 2D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)

 367+ A7E4 ED 43 39 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc

 378+ A805 ED 4B 39 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)

 385+ A815
 386+ A815 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 387+ A817 CD A1 A7     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 388+ A81A 21 F5 A1     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 389+ A81D 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 390+ A81E 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 391+ A81F 3A 11 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 392+ A822 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 393+ A823 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 394+ A825 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 395+ A826 32 63 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 396+ A829 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 397+ A82A 3A 13 A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 398+ A82D AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 399+ A82E 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 400+ A82F 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 401+ A830 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 402+ A831 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 403+ A832 3A 15 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 404+ A835 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 405+ A836 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 406+ A838 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 407+ A839 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 408+ A83B 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 409+ A83C 3A 17 A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 410+ A83F AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 411+ A840 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 412+ A841 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 413+ A842 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 414+ A843 3A 63 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 415+ A846 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 416+ A848 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 417+ A849 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 418+ A84C 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 419+ A84D 22 15 A8                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 420+ A850 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 421+ A851 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 422+ A852 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 423+ A853 3A 19 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 424+ A856 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 425+ A857 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 426+ A859 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 427+ A85A 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 428+ A85C 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 429+ A85D 3A 1B A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 430+ A860 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 431+ A861 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 432+ A862 2A 15 A8                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 433+ A865 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 434+ A868 32 63 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 435+ A86B 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 436+ A86C C9                                   ret

 439+ A870 C3 1A A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 440+ A873
 441+ A873 CD 9B A7     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 442+ A876 C3 1A A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL

 444+ A879 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 445+ A87C 11 01 A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 446+ A87F 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 447+ A882 ED B0                                ldir
 448+ A884 C9                                   ret
 449+ A885
 450+ A885 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 451+ A888 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 452+ A88B                                      ;xor     $80
 453+ A88B 22 11 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 454+ A88E 32 13 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 455+ A891
 456+ A891 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 457+ A894 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 458+ A897                                      ;xor     $80
 459+ A897 22 15 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 460+ A89A 32 17 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 461+ A89D
 462+ A89D 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 463+ A8A0 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 464+ A8A3                                      ;xor     $80
 465+ A8A3 22 19 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 466+ A8A6 32 1B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 467+ A8A9 C9                                   ret
 468+ A8AA
 469+ A8AA              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 469+ A8AA AF          >                        xor a
 470+ A8AB 21 01 A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 471+ A8AE 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 472+ A8B0 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 473+ A8B1 23                                   inc     hl
 474+ A8B2 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 475+ A8B4 C9                                   ret
 476+ A8B5
 477+ A8B5 CD AA A8     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 478+ A8B8 CD 85 A8                             call    CopyPosToVector
 479+ A8BB                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 480+ A8BB                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 481+ A8BB                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 482+ A8BB                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 483+ A8BB C9                                   ret
 484+ A8BC
 485+ A8BC ED 5B 01 A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 486+ A8C0 3A 03 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 487+ A8C3                                      FlipSignBitA
 487+ A8C3 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ A8C5 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 489+ A8C6 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 490+ A8C9 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 491+ A8CC 47                                   ld      b,a
 492+ A8CD CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 493+ A8D0 22 11 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 494+ A8D3 32 13 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 495+ A8D6 ED 5B 04 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 496+ A8DA 3A 06 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 497+ A8DD                                      FlipSignBitA
 497+ A8DD EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 498+ A8DF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 499+ A8E0 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 500+ A8E3 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 501+ A8E6 47                                   ld      b,a
 502+ A8E7 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 503+ A8EA 22 15 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 504+ A8ED 32 17 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 505+ A8F0 ED 5B 07 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 506+ A8F4 3A 09 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 507+ A8F7                                      FlipSignBitA
 507+ A8F7 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 508+ A8F9 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 509+ A8FA 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 510+ A8FD 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 511+ A900 47                                   ld      b,a
 512+ A901 CD 5D 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 513+ A904 22 19 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 514+ A907 32 1B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 515+ A90A C9                                   ret
 516+ A90B
 517+ A90B              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 518+ A90B              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 519+ A90B              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 520+ A90B 2A 11 A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 521+ A90E ED 5B 15 A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 522+ A912 ED 4B 19 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 523+ A916 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 524+ A917 B2                                   or      d
 525+ A918 B0                                   or      b
 526+ A919 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 527+ A91B                                      ShiftHLRight1
 527+ A91B CB 3C       >			   srl h
 527+ A91D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 528+ A91F                                      ShiftDERight1
 528+ A91F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 528+ A921 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 529+ A923                                      ShiftBCRight1
 529+ A923 CB 38       >			   srl b
 529+ A925 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 530+ A927 C3 16 A9                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 531+ A92A              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 531+ A92A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 531+ A92C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 532+ A92E                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 532+ A92E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 532+ A930 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 533+ A932                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 533+ A932 CB 38       >			   srl b
 533+ A934 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 534+ A936 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 535+ A939 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 536+ A93A ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 537+ A93C EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 538+ A93D 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 539+ A93E ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 540+ A940 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 541+ A941 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 542+ A942 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 543+ A943 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 544+ A945 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 545+ A946 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 546+ A947 CD 16 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 547+ A94A                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 548+ A94A 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 549+ A94B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 550+ A94D 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 551+ A94E C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 552+ A94F 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 553+ A950 CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 554+ A953 32 19 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 555+ A956 D1                                   pop     de
 556+ A957 7B                                   ld      a,e
 557+ A958 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 558+ A95A CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 559+ A95D 32 15 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 560+ A960 E1                                   pop     hl
 561+ A961 7D                                   ld      a,l
 562+ A962 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ A964 CD 2F 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ A967 32 11 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 565+ A96A                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 566+ A96A                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 567+ A96A                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 567+ A96A AF          >                        xor a
 568+ A96B 32 12 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 569+ A96E 32 16 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 570+ A971 32 1A A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 571+ A974                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 571+ A974 3A 13 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 571+ A977 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 571+ A979 32 13 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 572+ A97C                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 572+ A97C 3A 17 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 572+ A97F E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 572+ A981 32 17 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 573+ A984                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 573+ A984 3A 1B A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 573+ A987 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 573+ A989 32 1B A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 574+ A98C C9                                   ret
 575+ A98D

 780+ A98D
 781+ A98D 2A 11 A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 782+ A990 ED 5B 15 A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 783+ A994 ED 4B 19 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 784+ A998 3A 13 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 785+ A99B FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 786+ A99D 3A 17 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 787+ A9A0 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 788+ A9A2 3A 1B A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 789+ A9A5 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 790+ A9A7 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 791+ A9A9 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 792+ A9AB                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 792+ A9AB E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 793+ A9AD 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 794+ A9AF FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 795+ A9B1 CB 2F                            sra     a
 796+ A9B3 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 797+ A9B5 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 798+ A9B7 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 799+ A9B9 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 800+ A9BB CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 801+ A9BD FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 802+ A9BF CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 803+ A9C1 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 804+ A9C3 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 805+ A9C5 CB 2F                            sra     a
 806+ A9C7 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 807+ A9C9 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 808+ A9CB CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 809+ A9CD C3 A7 A9                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 810+ A9D0 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 811+ A9D1 B2                               or      d
 812+ A9D2 B0                               or      b
 813+ A9D3                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 813+ A9D3 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 814+ A9D5 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 815+ A9D7              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 815+ A9D7 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 815+ A9D9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 816+ A9DB                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 816+ A9DB CB 3A       >			   srl d
 816+ A9DD CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 817+ A9DF                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 817+ A9DF CB 38       >			   srl b
 817+ A9E1 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 818+ A9E3 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 819+ A9E4 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 820+ A9E6 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 821+ A9E7 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 822+ A9E8 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 823+ A9EA 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 824+ A9EB 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 825+ A9EC DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 826+ A9EE 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 827+ A9EF 22 21 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 828+ A9F2 22 25 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 829+ A9F5 22 29 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 830+ A9F8 C9                               ret
 831+ A9F9                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 832+ A9F9

  21+ A9F9              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ A9F9              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ A9F9 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ A9FD DD E5
  24+ A9FF AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ AA00 CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ AA01 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV

  28+ AA05 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  28+ AA09 C1 F1

  71+ AA0F CF                                   rst	    $08
  72+ AA10 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  73+ AA11 32 98 AA                             ld      (FileHandle),a  ; make a local copy of last file opened
  74+ AA14 38 01                                jr      c,.FileOpenError
  75+ AA16 C9                                   ret
  76+ AA17 C3 17 AA     .FileOpenError:         jp      .FileOpenError
  77+ AA1A
  78+ AA1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ AA1A              ;	Function	refills the buffer map with card addresses for the file
  80+ AA1A              ;	In:		a  = file handle (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  81+ AA1A              ;           ix = address of filemap_buffer (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  82+ AA1A              ;           de = filemap size (which should equal 4 in our case)
  83+ AA1A              ;			bc  = amount to read
  84+ AA1A              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  85+ AA1A              ;               zero set  = no data loaded so still error
  86+ AA1A              ;   you can use fRefill_map to pull default valuess

  93+ AA1A              ;.SetFlags:              ld      (CardFlags),a                   ; set up adressing mode flags  bit 0=card id (0 or 1) bit 1=0 for byte addressing, 1 for block addressing
  94+ AA1A              ;.CheckForEntries:       ld      (FilemapBufferLast),hl          ; save last entry address +2
  95+ AA1A              ;                        ld      de,FilemapBuffer
  96+ AA1A              ;                        sbc     hl,de                           ; hl = number of entries found
  97+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,$ff
  98+ AA1A              ;                        ret
  99+ AA1A              ;
 100+ AA1A              ;read_stream_block:      ld      hl,(FilemapBufferPointer)
 101+ AA1A              ;                        ldBCDEatHL                              ; load the disk address
 102+ AA1A              ;                        push    bc                              ; into IXDE
 103+ AA1A              ;                        pop     ix                              ; now IXDE = card address
 104+ AA1A              ;                        ldBCatHL                                ; bc = number of blocks to be read
 105+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (FilemapBlockCount),bc
 106+ AA1A              ;                        ret
 107+ AA1A              ; Start up stream of data
 108+ AA1A              ; If successful, the call returns with:
 109+ AA1A              ; B=protocol: 0=SD/MMC, 1=IDE,  C=data port
 110+ AA1A              ; NOTE: On the Next, these values will always be: B=0 C=$EB
 111+ AA1A              ;fStream_start:          ld      hl,FilemapBuffer                ; set to head of filemap
 112+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (FilemapBufferPointer),hl       ; .
 113+ AA1A              ;                        ZeroA
 114+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (FilereadsPerformed),a
 115+ AA1A              ;                        call    read_stream_block
 116+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,(CardFlags)                   ; get card flags back
 117+ AA1A              ;                        rst     $08
 118+ AA1A              ;                        DB      DISK_STRMSTART                  ; start up stream
 119+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (FileStreamPort),bc             ; save port information (even through it will not change on a next)
 120+ AA1A              ;                        ret
 121+ AA1A
 122+ AA1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 123+ AA1A              ;	Function	stream in a block of data to memory
 124+ AA1A              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 125+ AA1A              ;			bc  = amount to read
 126+ AA1A              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 127+ AA1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 128+ AA1A              ;fStream_block:          ld      ix,FileBuffer
 129+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,(CardFlags)
 130+ AA1A              ;                        ld      bc,(FileStreamPort)
 131+ AA1A              ;                        ld      hl,FileBuffer
 132+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (FilemapBufferPointer),hl
 133+ AA1A              ;.StreamLoop:            ld      b,0
 134+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,(TargetSize+1)
 135+ AA1A              ;                        cp      2
 136+ AA1A              ;                        jr      c,.stream_partial_block
 137+ AA1A              ;.StreamFullBlock:       inir                                ; read 256 bytes to hl
 138+ AA1A              ;                        inir                                ; read 256 bytes to hl+256
 139+ AA1A              ;                        dec     b                           ; update byte count
 140+ AA1A              ;                        dec     b                           ; .
 141+ AA1A              ;                        ld      hl,TargetSize               ; 512 bytes read
 142+ AA1A              ;                        ld      de,512
 143+ AA1A              ;                        ClearCarryFlag
 144+ AA1A              ;                        sbc     hl,de
 145+ AA1A              ;                        ld      (TargetSize),hl
 146+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,(FileStreamPort+1)        ; get the protocol
 147+ AA1A              ;                        and     a
 148+ AA1A              ;                        jr      nz,.protocol_ide            ; we arn't using but for compatibility
 149+ AA1A              ;.protocol_sdmmc:        in      a,(c)                       ; for sd and mmc, read in the 2 byte CRC
 150+ AA1A              ;                        nop                                 ; as the max performance of the interface is
 151+ AA1A              ;                        nop                                 ; 16T per byte, no ops pad out operation
 152+ AA1A              ;                        in      a,(c)
 153+ AA1A              ;                        nop
 154+ AA1A              ;                        nop
 155+ AA1A              ;.wait_for_next_block:   in      a,(c)                       ; if wait token is not FF then we are read
 156+ AA1A              ;                        cp      $FF
 157+ AA1A              ;                        jr      z,.wait_for_next_block
 158+ AA1A              ;                        cp      $FE                         ; if not and its not FE its a fault
 159+ AA1A              ;                        jr      nz,.token_error
 160+ AA1A              ;.protocol_ide:          ld      de,(TargetSize)             ; Any more bytes required
 161+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,d
 162+ AA1A              ;                        or      e
 163+ AA1A              ;                        jr      z,.streaming_complete
 164+ AA1A              ;                        ret
 165+ AA1A              ;.stream_partial_block:  and     a                           ; is block at least 256 bytes?
 166+ AA1A              ;                        jr      z,.under256_bytes
 167+ AA1A              ;                        inir                                ; get 256 bytes
 168+ AA1A              ;.under256_bytes:        ld      b,e
 169+ AA1A              ;                        inc     b
 170+ AA1A              ;                        dec     b
 171+ AA1A              ;                        jr      z,.streaming_complete
 172+ AA1A              ;                        inir
 173+ AA1A              ;.streaming_complete:    ld      a,(CardFlags)
 174+ AA1A              ;                        rst     $08
 175+ AA1A              ;                        DB      DISK_STRMEND
 176+ AA1A              ;                        ld      a,(FileHandle)
 177+ AA1A              ;                        call    fClose
 178+ AA1A              ;                        ret
 179+ AA1A              ;.token_error:           jp      .token_error
 180+ AA1A              ;
 181+ AA1A              ;
 182+ AA1A              ;fOpenReadFile:          ld      (TargetSize),bc
 183+ AA1A              ;                        call    disable_multiface
 184+ AA1A              ;                        call    fOpen_read_exists
 185+ AA1A              ;.SetupStream:           call    fStream_start
 186+ AA1A              ;                        jr      c,.FileStreamError
 187+ AA1A              ;                        ret
 188+ AA1A              ;
 189+ AA1A              ;.FileStreamError:       jp      .FileStreamError
 190+ AA1A              ;
 191+ AA1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AA1A              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AA1A              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AA1A              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AA1A              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AA1A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AA1A B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AA1B C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AA1C E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AA1D DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AA20 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AA21 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AA22 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AA23 C9                                   ret
 205+ AA24
 206+ AA24              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AA24              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AA24              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AA24              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AA24              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AA24              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AA24 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AA25 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AA26 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AA27 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AA2A CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AA2B 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AA2C E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AA2D C9                                   ret
 220+ AA2E
 221+ AA2E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AA2E              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AA2E              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AA2E              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AA2E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AA2E B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AA2F C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AA30 CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AA31 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ AA32 C9                                   ret
 231+ AA33
 232+ AA33              ;fSeekHome:              push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 233+ AA33              ;                        ld      bc,0
 234+ AA33              ;                        ld      de,0
 235+ AA33              ;                        ld      l,0
 236+ AA33              ;                        call    fSeek
 237+ AA33              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 238+ AA33              ;                        ret
 239+ AA33              ;
 240+ AA33              ;fSeekForward256:        push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 241+ AA33              ;                        ld      bc,0
 242+ AA33              ;                        ld      de,256
 243+ AA33              ;                        ld      l,1
 244+ AA33              ;                        call    fSeek
 245+ AA33              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 246+ AA33              ;                        ret
 247+ AA33
 248+ AA33              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ AA33              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ AA33              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ AA33              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ AA33              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ AA33              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ AA33              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ AA33 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
 256+ AA36 CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ AA37 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
 258+ AA38 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
 259+ AA3B C9                                   ret
 260+ AA3C
 261+ AA3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ AA3C              ; Init the file system
 263+ AA3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ AA3C CD F9 A9     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ AA3F C9                                   ret
 266+ AA40
 267+ AA40              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AA40              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AA40              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AA40              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AA40              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AA40              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AA40 CD F9 A9     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AA43 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AA46                                      ; get file size
 276+ AA46 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AA49 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AA4C 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AA4E CD 0C AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AA51 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AA53 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AA55 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AA57 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AA5A F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AA5B CD 1A AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AA5E 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AA60 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AA61 CD 2E AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AA64 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AA66 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AA69 C9                                   ret
 292+ AA6A              ;
 293+ AA6A              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AA6A              ;
 295+ AA6A DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AA6C C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AA6D
 298+ AA6D              .error_closing:
 299+ AA6D C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AA6E D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AA6F C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AA70 C9                                   ret
 303+ AA71
 304+ AA71              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AA71              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AA71              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AA71              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AA71              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AA71              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AA71 CD F9 A9     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AA74 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AA77 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AA7A 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AA7C CD 0C AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AA7F 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AA81 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AA83 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AA85 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AA88 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AA89 CD 24 AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AA8C 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AA8E F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AA8F CD 2E AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AA92 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AA93              ;
 326+ AA93              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AA93              ;
 328+ AA93 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AA96 C9                                   ret
 330+ AA97

 332+ AA98 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ AA99 00           CardFlags               DB  0

 336+ AA9E 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data

1043  B0C8 B1 B1 B1 B1
1043  B0CC B1 B1 B1 B1
1043  B0D0 B1 B1 B1 B1
1043  B0D4 B1 B1 B1 B1
1043  B0D8 B1 B1 B1 B1
1043  B0DC B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0E0 B1 B1 B1 B1                  dw      IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine,IM2Routine
1044  B0E4 B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0E8 B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0EC B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0F0 B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0F4 B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0F8 B1 B1 B1 B1
1044  B0FC B1 B1 B1 B1
1045  B100 B1 B1 B1 B1                  dw      IM2Routine,IM2Routine
1046  B104                              ;(The last DW could just be a DB as it needs to b 257 bytes but its cleaner for source code)
1047  B104
1048  B104 60 00        IR_COUNT        dw  $0060
1049  B106
1050  B106 00           LAST_DELTA      db  0
1051  B107 00           SavedMMU6       db  0
1052  B108 00           SavedMMU7       db  0
1053  B109              SoundInterrupt      EQU IM2Sound
1054  B109              DanubeInterrupt     EQU IM2PlayDanube
1055  B109              AttractInterrrupt   EQU IM2AttractMode
1056  B109
1057  B109
1058  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
1059  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
1060  B109
1061  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
1062  B109                              org $B1B1
1063  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
1064  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
1065  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
1066  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
1067  B1B1 FB                                           ei
1068  B1B2 ED 4D                                        reti
1069  B1B4                                      ENDIF
1070  B1B4 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1070  B1B8 DD E5 FD E5
1071  B1BC 08                                   ex      af,af'
1072  B1BD D9                                   exx
1073  B1BE F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1074  B1C2 21 5F 7E                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
1075  B1C5 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
1076  B1C6                                      ;break
1077  B1C6 CD DA B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
1078  B1C9 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1079  B1CD 08                                   ex      af,af'
1080  B1CE D9                                   exx
1081  B1CF FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1081  B1D3 E1 D1 C1 F1
1082  B1D7 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
1083  B1D8 ED 4D                                reti
1084  B1DA                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
1085  B1DA              EndOfNonBanked:
1086  B1DA                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
1087  B1DA
1088  B1DA
1089  B1DA              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
1090  B1DA ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1091  B1DA ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
1092  B1DA                                      ENDM
1093  B1DA
1094  B1DA              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
1095  B1DA ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1096  B1DA ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1097  B1DA                                      ENDM
1098  B1DA
1099  B1DA              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
1100  B1DA ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1101  B1DA ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1102  B1DA                                      ENDM
1103  B1DA
1104  B1DA              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
1105  B1DA ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1106  B1DA ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1107  B1DA                                      ENDM
1108  B1DA
1109  B1DA              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
1109  B1DA             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1109  B1DA 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1109  B1DD 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1109  B1DF ED 79       >            out (c),a
1109  B1E1 04          >            inc b
1109  B1E2 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1109  B1E4 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1110  B1E7                                      MMUSelectSound
1110  B1E7 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1111  B1EB                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1112  B1EB                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1113  B1EB                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1114  B1EB CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
1115  B1EE              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1115  B1EE 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1115  B1F1 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1116  B1F4 C9                                   ret
1117  B1F5
1118  B1F5
1119  B1F5              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
1119  B1F5             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1119  B1F5 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1119  B1F8 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1119  B1FA ED 79       >            out (c),a
1119  B1FC 04          >            inc b
1119  B1FD ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1119  B1FF 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1120  B202                                      MMUSelectSound
1120  B202 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1121  B206                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1122  B206                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1123  B206                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1124  B206 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
1125  B209              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1125  B209 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1125  B20C ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1126  B20F C9                                   ret
1127  B210
1128  B210 CD F5 B1     IM2AttractMode:         call    IM2PlayDanube
1129  B213                                  IF 1
1130  B213                                      DISPLAY "NOT LOADING IM2 ATTRACT MODE"
1131  B213                                  ELSE
1132  B213 ~                                    SaveMMU6
1133  B213 ~                                    call    AttractModeUpdate
1134  B213 ~                                    RestoreMMU6
1135  B213                                  ENDIF
1136  B213 C9                                   ret
1137  B214

  32+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de

  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret

  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B F9 7E                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B F7 7E                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a

  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a

 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 2F 85     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A E4 7E                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 257+ C2BF 21 1B 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 258+ C2C2 CD 70 8E                             call	CapitaliseString
 259+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 260+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 263+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 1B 8F                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 269+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 287+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 294+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 295+ C303 21 1B 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 296+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 296+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 297+ C30A CD BE E3                             call	l2_print_7at
 298+ C30D C9                                   ret
 299+ C30E
 300+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 301+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 302+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 303+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 305+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 306+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 307+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 308+ C31A 21 2A 7E                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 309+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 310+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 311+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 312+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 313+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 314+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 315+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 317+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 318+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 319+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 320+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 321+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 322+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 323+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 324+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 325+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 326+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 327+ C33A CD 2F 85     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working

 329+ C340                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 329+ C340 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 330+ C343 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 332+ C349 CD 70 8E                             call	CapitaliseString

 334+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 335+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 336+ C354 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 337+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 343+ C364 C9                                   ret
 344+ C365
 345+ C365 AF           plot_local_stars:       xor		a
