  93+ F547 CA 53 F5    >                        jp	    z,.UpdateCounters
  93+ F54A DA 53 F5    >                        jp		c, .UpdateCounters
  94+ F54D 0E 7F                                ld      c,127
  95+ F54F ED 43 E1 EE  .UpdateEndY:            ld      (endy),bc               ; save BC to endy y as its now clamped, thsi frees up BC regsiters
  96+ F553 DD E5 E1     .UpdateCounters:        ld      hl,ix                   ; get target array index and set it to
  97+ F556 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; targetArray[de]
  98+ F557 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; .
  99+ F558 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; now set up B as an iterator
 100+ F559 90                                   sub     b                       ; for py2 - py1 + 1 entries
 101+ F55A 3C                                   inc     a                       ; .
 102+ F55B 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; .
 103+ F55C DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix                   ; we don't need de anymore to move ix for faster instructions
 104+ F560 73 23 72 2B  .UpdateArray:           ld      (hl),de                 ; use sjasm fake as it does (hl)=e,inc hl, (hl)=d,inc hl
 105+ F564 3C                                   inc     a                       ; use a as a counter for the end when we update EndY
 106+ F565 10 F9                                djnz    .UpdateArray            ; .
 107+ F567 C9                                   ret                             ; we are now done
 108+ F568
 109+ F568
 110+ F568
 111+ F568              ; ">l2_draw_any_line, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color: determines if its horizontal, vertical or diagonal then hands off the work"
 112+ F568              ; b - y0 c - x0, d - y1 e - x1 a - colour
 113+ F568 08           l2_draw_any_line:       ex		af,af'              ; save colour into a'
 114+ F569 79                                   ld		a,c                 ; if x and e are the same its horizontal
 115+ F56A BB                                   cp		e
 116+ F56B 28 08                                jr		z,.HorizontalLineCheck
 117+ F56D 78                                   ld		a,b                 ; if b and d are the same its vertica;
 118+ F56E BA                                   cp		d
 119+ F56F 28 0E                                jr		z,.VerticalLine
 120+ F571              ; use jp and get a free ret instruction optimisation
 121+ F571 08           .DiagonalLine:		    ex		af,af'			     ; get colour back into a
 122+ F572 C3 D6 E9                             jp		l2_draw_diagonal
 123+ F575
 124+ F575 78           .HorizontalLineCheck:   ld      a,b
 125+ F576 BA                                   cp      d
 126+ F577 28 0B                                jr      z, .SinglePixel
 127+ F579 08           .HorizontalLine:        ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
 128+ F57A 53                                   ld		d,e				    ; set d as target right pixel
 129+ F57B 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
 130+ F57C C3 BD E4                             jp		l2_draw_horz_line_to
 131+ F57F 08           .VerticalLine:          ex		af,af'
 132+ F580 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
 133+ F581 C3 55 E5                             jp		l2_draw_vert_line_to
 134+ F584 08           .SinglePixel:           ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
 135+ F585                                      l2_plot_macro; jp      l2_plot_pixel
 135+ F585 78          >                        ld      a,b
 135+ F586             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 135+ F586 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 135+ F588 D2 94 F5    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 135+ F58B 69          >                        ld      l,c
 135+ F58C CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 135+ F58F 67          >                        ld      h,a
 135+ F590 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 135+ F593 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 135+ F594             >.NoPlot:
 136+ F594 C9                                   ret
 137+ F595              ;-*-*-;......................................................
 138+ F595              ;-*-*-; hl'hl = x1y1 de'de = x3y3 , does not save, just plots points
 139+ F595              ;-*-*-Layer2_draw_ClipY_Line:
 140+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Eliminte totally off screen first
 141+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1HighTest:            IsHLGT127                       ; if y1 and y2 > 127
 142+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Y1HighLTE127        ; .
 143+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y2HighTest:            IsDEGT127                       ; .
 144+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                       ;   return
 145+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1HighLTE127:
 146+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1LowTest:             bit     7,h                     ; if y1 and y2 < 0
 147+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.YTestPass            ; .
 148+ F595              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,d                     ; .
 149+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                      ;   return
 150+ F595              ;-*-*-.YTestPass:             exx                             ; hl hl' = x1y1 de de' = x2y2
 151+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,h                     ; if x1 and x2 < 0 or > 255
 152+ F595              ;-*-*-                        and     a                       ; then in either scenario high
 153+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XTestPass            ; byte will not be zero
 154+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,d                     ; .
 155+ F595              ;-*-*-                        and     a                       ; .
 156+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                      ;   return
 157+ F595              ;-*-*-.XTestPass:                                             ;
 158+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Check for horizontal and vertical exceptions
 159+ F595              ;-*-*-.CheckForVertical:      call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if x1 = x2 then vertical line
 160+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, l2_drawVertClipY     ;    goto vertical and use its ret as a free exit
 161+ F595              ;-*-*-.CheckForHorizontal:    exx                             ; hl'hl = x1y1 de'de = x2y2
 162+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if y1 = y2 then horizonal line
 163+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, l2_drawHorzClipY     ; goto  horizontal and use its ret as a free exit
 164+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ; hl hl' = x1y1 de de' = x2y2
 165+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Now we can draw diagnoal, note we are pre-sorting Y so no need to do sort logic
 166+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Check if X1 > X2 and set sign, X1 x2 and clip accordingly
 167+ F595              ;-*-*-.SetupMinMaxX:          call    CompareHLDESigned       ; If x1 > x2
 168+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      c, .x1LTx2              ; . (else jump to x1 < x2 as we have already handled x1 = x2)
 169+ F595              ;-*-*-.x1GTEx2:               ld      a,$FF                   ;   sign_x = -1 (also iyh)
 170+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (sign_x),a              ;   .
 171+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      iyh,a
 172+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;   x1 = - x1
 173+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegDE                           ;   x2 = - x2
 174+ F595              ;-*-*-                        xor     a                       ;   xmax = 0
 175+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax),a           ;   .
 176+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax+1),a         ;   .
 177+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     a                       ;   xmin = -255 ($FF01)
 178+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin),a           ;   .
 179+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,$FF
 180+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin+1),a         ;   .
 181+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .DoneSignSetup          ; else
 182+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       if X1<X2 then set up sign as 1, clip, we don't need to change X1 and X2
 183+ F595              ;-*-*-.x1LTx2:                ld      a,1                     ;   sign_x = 1 (also iyh)
 184+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (sign_x),a              ;   .
 185+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      iyh,a                   ;   .
 186+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ZeroA                           ;   clip_xmin = 0
 187+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin),a           ;   .
 188+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin+1),a         ;   .
 189+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax+1),a         ;   clip_xmax = 255
 190+ F595              ;-*-*-                        dec     a                       ;   .
 191+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax),a           ;   .
 192+ F595              ;-*-*-.DoneSignSetup:
 193+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta x = x2 - x1
 194+ F595              ;-*-*-.CalcDeltas:            ex      de,hl                   ; de = x1 hl = x2
 195+ F595              ;-*-*-                        push    hl                      ; save x2                       Stack+1
 196+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; delta_x = x2 - x1
 197+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 198+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x),hl            ; .
 199+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta X step
 200+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; multiply by 2
 201+ F595              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ; .
 202+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x_step),hl       ; delta_x_step = delta x * 2
 203+ F595              ;-*-*-                        pop     hl                      ; Restore X2                     Stack+0
 204+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ; now hl = x2 and de = x1
 205+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta y = y2 - y1
 206+ F595              ;-*-*-.CalcDeltaY:            exx                             ; hl = y1 de = y2, we don't save hl,de as we will load later
 207+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y1Work),hl             ; y1Work = y1
 208+ F595              ;-*-*-                        push    hl                      ; save y1 so that it can be loaded to HL later
 209+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y2Work),de             ; y2Work = y2
 210+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ; set de to y2Work and hl to y1Work
 211+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; delta_y = y2 - y1
 212+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 213+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_y),hl            ; .
 214+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta Y step
 215+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; multiply by 2
 216+ F595              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ; .
 217+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_y_step),hl       ; delta_y_step = delta y * 2
 218+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ; now hl = y1 de = y2
 219+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       x_pos = x1, y_pos = y1
 220+ F595              ;-*-*-.SavePositions:         exx                             ; de = x1 hl = x2
 221+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x1Work),de             ; x1Work = x1
 222+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x2Work),hl             ; x2Work = x2
 223+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ;ex      de,hl                   ; hl = x1 de = x2
 224+ F595              ;-*-*-                        pop     hl                      ; y_pos = hl = y1   = y_pos     Stack+0
 225+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),de              ; .
 226+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),hl              ; .
 227+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Check for Delta X >= Delta Y and do respective code version
 228+ F595              ;-*-*-.CheckDeltaXGTEDeltaY:  ld      hl,(delta_x)            ; hl = delta x
 229+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ; de = delta y
 230+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if data x < deltay
 231+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      c, DeltaXltDeltaY
 232+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 233+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       this is where dx >= dy
 234+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Delta X >= DeltaY ---------------------------------;    error = delta y_step - delta x
 235+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       Error = delta Y Step - Delta X and set Exit false
 236+ F595              ;-*-*-L2DeltaXgteDeltaY:      ErrorEquStepMinusDelta delta_y_step, delta_x ; this also sets de to delta x
 237+ F595              ;-*-*-                        SetExitFalse                    ;    set exit = false
 238+ F595              ;-*-*-;---                    if y < 0 then set y = 0 & save X pos to targetArray[0]..;
 239+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsY1TL0:               IsAxisLT0 (y1Work)              ;    if y1 < 0
 240+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp     z,.Y1IsNotLT0           ;    .
 241+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = 2 * (-y1) -1 * delta X
 242+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1IsLT0:               ex      de,hl                   ;       de = delta x
 243+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;       temp = (2 * (0 - y1) - 1) * delta_x; Note from entering de = delta_x
 244+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;       .      (0-y1 also equals negate y1)
 245+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .
 246+ F595              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ;       .      (y1 = y1 * 2)
 247+ F595              ;-*-*-                        dec     hl                      ;       .      (y1 = y1 -1)
 248+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;       .      (multiply by de which is delta x)
 249+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;       .      (and save to linetemp)
 250+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .  (set BC to divq floor bc/de)
 251+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;       msd = floor_divq (temp, delta_y_step)
 252+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor (temp , delta y step)
 253+ F595              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;       .
 254+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos += msd
 255+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;       x pos += msd (move msd to de)
 256+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;       .            (pull in x1temp and add de)
 257+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .
 258+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;       .            (store result in x_pos)
 259+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 260+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTClipXMax:      ld      de,(clip_xmax)          ;       if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 261+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ;       .
 262+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XPosLTEXMax         ;       .
 263+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     nc                      ;       .
 264+ F595              ;-*-*-.XPosLTEXMax:
 265+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... if x_pos > clip_xmin
 266+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTEClipXmin:     ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ;       if x_pos >= clip_xmin
 267+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ;       .
 268+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XposLTClipXmin       ;       .
 269+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      c,.XposLTClipXmin       ;
 270+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... then rem = temp - msd * delta y step
 271+ F595              ;-*-*-.XposGTEClipXMin:       ld      hl,(msd)                ;          rem = temp - msd * delta_y_step
 272+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;          .     (de =  delta_y_step)
 273+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;          .     (hl = msd * delta y step)
 274+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;          .     (de = hl)
 275+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(linetemp)           ;          .     (hl = linetemp)
 276+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;          .
 277+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;          .     (hl = hl = de)
 278+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (rem),hl                ;          .     (rem = result)
 279+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... y pos = 0
 280+ F595              ;-*-*-                        xor     a                       ;          y_pos = 0
 281+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),a               ;          .
 282+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos+1),a             ;          .
 283+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... error = error - (rem + delta x)
 284+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x)            ;          error -= rem + delta_x
 285+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;          .      (hl = (rem still) (de = delta x) )
 286+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;          .      (move result into de)
 287+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;          .      (get error into hl)
 288+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;          .      (error - de)
 289+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;          .
 290+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;          .      (save in hl)
 291+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... if rem > 0
 292+ F595              ;-*-*-                        IsMem16GT0JumpFalse rem, .remNotGT0 ;      if (rem > 0)
 293+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... ... xpos ++
 294+ F595              ;-*-*-.remGT0:                ld      hl,x_pos                ;              x_pos += 1
 295+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     (hl)                    ;              .
 296+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... ... error += delta y step
 297+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ErrorPlusStep delta_y_step      ;              error += delta_y_step
 298+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... set exit true
 299+ F595              ;-*-*-.remNotGT0:             ld      a,$FF                   ;          set_exit = true
 300+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (set_exit),a            ;          .
 301+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ...  set target array [0] to xpos
 302+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;          targetArray[0] = x_pos
 303+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (ix+0),l                ;          .  (targetArray is pointed to by ix)
 304+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (ix+1),h                ;          .
 305+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1IsNotLT0:
 306+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       x pos end = x2
 307+ F595              ;-*-*-.XposLTClipXmin:        ld      hl,(x2Work)             ;    x_pos_end = x2
 308+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;    .
 309+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       if y2 > 127
 310+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsY2GT127:             ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;    if (y2 > 127)
 311+ F595              ;-*-*-                        IsHLGT127                       ;    .
 312+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Y2LTE127            ;    .
 313+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = delta x step * (127 - y1) + delta x
 314+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y2GT127:               ld      de,(y1Work)             ;       temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x
 315+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,127                  ;       .      (de = y1work)
 316+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .      (hl = 127 )
 317+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;       .      (hl - de)
 318+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;       .      (de = delta x step)
 319+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;       .      (hl = hl * de)
 320+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x)            ;       .      (de = delta x)
 321+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .      (hl + de)
 322+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;       .      (and save to line temp)
 323+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       de = delta y step
 324+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;       de = linetemp hl = delta y step
 325+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor_divq (temp, delta y step)
 326+ F595              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;       msd = floor_divq(temp,delta_y_step); (hl=de/hl)
 327+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,hl                   ;       save off msd as we will need it again
 328+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(x1Work)             ;
 329+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos_end = x1 + msd
 330+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 331+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;
 332+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... if (temp - msd * delta y step)) == 0
 333+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,bc                   ;       if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end;
 334+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .    (hl = msd * delta_y_step)
 335+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;       .
 336+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;       .    (hl = linetemp - hl
 337+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(linetemp)           ;       .
 338+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .
 339+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;       .
 340+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Calc1NotZero        ;       .
 341+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... x pos end minus 1
 342+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,x_pos_end            ;           then -- x_pos_end
 343+ F595              ;-*-*-                        dec     (hl)                    ;           .
 344+ F595              ;-*-*-.Calc1NotZero:
 345+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       if sign_x == -1
 346+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y2LTE127:              break
 347+ F595              ;-*-*-                        IsMemNegative8JumpFalse sign_x, .SignXNotNegative ; just check if its negative
 348+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos = - xpos
 349+ F595              ;-*-*-.SignXNegative:         ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;       x_pos = -x_pos
 350+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;       .
 351+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;       .
 352+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos end = - xpos end
 353+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos_end)          ;       x_pos_end = -x_pos_end
 354+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;       .
 355+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;       .
 356+ F595              ;-*-*-                        dec     (hl)                    ;       .
 357+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       delta x step = delta x step - delta y step
 358+ F595              ;-*-*-.SignXNotNegative:      ld      hl,(delta_x_step)       ;    delta_x_step -= delta_y_step
 359+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;    .
 360+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;    .
 361+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;    .
 362+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x_step),hl       ;    .
 363+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 364+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- DxFTEDyNotLongest while loop ----------------------;
 365+ F595              ;-*-*-L2DxGTEDy:                ld      bc,(x_pos)              ;    while (x_pos != x_pos_end) loading bc with xppos an de as x_pos_end
 366+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(x_pos_end)          ;    .
 367+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,ix                   ;    load hl as target array
 368+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(y_pos)               ;    by this point y pos must be 8 bit
 369+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    So we are setting up hl as targetArray pointer
 370+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    .
 371+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 372+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Version where longest is not saved ----------------;
 373+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;      switch to alternate registers
 374+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;      load up stepping into alternate registers
 375+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;      .
 376+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,(delta_y_step)       ;      .
 377+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;      .
 378+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(sign_x)              ;      Self modify inc of y_pos
 379+ F595              ;-*-*-                        and     $80                     ;
 380+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.SetWhileInc          ;
 381+ F595              ;-*-*-.SetWhileDec:           ld      a,InstrDECBC
 382+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction), a
 383+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 384+ F595              ;-*-*-.SetWhileInc:           ld      a,InstrINCBC
 385+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction), a
 386+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Update Loop ---------------------------------------;
 387+ F595              ;-*-*-; In loop hl  = target array pointer bc = x_pos,       de = x_pos_end, (we don't need to reatin Y_pos)
 388+ F595              ;-*-*-;         hl' = error                bc'= delta_y_step de'=delta_x_step
 389+ F595              ;-*-*-.WhileLoop:             call    CompareBCDESigned       ;      while x_pos != x_pos_end
 390+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     z                       ;      .
 391+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    L2_plotAtRowLColC       ;        targetArray[y_pos] = x_pos
 392+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;        if error >= 0
 393+ F595              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,h                     ;        .
 394+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.ErrorNegative       ;        .
 395+ F595              ;-*-*-.ErrorPositive:         ClearCarryFlag                  ;             error -= delta_x_step
 396+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;             .
 397+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 398+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl                      ;             y pos for target Array index +2
 399+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl                      ;             as its 16 bit
 400+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileIncInstuction     ;             .
 401+ F595              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,bc                   ;        else error += delta y step
 402+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 403+ F595              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     bc                      ;       x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 404+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 405+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 406+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- ELSE ----------------------------------------------;
 407+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- DX < DY -------------------------------------------;
 408+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 409+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       error = delta x_step - delta y
 410+ F595              ;-*-*-L2DeltaXltDeltaY:       ErrorEquStepMinusDelta delta_x_step, delta_y
 411+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       set exit false
 412+ F595              ;-*-*-                        SetExitFalse                    ; set exit = false
 413+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       if x1 < xmin && y pos > 127 then exit early
 414+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsY1TL0:               ld      hl,(x1Work)             ; if x1 < clip xmin
 415+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ; .
 416+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ; .
 417+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, .X1gteClipMin        ; .
 418+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      c, .X1ltClipMin         ; and y_pos > 127
 419+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;
 420+ F595              ;-*-*-.X1gteClipMin:          ReturnIfHLGT127                 ;    then return
 421+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       if y1 work < 0
 422+ F595              ;-*-*-.X1ltClipMin:           IsAxisLT0 (y1Work)              ; if y1 < 0             ;
 423+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.Y1IsNotLT0           ; .
 424+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = delta x step * (-y1)
 425+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1IsLT0:               ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;    temp = (0 - y1) * delta_x_step;
 426+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    . (0 - y1 also equals negate HL)
 427+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;    .
 428+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;    .
 429+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;    .
 430+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;    .
 431+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor_divq (temp, delta y step)
 432+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;    msd = floor_divq (temp, delta_y_step);
 433+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... rem calculation now done in floor macro above into de
 434+ F595              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;    .
 435+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (rem),de                ;    As DE = reminder we can do rem = temp % delta_y_step; for free
 436+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos = xpos + msd
 437+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;    x pos += msd (move msd to de)
 438+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    .            (pull in x1temp and add de)
 439+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 440+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .            (store result in x_pos)
 441+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... if xpos > xmax
 442+ F595              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTClipXMax:      ld      de,(clip_xmax)          ;    if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 443+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 444+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ...    or (pos = xmax && rem >= delta y) then return
 445+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XPosLTEXMax          ;    .
 446+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     nc                      ;    .
 447+ F595              ;-*-*-.XPosLTEXMax:           ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ;    if x_pos == clip_xmin
 448+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 449+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.XneClipMax          ;    and rem >= deltay
 450+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(rem)                ;    .
 451+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 452+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 453+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     c                       ;    then return
 454+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... save rem and set y pos to 0
 455+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    save rem
 456+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,0                    ;    y_pos = 0
 457+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... error = error + rem
 458+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),hl              ;    error += rem
 459+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;    .
 460+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 461+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;    .
 462+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... if rem >= delta y
 463+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    if (rem >= delta_y)
 464+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 465+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 466+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.RemGTEDeltaY         ;    .
 467+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.RemGTEDeltaY        ;    .
 468+ F595              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... x pos = x pos + 1
 469+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,x_pos                ;       ++x_pos
 470+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     (hl)                    ;       .
 471+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       error += delta_y_step
 472+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .
 473+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .
 474+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;       .
 475+ F595              ;-*-*-.RemGTEDeltaY:
 476+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y1IsNotLT0:
 477+ F595              ;-*-*-.XneClipMax:            ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;  y_pos_end = y2
 478+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 479+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,127                  ;  y_pos_end = (y_pos_end < 127)?y_pos_end+1:128
 480+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;  .
 481+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.YPosEndlt127        ;  .
 482+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,128                  ;  .
 483+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .DoneXneClipMax         ;  .
 484+ F595              ;-*-*-.YPosEndlt127:          inc     hl                      ;  .
 485+ F595              ;-*-*-.DoneXneClipMax:        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 486+ F595              ;-*-*-                                                        ; if sign_x == -1
 487+ F595              ;-*-*-.Y2LTE127:              IsMemNegative8JumpFalse sign_x, .SignXNotNegative
 488+ F595              ;-*-*-.SignXNegative:         ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    x_pos = -x_pos
 489+ F595              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    .
 490+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .
 491+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;    x_pos_end = -x_pos_end
 492+ F595              ;-*-*-.SignXNotNegative:      ld      hl,(delta_y_step)       ; delta_y_step -= delta_x_step
 493+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 494+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; .
 495+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 496+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 497+ F595              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 498+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Dx < Dy Longest while loop ------------------------;
 499+ F595              ;-*-*-L2DxLTDy:               ld      hl,(y_pos)              ;       starty=y_pos
 500+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (starty),hl             ;       .
 501+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Version where longest issaved ---------------------;
 502+ F595              ;-*-*-.LoadAlternateRegs:     ld      bc,(y_pos)              ;       we already have IY so just need xpos and end
 503+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(y_pos_end)
 504+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      iy,(x_pos)
 505+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,ix                   ;    load hl as target array
 506+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,c                     ;    by this point y pos must be 8 bit
 507+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    So we are setting up hl as targetArray pointer
 508+ F595              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a
 509+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       switch to alternate registers
 510+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       load up stepping into alternate registers
 511+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;       and error
 512+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,(delta_y_step)       ;
 513+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       and then switch back to main registers
 514+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(sign_x)              ;       if Sign x is -1
 515+ F595              ;-*-*-                        and     $80                     ;       .
 516+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.SetWhileInc          ;       .
 517+ F595              ;-*-*-.SetWhileDec:           ld      a,InstrDECIY
 518+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; set self modifying to dec and 2 byte instruction
 519+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop:             ;       .
 520+ F595              ;-*-*-.SetWhileInc:           ld      a,InstrINCIY
 521+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; else set to inc
 522+ F595              ;-*-*-;--- Update Loop ---------------------------------------;
 523+ F595              ;-*-*-; In loop hl  = target array pointer bc = x_pos,       de = x_pos_end, (we don't need to reatin Y_pos)
 524+ F595              ;-*-*-;         hl' = error                bc'= delta_y_step de'=delta_x_step
 525+ F595              ;-*-*-;- we coudl optimise by setting bc to y_pos_end - y_pos +1 and just doing djnz
 526+ F595              ;-*-*-.WhileLoop:             call    CompareBCDESigned       ;      while y_pos != y_pos_end
 527+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret     z                       ;      .
 528+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyl
 529+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    L2_plotAtRowLColA       ; targetArray[y_pos] = x_pos
 530+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 531+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyh
 532+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      (hl),a
 533+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 534+ F595              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;        if error >= 0
 535+ F595              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,h                     ;        .
 536+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.ErrorNegative       ;        .
 537+ F595              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     iy                      ;             x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 538+ F595              ;-*-*-.ErrorPositive:         ClearCarryFlag                  ;             error -= delta_y_step
 539+ F595              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,bc                   ;             .
 540+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .LoopEnd                ;             .
 541+ F595              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,de                   ;        else error += delta x step
 542+ F595              ;-*-*-.LoopEnd:               exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 543+ F595              ;-*-*-                        inc     bc                      ;        ++y_pos
 544+ F595              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 545+ F595              ;-*-*-
 546+ F595              ;-*-*-
 547+ F595              ;-*-*-;---------------------------------
 548+ F595              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColC:      ld      a,c
 549+ F595              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColA:      push    bc,,de,,hl,,af
 550+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 551+ F595              ;-*-*-                        push    af
 552+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 553+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      b,l
 554+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      c,a
 555+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,$FF                   ; white for now
 556+ F595              ;-*-*-                        call    l2_plot_pixel
 557+ F595              ;-*-*-                        pop     af
 558+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 559+ F595              ;-*-*-                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,af
 560+ F595              ;-*-*-                        ret
 561+ F595              ;-*-*-
 562+ F595
 563+ F595 00 00        x1                      dw 0
 564+ F597 00 00        y1                      dw 0
 565+ F599 00 00        x2                      dw 0
 566+ F59B 00 00        y2                      dw 0
 567+ F59D 00 00        savex1                  dw 0
 568+ F59F 00 00        savey1                  dw 0
 569+ F5A1 00 00        savex2                  dw 0
 570+ F5A3 00 00        savey2                  dw 0
 571+ F5A5 00 00        temp                    dw 0
 572+ F5A7 00           longest:                DB 0
 573+ F5A8 00 00        x1Work:                 DW 0
 574+ F5AA 00 00        y1Work:                 DW 0
 575+ F5AC 00 00        x2Work:                 DW 0
 576+ F5AE 00 00        y2Work:                 DW 0
 577+ F5B0 00 00        x_pos:                  DW 0
 578+ F5B2 00 00        y_pos:                  DW 0
 579+ F5B4 00 00        x_pos_end:              DW 0
 580+ F5B6 00 00        y_pos_end:              DW 0
 581+ F5B8 00 00        clip_xmax:              DW 0
 582+ F5BA 00 00        clip_xmin:              DW 0
 583+ F5BC 00 00        sign_x                  DW 0
 584+ F5BE 00           sign_y                  DB 0
 585+ F5BF 00 00        delta_x                 DW 0
 586+ F5C1 00 00        delta_y                 DW 0
 587+ F5C3 00 00        delta_y_x               DW 0 ; holds the compressed version for elite line draw
 588+ F5C5 00 00        delta_x_step            DW 0
 589+ F5C7 00 00        delta_y_step            DW 0
 590+ F5C9 00 00        linetemp                DW 0
 591+ F5CB 00 00        gradient                DW 0
 592+ F5CD 00 00        tSlope                  DW 0
 593+ F5CF 00 00        msd                     DW 0
 594+ F5D1 00 00        error                   DW 0
 595+ F5D3 00           set_exit                DB 0
 596+ F5D4 00 00        rem                     DW 0
 597+ F5D6              InstrDECBC              equ $0B
 598+ F5D6              InstrINCBC              equ $03
 599+ F5D6              InstrDECIY              equ $2B
 600+ F5D6              InstrINCIY              equ $23
 601+ F5D6
 602+ F5D6              MACROAequBMinusC16:     MACRO   pA, pB, pC
 603+ F5D6 ~                                    ld      hl,(pB)                         ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 604+ F5D6 ~                                    ld      de,(pC)                         ; .
 605+ F5D6 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 606+ F5D6 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 607+ F5D6 ~                                    ld      (pA),hl
 608+ F5D6                                      ENDM
 609+ F5D6              ;--- Swaps point 1 and point 2 around (i.e x1 y1 <--> x2 y2)
 610+ F5D6 2A 97 F5     SwapCoords:             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       then swap point 1 and point 2
 611+ F5D9 ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ;       .
 612+ F5DD ED 53 97 F5                          ld      (y1),de                         ;       .
 613+ F5E1 22 9B F5                             ld      (y2),hl                         ;       .
 614+ F5E4 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 615+ F5E7 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;       .
 616+ F5EB ED 53 95 F5                          ld      (x1),de                         ;       .
 617+ F5EF 22 99 F5                             ld      (x2),hl                         ;       .
 618+ F5F2 C9                                   ret
 619+ F5F3
 620+ F5F3                      ; DEFINE SPLITLINE 1
 621+ F5F3
 622+ F5F3                      DEFINE CLIPPED_LINEX 1
 623+ F5F3                      DEFINE SPLITORLINEX  1
 624+ F5F3                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 624+ F5F3 ~
 625+ F5F3 ~            l2_draw_clipped_line:
 626+ F5F3                      ENDIF
 627+ F5F3                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 627+ F5F3
 628+ F5F3              l2_draw_clipped_lineX:
 629+ F5F3                      ENDIF
 630+ F5F3                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 631+ F5F3 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 632+ F5F6 ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 633+ F5FA CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 634+ F5FD DA 03 F6                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 635+ F600 CD D6 F5     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 636+ F603              .NoSwapCoords:
 637+ F603 ED 5B 97 F5  .CalcDX:                ld      de,(y1)                         ; Calculate |dy|
 638+ F607 2A 9B F5                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ; .
 639+ F60A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 639+ F60A B7          >                        or a
 640+ F60B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 641+ F60D E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ; iy = |dy|
 642+ F610 ED 5B 95 F5  .CalcDy:                ld      de,(x1)                         ; Calculate |dx|
 643+ F614 2A 99 F5                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ; .
 644+ F617 06 00                                ld      b,0                             ; assume x1 < x2 and assume no negate needed
 645+ F619 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;
 646+ F61C D2 21 F6                             jp      nc,.DxNoSwap                     ;
 647+ F61F EB           .DxSwap:                ex      de,hl                           ; swap just x over
 648+ F620 04                                   inc     b                               ; and flag that we had to do it
 649+ F621              .DxNoSwap:              ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 649+ F621 B7          >                        or a
 650+ F622 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;
 651+ F624 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl                           ; ix = |dx|
 652+ F627 DD 7C        .CheckForHuge:          ld      a,ixh                           ; if either dx or dy > 255 then split line
 653+ F629 FD B4                                or      iyh                             ; .
 654+ F62B C2 3F F6                             jp      nz, .BreakNeeded                ; .
 655+ F62E DD 7D        .ChecktGT180:           ld      a,ixl
 656+ F630 FE B4                                cp      180
 657+ F632 D2 3F F6                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 658+ F635 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 659+ F637 FE B4                                cp      180
 660+ F639 D2 3F F6                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 661+ F63C C3 A3 F6                             jp      .noBreakNeeded
 662+ F63F              .BreakNeeded:           ldCopy2Byte y1, savey1                  ;       savey1 = y1                     create savey1 (y1) to savey2 (y break)
 662+ F63F 2A 97 F5    >                        ld       hl,(y1)
 662+ F642 22 9F F5    >                        ld       (savey1),hl
 663+ F645                                      ShiftIYRight1                           ;       savey2 = y1 + (work_dy/2)
 663+ F645 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 663+ F647 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 663+ F649 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 663+ F64B FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 663+ F64D 1F          >			   rra
 663+ F64E FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 664+ F650 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       .
 665+ F653                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 665+ F653 B7          >                        or a
 666+ F654 FD 54 FD 5D                          ld      de,iy
 667+ F658 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 668+ F65A 22 A3 F5                             ld      (savey2),hl                     ;       .
 669+ F65D 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       y1     = savey2, y2 untouched   create y1 (break) to y2
 670+ F660 05                                   dec     b                               ;       if b was 1 then decb would set z flag so we know that x1 > x2
 671+ F661 C2 67 F6                             jp      nz,.X1gtX2
 672+ F664 CD D6 F5     .X1lteX2:               call    SwapCoords
 673+ F667              .X1gtX2:                ldCopy2Byte x1, savex1                  ;       savex1 = x1                     create savex1 (x1) to savex2 (x break)
 673+ F667 2A 95 F5    >                        ld       hl,(x1)
 673+ F66A 22 9D F5    >                        ld       (savex1),hl
 674+ F66D                                      ShiftIXRight1                           ;       savex2 = x1 + (work_dx/2)
 674+ F66D DD 7C       >			   ld 	a,ixh
 674+ F66F CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 674+ F671 DD 67       >			   ld	ixh,a
 674+ F673 DD 7D       >			   ld 	a,ixl
 674+ F675 1F          >			   rra
 674+ F676 DD 6F       >			   ld	ixl,a
 675+ F678 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 676+ F67B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 676+ F67B B7          >                        or a
 677+ F67C DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 678+ F680 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 679+ F682 22 A1 F5                             ld      (savex2),hl                     ;       .
 680+ F685 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       x1     = savex1, x2 untouched  create x1 (break to x2)
 681+ F688                      ENDIF
 682+ F688                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 683+ F688 ~                                    call    l2_draw_short_line              ;       drawshortLine
 684+ F688                      ENDIF
 685+ F688                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 686+ F688 CD A3 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line
 687+ F68B                      ENDIF
 688+ F68B                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 689+ F68B                                      ldCopyWord savex1,x1
 689+ F68B             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex1, x1
 689+ F68B 2A 9D F5    >                        ld       hl,(savex1)
 689+ F68E 22 95 F5    >                        ld       (x1),hl
 690+ F691                                      ldCopyWord savey1,y1
 690+ F691             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey1, y1
 690+ F691 2A 9F F5    >                        ld       hl,(savey1)
 690+ F694 22 97 F5    >                        ld       (y1),hl
 691+ F697                                      ldCopyWord savex2,x2
 691+ F697             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex2, x2
 691+ F697 2A A1 F5    >                        ld       hl,(savex2)
 691+ F69A 22 99 F5    >                        ld       (x2),hl
 692+ F69D                                      ldCopyWord savey2,y2
 692+ F69D             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey2, y2
 692+ F69D 2A A3 F5    >                        ld       hl,(savey2)
 692+ F6A0 22 9B F5    >                        ld       (y2),hl
 693+ F6A3              .noBreakNeeded:         // Falls straight into l2_draw_short_line
 694+ F6A3                      ENDIF
 695+ F6A3                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 695+ F6A3 ~
 696+ F6A3 ~            l2_draw_short_line:     ; check out of bounds
 697+ F6A3                      ENDIF
 698+ F6A3                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 699+ F6A3              l2_draw_clipped_line:
 700+ F6A3                      ENDIF
 701+ F6A3                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 702+ F6A3 2A 95 F5     CheckForOnScreen:       ld      hl,(x1)
 703+ F6A6 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)
 704+ F6AA CB 7C        .X1X2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 705+ F6AC 28 03                                jr      z,.X1X2NotNegative
 706+ F6AE CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 707+ F6B0 C0           .X1X2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 708+ F6B1 7C           .X1X2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 709+ F6B2 AA                                   xor     d
 710+ F6B3 FA BE F6                             jp      m,.X1X2SpanScreen
 711+ F6B6 7C           .X1X2BothPositive:      ld      a,h                             ; if x1 or x2 high is zero then at least one pixel is on screen
 712+ F6B7 A7                                   and     a
 713+ F6B8 CA BE F6                             jp      z,.X1X2SpanScreen
 714+ F6BB 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if x1 was > 255 then if x2 > 255 bail out
 715+ F6BC A7                                   and     a
 716+ F6BD C0                                   ret     nz
 717+ F6BE 2A 97 F5     .X1X2SpanScreen:        ld      hl,(y1)
 718+ F6C1 ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)
 719+ F6C5 CB 7C        .Y1Y2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 720+ F6C7 28 03                                jr      z,.Y1Y2NotNegative
 721+ F6C9 CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 722+ F6CB C0           .Y1Y2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 723+ F6CC 7C           .Y1Y2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 724+ F6CD AA                                   xor     d
 725+ F6CE FA E0 F6                             jp      m,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 726+ F6D1 01 80 00     .Y1Y2BothPositive:      ld      bc,128                          ; if they are both positive and at least one is < 128 then carry on
 727+ F6D4 CD 56 98                             call    CompareHLBC
 728+ F6D7 38 07                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 729+ F6D9 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; save y1 into de
 730+ F6DA CD 56 98                             call    CompareHLBC
 731+ F6DD 38 01                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 732+ F6DF C9                                   ret
 733+ F6E0              .Y1Y2SpanScreen:
 734+ F6E0 CD 39 98     CheckForHorizontal:     call    CompareHLDESame                 ; de = saved y1 , hl = y2
 735+ F6E3 CA CD F4                             jp      z, l2_drawVertClip
 736+ F6E6 2A 95 F5     CheckForVertical:       ld      hl,(x1)
 737+ F6E9 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)
 738+ F6ED CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame
 739+ F6F0 CA FE F4                             jp      z, l2_drawHorzClip
 740+ F6F3                                      ; Need horizontal and vertical optimisation code in at thispoint
 741+ F6F3 2A 97 F5     CheckForSwap:           ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 742+ F6F6 ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 743+ F6FA CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 744+ F6FD DA 03 F7                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 745+ F700 CD D6 F5     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 746+ F703                                      ; Default in sign and clip ranges, sign 16 bit for now
 747+ F703 21 00 00     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,0                            ; clip_xmin = 0;
 748+ F706 22 BA F5                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ; .
 749+ F709 2E FF                                ld      l,255                           ; clip xmax = 255;
 750+ F70B 22 B8 F5                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ; .
 751+ F70E 21 01 00                             ld      hl,1                            ; sign_x = 1
 752+ F711 22 BC F5                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ; .
 753+ F714                                      ; if moving right to left then swap signs and clip
 754+ F714 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 > x2
 755+ F717 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; .
 756+ F71B CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 757+ F71E 38 2C                                jr      c,.X1tlX2                       ; .
 758+ F720 21 FF FF     .X1gteX2:               ld      hl, -1                          ;        sign_x = 01
 759+ F723 22 BC F5                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ;        .
 760+ F726 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        x1 = -x1;
 761+ F729                                      macronegate16hl                         ;        .
 761+ F729 AF          >					xor 	a
 761+ F72A 95          >					sub 	l
 761+ F72B 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 761+ F72C 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 761+ F72D 94          >					sub 	h
 761+ F72E 67          >					ld 		h,a
 762+ F72F 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;        .
 763+ F732 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;        x2 = -x2;
 764+ F736                                      macronegate16de                         ;        .
 764+ F736 AF          >					xor 	a
 764+ F737 93          >                    sub 	e
 764+ F738 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 764+ F739 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 764+ F73A 92          >                    sub 	d
 764+ F73B 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 765+ F73C ED 53 99 F5                          ld      (x2),de                         ;        .
 766+ F740 21 01 FF                             ld      hl,-255                         ;        clip_xmin =-255;
 767+ F743 22 BA F5                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ;        .
 768+ F746 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;        clip_xmax = 0;
 769+ F749 22 B8 F5                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ;        .
 770+ F74C              .X1tlX2:                                                        ;
 771+ F74C                                      ; calculate deltas
 772+ F74C 2A 99 F5     .DxEquX2MinusX1:        ld      hl,(x2)                         ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
 773+ F74F ED 5B 95 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ; .
 774+ F753                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 774+ F753 B7          >                        or a
 775+ F754 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 776+ F756 22 BF F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; .
 777+ F759 2A 9B F5     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,(y2)                         ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
 778+ F75C ED 5B 97 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; .
 779+ F760                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 779+ F760 B7          >                        or a
 780+ F761 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 781+ F763 22 C1 F5                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
 782+ F766 ED 5B BF F5  .ScaleDeltaXY:          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ; we already have delta y but x could be negative
 783+ F76A 06 00                                ld      b,0
 784+ F76C CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 785+ F76E CA 78 F7                             jp      z,.DeltaYABSDone                ; de = | de |, b = 1 to denote negative needs resetting
 786+ F771 04                                   inc     b
 787+ F772                                      macronegate16de
 787+ F772 AF          >					xor 	a
 787+ F773 93          >                    sub 	e
 787+ F774 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 787+ F775 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 787+ F776 92          >                    sub 	d
 787+ F777 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 788+ F778              .DeltaYABSDone:
 789+ F778 ~            /*.ScaleHighLoop:         ld      a,d
 790+ F778 ~                                    or      h
 791+ F778 ~                                    jr      z,.HighScaleDone
 792+ F778 ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 793+ F778 ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 794+ F778 ~                                    jp      .ScaleHighLoop
 795+ F778 ~            .HighScaleDone:
 796+ F778 ~            .LowScaleLoop:          ld      a,e
 797+ F778 ~                                    or      l
 798+ F778 ~                                    and     $80
 799+ F778 ~                                    jr      z,.LowScaleDone
 800+ F778 ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 801+ F778 ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 802+ F778 ~                                    jp      .LowScaleLoop
 803+ F778 ~            .LowScaleDone:          bit     0,b
 804+ F778 ~                                    jr      z,.DeltaDone
 805+ F778 ~            .SortDXSign:            macronegate16de
 806+ F778 ~            .DeltaDone:             ld      (delta_x),de
 807+ F778 ~                                    ld      (delta_y),hl*/
 808+ F778 2A BF F5     .DeltaXStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_x)
 809+ F77B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_x_step = 2 * delta_x;
 809+ F77B B7          >                        or a
 810+ F77C ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 811+ F77E 22 C5 F5                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ; .
 812+ F781 2A C1 F5     .DeltaYStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_y)
 813+ F784                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_y_step = 2 * delta_y;
 813+ F784 B7          >                        or a
 814+ F785 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 815+ F787 22 C7 F5                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ; .
 816+ F78A 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x_pos = x1;
 817+ F78D 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ; .
 818+ F790 ED 5B 97 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; y_pos = y1;
 819+ F794 ED 53 B2 F5                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ; .
 820+ F798                                      ; check if we are workign on dx or dy
 821+ F798 2A BF F5     .CompareDxDy:           ld      hl,(delta_x)                    ; if (delta_x >= delta_y)
 822+ F79B ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)
 823+ F79F CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn
 824+ F7A2 DA E9 F9                             jp      c, LineDrawDxLTDy
 825+ F7A5              ;.......................DxGteDy branch.............................................................................................
 826+ F7A5 2A C7 F5     LineDrawDxGteDy:        ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 827+ F7A8 ED 5B BF F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;       .
 828+ F7AC                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 828+ F7AC B7          >                        or a
 829+ F7AD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;       .
 830+ F7AF 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;       .
 831+ F7B2                                      ZeroA                                   ;       set exit false (0 == false)
 831+ F7B2 AF          >                        xor a
 832+ F7B3 32 D3 F5                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;       .
 833+ F7B6                                      ; clipping of negative y1
 834+ F7B6 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       if (y1 < 0)
 835+ F7B9 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;       .
 836+ F7BB CA 53 F8                             jp      z,.y1GTE0                       ;       .
 837+ F7BE 2A 97 F5     .y1LT0:                 ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (0 - y1) - 1) * delta_x;
 838+ F7C1                                      macronegate16hl                         ;               hl = |y1|
 838+ F7C1 AF          >					xor 	a
 838+ F7C2 95          >					sub 	l
 838+ F7C3 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 838+ F7C4 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 838+ F7C5 94          >					sub 	h
 838+ F7C6 67          >					ld 		h,a
 839+ F7C7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 839+ F7C7 B7          >                        or a
 840+ F7C8 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2 * |y1|)
 841+ F7CA 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 * |y1| - 1)
 842+ F7CB ED 5B BF F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               hl = hl * delta_x
 843+ F7CF CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 844+ F7D2 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               save to temp
 845+ F7D5 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_y_step
 846+ F7D7 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 847+ F7DB CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 848+ F7DE ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 849+ F7E2 2A B0 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            x_pos += msd
 850+ F7E5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 850+ F7E5 B7          >                        or a
 851+ F7E6 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
 852+ F7E8 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;            .
 853+ F7EB ED 5B B8 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmax)
 854+ F7EF CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
 855+ F7F2 CA F9 F7                             jp      z,.xposLTEClipxmax              ;            .
 856+ F7F5 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 857+ F7F8 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
 858+ F7F9 2A B0 F5     .xposLTEClipxmax:       ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmin)
 859+ F7FC ED 5B BA F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;            .
 860+ F800 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 861+ F803 DA 53 F8                             jp      c,.xposLTxmin                   ;            .
 862+ F806 2A CF F5     .xposGTExmin:           ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_y_step) (its really IY from floor_divq)
 863+ F809 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_y_step
 864+ F80D CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 865+ F810 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 866+ F811 2A A5 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
 867+ F814                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 867+ F814 B7          >                        or a
 868+ F815 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 869+ F817 22 D4 F5                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
 870+ F81A 11 00 00                             ld      de,0                            ;               y_pos = 0
 871+ F81D ED 53 B2 F5                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ;               .
 872+ F821 ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_x
 873+ F825                                      ClearCarryFlag
 873+ F825 B7          >                        or a
 874+ F826 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
 875+ F828 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 876+ F829 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
 877+ F82C                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 877+ F82C B7          >                        or a
 878+ F82D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 879+ F82F 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   write to error
 880+ F832 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
 881+ F835 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 882+ F836 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 883+ F837 CA 4E F8                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
 884+ F83A 2A B0 F5     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   x_pos += 1;
 885+ F83D 23                                   inc     hl                              ;                   .
 886+ F83E 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 887+ F841 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
 888+ F844 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   .
 889+ F848                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 889+ F848 B7          >                        or a
 890+ F849 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 891+ F84B 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
 892+ F84E 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
 893+ F850 32 D3 F5                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
 894+ F853              .xposLTxmin:
 895+ F853 3A D3 F5     .y1GTE0:                ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;           if (!set_exit && x1 < clip_xmin)
 896+ F856 A7                                   and     a                               ;           .
 897+ F857 C2 E7 F8                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;           .   Exit if set_exit is true
 898+ F85A 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;           .
 899+ F85D ED 5B BA F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;           .   Exit if x1 > xmin
 900+ F861 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 901+ F864 D2 E7 F8                             jp      nc,.exit_false                  ;           .
