 902+ F867 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 903+ F868 ED 5B 95 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   (clip_xmin - x1) (already have clip_xmin in de)
 904+ F86C                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 904+ F86C B7          >                        or a
 905+ F86D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 906+ F86F ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 907+ F873 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 908+ F876 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;                   .
 909+ F879 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;               msd = temp / delta_x_step
 910+ F87B ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                  BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 911+ F87F CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;                  .
 912+ F882 ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;                  .
 913+ F886 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;                  save BC%DE into HL (temp % delta x step0
 914+ F889 2A B2 F5     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               y_pos += msd
 915+ F88C                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   bc already is msd
 915+ F88C B7          >                        or a
 916+ F88D ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;                   hl += bc
 917+ F88F 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 918+ F892 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy                           ;               rem = temp % delta_x_step (which is in IY)
 919+ F895 22 D4 F5                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;               .
 920+ F898 2A B2 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;           if ((y_pos > 127) || (y_pos == 127 && rem >= delta_x))
 921+ F89B 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 922+ F89E CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if y_pos != clipxmax skip the abort test
 923+ F8A1 20 0B                                jr      nz,.YPosNotClipymax             ;           .
 924+ F8A3 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
 925+ F8A6 ED 5B BF F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;           .
 926+ F8AA CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 927+ F8AD D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
 928+ F8AE EB           .YPosNotClipymax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
 929+ F8AF CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
 930+ F8B2 D8                                   ret     c
 931+ F8B3 2A BA F5     .yposLT127:             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin;
 932+ F8B6 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;               .
 933+ F8B9 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               error += rem
 934+ F8BC ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               .
 935+ F8C0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 935+ F8C0 B7          >                        or a
 936+ F8C1 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;               .
 937+ F8C3 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;               .
 938+ F8C6 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem >= delta_x)
 939+ F8C9 ED 5B BF F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               .
 940+ F8CD CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;               .
 941+ F8D0 DA E7 F8                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaX                  ;               .
 942+ F8D3 2A B2 F5     .remGTEDeltaX:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos++
 943+ F8D6 23                                   inc     hl
 944+ F8D7 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
 945+ F8DA 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                    error -= delta_x_step;
 946+ F8DD ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                    .
 947+ F8E1                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                    .
 947+ F8E1 B7          >                        or a
 948+ F8E2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                    .
 949+ F8E4 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                    .
 950+ F8E7              .remLTDeltaX:
 951+ F8E7 2A 99 F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           x_pos_end = x2;
 952+ F8EA 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
 953+ F8ED 2A 9B F5                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           if (y2 > 127)
 954+ F8F0 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 955+ F8F3 CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .   if y2 is zero fails check
 956+ F8F6 CA 4D F9                             jp      z,.y2LTE127                     ;           .
 957+ F8F9 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .   if y2 < 127 then there is carry so fails check
 958+ F8FC DA 4D F9                             jp      c,.y2LTE127                      ;           .
 959+ F8FF 21 7F 00     .y2GT127:               ld      hl,127                          ;               temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x;
 960+ F902 ED 5B 97 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
 961+ F906                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 961+ F906 B7          >                        or a
 962+ F907 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 963+ F909 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (127-y1)
 964+ F90D CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 965+ F910 ED 5B BF F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;                   hl += delta_x
 966+ F914                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 966+ F914 B7          >                        or a
 967+ F915 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 968+ F917 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
 969+ F91A 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 970+ F91C ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta y step
 971+ F920 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 972+ F923 ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 973+ F927 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;               x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 974+ F92A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 974+ F92A B7          >                        or a
 975+ F92B ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
 976+ F92D 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
 977+ F930 2A CF F5                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end
 978+ F933 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               .
 979+ F937 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 980+ F93A EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
 981+ F93B 2A A5 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
 982+ F93E                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 982+ F93E B7          >                        or a
 983+ F93F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
 984+ F941 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 985+ F942 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 986+ F943 C2 4D F9                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
 987+ F946 2A B4 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
 988+ F949 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
 989+ F94A 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
 990+ F94D              .NotTheSame:
 991+ F94D 2A B4 F5     .y2LTE127:              ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           x_pos_end = min (x_pos_end,clip_xmax) + 1
 992+ F950 ED 5B B8 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
 993+ F954 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 994+ F957 D2 64 F9                             jp      nc,.xposgtexmax                 ;           .
 995+ F95A 2A B4 F5     .xposltxmax:            ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           .
 996+ F95D 23                                   inc     hl                              ;               x_pos_end+1
 997+ F95E 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
 998+ F961 C3 69 F9                             jp      .DoneXposAdjust                 ;               .
 999+ F964 13           .xposgtexmax:           inc     de                              ;               else
1000+ F965 ED 53 B4 F5                          ld      (x_pos_end),de                  ;               clip_xmax+1
1001+ F969 3A BC F5     .DoneXposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1002+ F96C 3C                                   inc     a
1003+ F96D C2 88 F9                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1004+ F970 2A B0 F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1005+ F973                                      macronegate16hl
1005+ F973 AF          >					xor 	a
1005+ F974 95          >					sub 	l
1005+ F975 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1005+ F976 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1005+ F977 94          >					sub 	h
1005+ F978 67          >					ld 		h,a
1006+ F979 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1007+ F97C 2A B4 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1008+ F97F                                      macronegate16hl
1008+ F97F AF          >					xor 	a
1008+ F980 95          >					sub 	l
1008+ F981 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1008+ F982 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1008+ F983 94          >					sub 	h
1008+ F984 67          >					ld 		h,a
1009+ F985 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1010+ F988              .y2LTE27:
1011+ F988              .SignNotMinus1:
1012+ F988 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;        delta_x_step -= delta_y_step;
1013+ F98C 2A C5 F5                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;        .
1014+ F98F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1014+ F98F B7          >                        or a
1015+ F990 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1016+ F992 22 C5 F5                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ;        .
1017+ F995 2A B0 F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;        while (x_pos != x_pos_end)
1018+ F998 ED 5B B4 F5                          ld      de,(x_pos_end)                  ;        .
1019+ F99C CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;        .
1020+ F99F C8                                   ret     z                               ;        .
1021+ F9A0 2A B0 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1022+ F9A3 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ;               .
1023+ F9A4 2A B2 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               .
1024+ F9A7 45                                   ld      b,l                             ;               .
1025+ F9A8 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF                           ;               .
1026+ F9AA CD B6 E2     .PlotPixel:             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               .
1027+ F9AD 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1028+ F9B0 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;               .
1029+ F9B2 C2 CC F9                             jp      nz,.errorLT0                    ;               .
1030+ F9B5 2A B2 F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   ++y_pos;
1031+ F9B8 23                                   inc	    hl                              ;                   .
1032+ F9B9 22 B2 F5                             ld	    (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
1033+ F9BC 2A D1 F5                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_x_step;
1034+ F9BF ED 5B C5 F5                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   .
1035+ F9C3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1035+ F9C3 B7          >                        or a
1036+ F9C4 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de                           ;                   .
1037+ F9C6 22 D1 F5                             ld	    (error),hl                      ;                   .
1038+ F9C9 C3 D9 F9                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust                ;                   .
1039+ F9CC 2A D1 F5     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
1040+ F9CF ED 5B C7 F5                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1041+ F9D3                                      ClearCarryFlag
1041+ F9D3 B7          >                        or a
1042+ F9D4 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1043+ F9D6 22 D1 F5                             ld	    (error),hl
1044+ F9D9 ED 5B BC F5  .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      de,(sign_x)
1045+ F9DD 2A B0 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1046+ F9E0                                      ClearCarryFlag
1046+ F9E0 B7          >                        or a
1047+ F9E1 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1048+ F9E3 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1049+ F9E6 C3 95 F9                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1050+ F9E9              ;.......................DxGltDy branch.............................................................................................
1051+ F9E9              LineDrawDxLTDy:         ;ret
1052+ F9E9 2A C5 F5                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;       error = delta_x_step - delta_y;
1053+ F9EC ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)
1054+ F9F0                                      ClearCarryFlag
1054+ F9F0 B7          >                        or a
1055+ F9F1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1056+ F9F3 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl
1057+ F9F6                                      ZeroA                                   ;        set exit false (0 == false)
1057+ F9F6 AF          >                        xor a
1058+ F9F7 32 D3 F5                             ld      (set_exit),a
1059+ F9FA 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        if (x1 < clip_xmin)
1060+ F9FD ED 5B BA F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;        .
1061+ FA01 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;        .
1062+ FA04 D2 98 FA                             jp      nc,.x1GTEClipXmin               ;        .
1063+ FA07 ED 5B 95 F5  .x1LTClipXmin:          ld      de,(x1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (cllp_xmin - x1) - 1) * delta_y;
1064+ FA0B 2A BA F5                             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               hl = clip_xmin - x1
1065+ FA0E                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1065+ FA0E B7          >                        or a
1066+ FA0F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1067+ FA11                                      ClearCarryFlag
1067+ FA11 B7          >                        or a
1068+ FA12 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2* hl)
1069+ FA14 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 *  hl - 1)
1070+ FA15 ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;               hl = hl  * delta_y
1071+ FA19 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1072+ FA1C 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               .
1073+ FA1F 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_x_step
1074+ FA21 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1075+ FA25 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1076+ FA28 ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1077+ FA2C 2A B2 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            y_pos += msd
1078+ FA2F                                      ClearCarryFlag
1078+ FA2F B7          >                        or a
1079+ FA30 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
1080+ FA32 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;            .
1081+ FA35 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;            if (y_pos >= 127)
1082+ FA38 CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
1083+ FA3B CA 42 FA                             jp      z,.yposGT127                    ;            .
1084+ FA3E CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
1085+ FA41 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
1086+ FA42 2A B2 F5     .yposGT127:             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            if (y_pos >= 0)
1087+ FA45 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1088+ FA47 C2 98 FA                             jp      nz,.yposLT0
1089+ FA4A 2A CF F5     .yposGT0:               ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_x_step)
1090+ FA4D ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_x_step
1091+ FA51 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1092+ FA54 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1093+ FA55 2A A5 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
1094+ FA58                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1094+ FA58 B7          >                        or a
1095+ FA59 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1096+ FA5B 22 D4 F5                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
1097+ FA5E ED 5B BA F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin
1098+ FA62 ED 53 B0 F5                          ld      (x_pos),de                      ;               .
1099+ FA66 ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_y
1100+ FA6A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1100+ FA6A B7          >                        or a
1101+ FA6B ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
1102+ FA6D EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1103+ FA6E 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
1104+ FA71                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1104+ FA71 B7          >                        or a
1105+ FA72 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1106+ FA74 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
1107+ FA77 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
1108+ FA7A 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1109+ FA7B B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1110+ FA7C CA 93 FA                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
1111+ FA7F 2A B2 F5     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos += 1;
1112+ FA82 23                                   inc     hl
1113+ FA83 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1114+ FA86 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1115+ FA89 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)
1116+ FA8D                                      ClearCarryFlag
1116+ FA8D B7          >                        or a
1117+ FA8E ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1118+ FA90 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl
1119+ FA93 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
1120+ FA95 32 D3 F5                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
1121+ FA98
1122+ FA98              .yposLT0:
1123+ FA98 3A D3 F5     .x1GTEClipXmin:         ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;        if (!set_exit && y1 < 0)
1124+ FA9B A7                                   and     a                               ;        .
1125+ FA9C C2 26 FB                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;        .  if exit is 1 then its true so exit branch
1126+ FA9F 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;        .  if y1 is positive (including 0) then exit branch
1127+ FAA2 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;        .
1128+ FAA4 CA 26 FB                             jp      z,.exit_false                   ;        .
1129+ FAA7 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = delta_x_step * (0 - y1)
1130+ FAAA                                      macronegate16hl                         ;           .
1130+ FAAA AF          >					xor 	a
1130+ FAAB 95          >					sub 	l
1130+ FAAC 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1130+ FAAD 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1130+ FAAE 94          >					sub 	h
1130+ FAAF 67          >					ld 		h,a
1131+ FAB0 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;           .       hl = delta_x_step * (- y1)
1132+ FAB4 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;           .
1133+ FAB7 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;           .
1134+ FABA 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;           msd = temp / delta_y_step
1135+ FABC ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1136+ FAC0 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1137+ FAC3 ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1138+ FAC7 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;               same remainders (which is also mod result)
1139+ FACA 22 D4 F5                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;           rem = temp % delta_y_step (swapped from being after x_pos += msd)
1140+ FACD 2A B0 F5     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           x_pos += msd
1141+ FAD0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .   bc already is msd
1141+ FAD0 B7          >                        or a
1142+ FAD1 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;           .   hl += bc
1143+ FAD3 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;           .
1144+ FAD6 2A B0 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           if ((x_pos > clip_xmax) || (x_pos == clip_xmax && rem >= delta_y))
1145+ FAD9 ED 5B B8 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1146+ FADD CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if xpos != clipxmax skip the abort test
1147+ FAE0 20 0B                                jr      nz,.XPosNotClipxmax             ;           .
1148+ FAE2 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
1149+ FAE5 ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1150+ FAE9 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1151+ FAEC D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
1152+ FAED EB           .XPosNotClipxmax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
1153+ FAEE CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
1154+ FAF1 D8                                   ret     c
1155+ FAF2 21 00 00     .xposLT127:             ld      hl,0                            ;           y_pos = 0;
1156+ FAF5 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;           .
1157+ FAF8 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;           error += rem
1158+ FAFB ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;           .
1159+ FAFF                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .
1159+ FAFF B7          >                        or a
1160+ FB00 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;           .
1161+ FB02 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;           .
1162+ FB05 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           if (rem >= delta_y)
1163+ FB08 ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1164+ FB0C CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1165+ FB0F DA 26 FB                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaY                  ;           .
1166+ FB12 2A B0 F5     .remGTEDeltaY:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                x_pos++
1167+ FB15 23                                   inc     hl
1168+ FB16 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1169+ FB19 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                error -= delta_y_step;
1170+ FB1C ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                .
1171+ FB20                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                .
1171+ FB20 B7          >                        or a
1172+ FB21 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                .
1173+ FB23 22 D1 F5                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                .
1174+ FB26              .remLTDeltaY:
1175+ FB26 2A 9B F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           y_pos_end = y2;
1176+ FB29 22 B6 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1177+ FB2C 2A 99 F5                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           if (x2 > clip_xmax)
1178+ FB2F ED 5B B8 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1179+ FB33 CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .
1180+ FB36 CA 8D FB                             jp      z,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1181+ FB39 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1182+ FB3C DA 8D FB                             jp      c,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1183+ FB3F 2A B8 F5     .x2GTclipxmax:          ld      hl,(clip_xmax)                  ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmax - x1) + delta_y;
1184+ FB42 ED 5B 95 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
1185+ FB46                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1185+ FB46 B7          >                        or a
1186+ FB47 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1187+ FB49 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (clip_xmax - x1)
1188+ FB4D CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1189+ FB50 ED 5B C1 F5                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;                   hl += delta_y
1190+ FB54                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1190+ FB54 B7          >                        or a
1191+ FB55 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1192+ FB57 22 A5 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
1193+ FB5A 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
1194+ FB5C ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta x step
1195+ FB60 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1196+ FB63 ED 43 CF F5                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1197+ FB67 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y_pos_end = y1 + msd;
1198+ FB6A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1198+ FB6A B7          >                        or a
1199+ FB6B ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
1200+ FB6D 22 B6 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1201+ FB70 2A CF F5                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_x_step) == 0) --y_pos_end
1202+ FB73 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               .
1203+ FB77 CD 5F 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1204+ FB7A EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
1205+ FB7B 2A A5 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
1206+ FB7E                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1206+ FB7E B7          >                        or a
1207+ FB7F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1208+ FB81 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1209+ FB82 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1210+ FB83 C2 8D FB                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
1211+ FB86 2A B6 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
1212+ FB89 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
1213+ FB8A 22 B6 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
1214+ FB8D              .NotTheSame:
1215+ FB8D 2A B6 F5     .x2LTEclipxmax:         ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           y_pos_end = min(y_pos_end, clip_ymax) + 1
1216+ FB90 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
1217+ FB93 CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1218+ FB96 D2 A3 FB                             jp      nc,.yposgteymax                 ;           .
1219+ FB99 2A B6 F5     .yposltymax:            ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           .
1220+ FB9C 23                                   inc     hl                              ;           .
1221+ FB9D 22 B6 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1222+ FBA0 C3 A8 FB                             jp      .DoneYposAdjust                 ;           .
1223+ FBA3 13           .yposgteymax:           inc     de                              ;           .
1224+ FBA4 ED 53 B6 F5                          ld      (y_pos_end),de                  ;           .
1225+ FBA8 3A BC F5     .DoneYposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1226+ FBAB 3C                                   inc     a
1227+ FBAC C2 C7 FB                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1228+ FBAF 2A B0 F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1229+ FBB2                                      macronegate16hl
1229+ FBB2 AF          >					xor 	a
1229+ FBB3 95          >					sub 	l
1229+ FBB4 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1229+ FBB5 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1229+ FBB6 94          >					sub 	h
1229+ FBB7 67          >					ld 		h,a
1230+ FBB8 22 B0 F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1231+ FBBB 2A B4 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1232+ FBBE                                      macronegate16hl
1232+ FBBE AF          >					xor 	a
1232+ FBBF 95          >					sub 	l
1232+ FBC0 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1232+ FBC1 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1232+ FBC2 94          >					sub 	h
1232+ FBC3 67          >					ld 		h,a
1233+ FBC4 22 B4 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1234+ FBC7 ED 5B C5 F5  .SignNotMinus1:         ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;        delta_y_step -= delta_x_step;
1235+ FBCB 2A C7 F5                             ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;        .
1236+ FBCE                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1236+ FBCE B7          >                        or a
1237+ FBCF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1238+ FBD1 22 C7 F5                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ;        .
1239+ FBD4 2A B2 F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;        while (y_pos != y_pos_end)
1240+ FBD7 ED 5B B6 F5                          ld      de,(y_pos_end)
1241+ FBDB CD 39 98                             call    CompareHLDESame
1242+ FBDE C8                                   ret     z
1243+ FBDF 2A B0 F5     .PlotPixel:             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1244+ FBE2 4D                                   ld      c,l
1245+ FBE3 2A B2 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)
1246+ FBE6 45                                   ld      b,l
1247+ FBE7 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF
1248+ FBE9 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1249+ FBEC 2A D1 F5                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1250+ FBEF CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1251+ FBF1 C2 11 FC                             jp      nz,.errorLT0
1252+ FBF4 2A B0 F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   ++x_pos
1253+ FBF7 ED 5B BC F5                          ld      de,(sign_x)
1254+ FBFB                                      ClearCarryFlag
1254+ FBFB B7          >                        or a
1255+ FBFC ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1256+ FBFE 22 B0 F5                             ld	    (x_pos),hl
1257+ FC01 2A D1 F5                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_y_step;
1258+ FC04 ED 5B C7 F5                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1259+ FC08                                      ClearCarryFlag
1259+ FC08 B7          >                        or a
1260+ FC09 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de
1261+ FC0B 22 D1 F5                             ld	    (error),hl
1262+ FC0E C3 1E FC                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust
1263+ FC11 2A D1 F5     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1264+ FC14 ED 5B C5 F5                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)
1265+ FC18                                      ClearCarryFlag
1265+ FC18 B7          >                        or a
1266+ FC19 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1267+ FC1B 22 D1 F5                             ld	    (error),hl
1268+ FC1E 2A B2 F5     .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      hl,(y_pos)
1269+ FC21 23                                   inc     hl
1270+ FC22 22 B2 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1271+ FC25 C3 D4 FB                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1272+ FC28                      ENDIF
1273+ FC28
1274+ FC28
1275+ FC28 21 95 F5     l2_draw_6502_line:      ld      hl,x1                           ; copy from currnet position to 6502 variables
1276+ FC2B 11 26 F1                             ld      de,XX1510
1277+ FC2E 01 08 00                             ld      bc,4*2
1278+ FC31 ED B0                                ldir
1279+ FC33 CD E8 F2                             call    LL145_6502                      ; perform 6502 version
1280+ FC36 D8                                   ret     c                               ; returns if carry is set as its a no draw
1281+ FC37 21 00 00     .CopyBackResults:       ld      hl,0
1282+ FC3A 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl
1283+ FC3D 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl
1284+ FC40 22 99 F5                             ld      (x2),hl
1285+ FC43 22 9B F5                             ld      (y2),hl
1286+ FC46 3A 26 F1                             ld      a,(XX1510)
1287+ FC49 32 95 F5                             ld      (x1),a
1288+ FC4C 4F                                   ld      c,a
1289+ FC4D 3A 27 F1                             ld      a,(XX1510+1)
1290+ FC50 32 97 F5                             ld      (y1),a
1291+ FC53 47                                   ld      b,a
1292+ FC54 3A 28 F1                             ld      a,(XX1510+2)
1293+ FC57 32 99 F5                             ld      (x2),a
1294+ FC5A 5F                                   ld      e,a
1295+ FC5B 3A 29 F1                             ld      a,(XX1510+3)
1296+ FC5E 32 9B F5                             ld      (y2),a
1297+ FC61 57                                   ld      d,a
1298+ FC62 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
1299+ FC64                                 ;     call    l2_draw_clipped_line
1300+ FC64              ;                        call    l2_draw_diagonal                ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
1301+ FC64              ;................................................................
1302+ FC64 00 00        result                  dw      0
1303+ FC66              ;    swap = 0;
1304+ FC66              ;    if (y1 > y2)
1305+ FC66 2A 97 F5     l2_draw_elite_line:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
1306+ FC69 ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
1307+ FC6D CD 22 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
1308+ FC70 DA 76 FC                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords                 ;
1309+ FC73              ;        swapp1p2();
1310+ FC73 CD D6 F5     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords                      ;       swap them so y1 <= y2
1311+ FC76 2A 95 F5     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,(x1)                         ; hl = x1
1312+ FC79 ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; de = x2
1313+ FC7D ED 4B 97 F5                          ld      bc,(y1)                         ; bc = y1
1314+ FC81 DD 2A 9B F5                          ld      ix,(y2)                         ; ix = y2
1315+ FC85              .CheckForVertical:
1316+ FC85              .CheckForHorizontal:
1317+ FC85 FD 26 80                             ld      iyh,128                         ; iyh = xx13 = 128
1318+ FC88              ;    xx13 = 128;
1319+ FC88              ;    if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1320+ FC88 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1321+ FC89 DD B4                                or      ixh                             ; .  [if x2 and y2 > 255 goto point2clip]
1322+ FC8B 20 09                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1323+ FC8D DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ; .  [if y2 low > 127 goto point2clip]
1324+ FC8F CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; .  .
1325+ FC91 20 03                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1326+ FC93              ;        xx13 = 0;
1327+ FC93 FD 26 00     .Point2NoClip:          ld      iyh,0                           ;       iyh = xx13 = 0
1328+ FC96              ;    if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1329+ FC96 7C           .Point2Clip:            ld      a,h                             ; if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1330+ FC97 B0                                   or      b                               ; . [ if x1 or y1 > 255 goto clip needed]
1331+ FC98 C2 A9 FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1332+ FC9B CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ; . [ if y1 low > 127 goto clip needed]
1333+ FC9D C2 A9 FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1334+ FCA0              ;        if (xx13 != 0)
1335+ FCA0 FD 7C        .ClipPoint1:            ld      a,iyh                           ;       if (xx13 = 0)
1336+ FCA2 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1337+ FCA3 CA A0 FD                             jp      z,.ClipComplete                 ;               clipping not needed so treat as done an ddraw the line
1338+ FCA6 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                          ;       else xx13 = 64 (xx13 /2 but if xx13 is 0 it never hits here so can just set to 64)
1339+ FCA9              ;.......................LL138
1340+ FCA9 FD 7C        .ClipNeeded:            ld      a,iyh                           ; if (xx13 == 128)
1341+ FCAB CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; . [ jump if bit 7 is not set so <> 128]
1342+ FCAD CA E6 FC                             jp      z,.xx13Not128                   ; .
1343+ FCB0 7C           .xx13Is128:             ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 < 0 && x2 < 0)
1344+ FCB1 A2                                   and     d                               ;       . [ x1 and x2 high bits 7 are both set then its off to the left]
1345+ FCB2 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1346+ FCB3 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 < 0 && y2 < 0)
1347+ FCB4 DD A4                                and     ixh                             ;       . [ y1 and y2 high bits 7 are both set then its off the top]
1348+ FCB6 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1349+ FCB7 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 > 255  && x2 > 255)
1350+ FCB8 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if x1 is negative and if so skip]
1351+ FCBA C2 C9 FC                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       .
1352+ FCBD A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1353+ FCBE CA C9 FC                             jp      z,.x1x2LessThan256              ;       .
1354+ FCC1 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ;       . [test if x2 is negative]
1355+ FCC2 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       .
1356+ FCC4 C2 C9 FC                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       . < can simplify with with an xor test to detect if opposite signs first >
1357+ FCC7 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1358+ FCC8 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               return
1359+ FCC9 78           .x1x2LessThan256:       ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 > 127  && y2 > 127)
1360+ FCCA CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if y1 is negative]
1361+ FCCC C2 E6 FC                             jp      nz,.y1y2LessThan128             ;       .
1362+ FCCF A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1363+ FCD0 CA E6 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1364+ FCD3 CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ;       . [ if y1 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1365+ FCD5 CA E6 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1366+ FCD8 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                           ;       . [test if y2 is negative]
1367+ FCDA A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1368+ FCDB FA E6 FC                             jp      m,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1369+ FCDE A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1370+ FCDF CA E6 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1371+ FCE2 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ;       .
1372+ FCE4 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1373+ FCE5 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1374+ FCE6              ;.......................LL115
1375+ FCE6              .xx13Not128:                        // check right point
1376+ FCE6 EB           .y1y2LessThan128:       ex      de,hl                           ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
1377+ FCE7                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1377+ FCE7 B7          >                        or a
1378+ FCE8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1379+ FCEA 22 BF F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; redundant as its in DE TODO OPTIMISE
1380+ FCED EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; de = delta_x for next bit
1381+ FCEE DD E5 E1     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,ix                           ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
1382+ FCF1                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1382+ FCF1 B7          >                        or a
1383+ FCF2 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                           ; .
1384+ FCF4 22 C1 F5                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; . [ so now de = dx and hl = dy]
1385+ FCF7 FD 2E 80                             ld      iyl,128                         ; assuming sign is iyl is positive dx dy
1386+ FCFA CB 7A        .SignDeltaXY:           bit     7,d                             ; if delta x is negative (delta y will always be positive)
1387+ FCFC CA 08 FD                             jp      z,.DeltaXPositive               ; .
1388+ FCFF FD 2E 00     .DeltaXNegative:        ld      iyl,0                           ;       so we set sign to 0
1389+ FD02                                      macronegate16de                         ;       and set delta x to |delta x|
1389+ FD02 AF          >					xor 	a
1389+ FD03 93          >                    sub 	e
1389+ FD04 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1389+ FD05 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1389+ FD06 92          >                    sub 	d
1389+ FD07 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1390+ FD08 ED 53 BF F5  .DeltaXPositive:        ld      (delta_x),de                    ;       .
1391+ FD0C              ;.......................Scale down DY and DY to 7 bit
1392+ FD0C 7C           .ScaleDXDY:             ld      a,h                             ; scale down so that dx and dx are < 256
1393+ FD0D B2                                   or      d                               ; .
1394+ FD0E CA 1C FD                             jp      z,.ScaleDXDYHighDone            ; .
1395+ FD11                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1395+ FD11 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1395+ FD13 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1396+ FD15                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1396+ FD15 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1396+ FD17 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1397+ FD19 C3 0C FD                             jp      .ScaleDXDY                      ; .
1398+ FD1C 7B           .ScaleDXDYHighDone:     ld      a,e                             ; because of signed maths we will scale down to 7 bits to be safe
1399+ FD1D B5                                   or      l                               ; .
1400+ FD1E F2 29 FD                             jp      p,.LowScaleDone                 ; .
1401+ FD21                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1401+ FD21 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1401+ FD23 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1402+ FD25                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1402+ FD25 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1402+ FD27 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1403+ FD29              ;.......................Work out slope and gradient - later on we will work with deltax beign abs
1404+ FD29 ED 53 BF F5  .LowScaleDone:          ld      (delta_x),de                    ; save adjusted dx and dy back
1405+ FD2D 22 C1 F5                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
1406+ FD30 55                                   ld      d,l                             ; now d = dy e = dx
1407+ FD31 ED 53 C3 F5                          ld      (delta_y_x),de                  ; save for diagnostics
1408+ FD35              .SetUpTSlope:           ZeroA                                   ; Initialise tSlope to 0
1408+ FD35 AF          >                        xor a
1409+ FD36 32 CD F5                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ; .
1410+ FD39 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; a = dx
1411+ FD3A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .deltaxGTEdeltaY     ; if dx < dy
1411+ FD3A BA          >                        cp     d
1411+ FD3B D2 4E FD    >                        jp		nc,.deltaxGTEdeltaY
1412+ FD3E 43           .deltaXLTdeltaY:        ld      b,e                             ;       bc = dx $00
1413+ FD3F 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1414+ FD41 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = $00 dy
1415+ FD42 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1416+ FD44 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de  (dx * 256 / dy)
1417+ FD47 ED 43 CB F5                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1418+ FD4B C3 5F FD                             jp      .donedxdycheck                  ;       .
1419+ FD4E                                                                              ; else
1420+ FD4E 42           .deltaxGTEdeltaY:       ld      b,d                             ;       bc = dy << 0
1421+ FD4F 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1422+ FD51 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       de = 0dx
1423+ FD53 CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de (dy * 256 / dx)
1424+ FD56 ED 43 CB F5                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1425+ FD5A 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set tslope to -1
1426+ FD5C 32 CD F5                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ;       .
1427+ FD5F              .donedxdycheck:                 // CHECK CORRECT POINT
1428+ FD5F              ;.......................Clipping point 1
1429+ FD5F                                      ;break
1430+ FD5F FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ; if xx13 = 0 or xx13 = 128 (values can be 0, 128, 64 later we can optimise to see if its <> 64)
1431+ FD61 A7                                   and     a                               ; . [xx13 = 0  enter the block]
1432+ FD62 CA 68 FD                             jp      z,.xx13is0or128                 ; .
1433+ FD65 F2 89 FD                             jp      p,.xx13not0or128                ; . [xx13 <> 128 then skip block]
1434+ FD68 CD A6 FD     .xx13is0or128:          call    ClipLL118Elite                  ;       clip point 1
1435+ FD6B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ;       if xx13 <> 0
1436+ FD6D A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1437+ FD6E CA 85 FD                             jp      z,.ImmediateDraw                ;       .
1438+ FD71 3A 96 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ;               if (if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127)) return
1439+ FD74 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1440+ FD75 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [x1 high is negative then return]
1441+ FD76 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if x1 high is not zero, x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1442+ FD77 3A 98 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ;               . [a = x1 high]
1443+ FD7A A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1444+ FD7B F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 negative return]
1445+ FD7C C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1446+ FD7D 3A 97 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ;               . [a = y1 low]
1447+ FD80 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1448+ FD81 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1449+ FD82 C3 89 FD                             jp      .SkipCheckP1OnScreen            ;               else goto SkipCheckP1OnScreen
1450+ FD85              .ImmediateDraw:         IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1451+ FD85 CD A3 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ;        else if we get here we only needed to clip one point so draw the line
1452+ FD88                                      ENDIF
1453+ FD88 C9                                   ret                                     ;             and we are done
1454+ FD89              .xx13not0or128:
1455+ FD89 CD D6 F5     .SkipCheckP1OnScreen:   call    SwapCoords                      ; swap point 1 and point 2 so we can now process P2
1456+ FD8C CD A6 FD                             call    ClipLL118Elite                  ; clip P2
1457+ FD8F 3A 96 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ; if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127) return
1458+ FD92 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1459+ FD93 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if x1 negative return]
1460+ FD94 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1461+ FD95 3A 98 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ; . [a = y1 high]
1462+ FD98 A7                                   and     a                               ;
1463+ FD99 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 negative return]
1464+ FD9A C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1465+ FD9B 3A 97 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ; . [a = y1 low]
1466+ FD9E A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1467+ FD9F F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 low > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1468+ FDA0              .ClipComplete:
1469+ FDA0              .xx13is0or128Draw:      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1470+ FDA0 CD A3 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ; if we get here we only needed to clip one point/have done all slipping needed
1471+ FDA3                                      ENDIF
1472+ FDA3 C9                                   ret
1473+ FDA4              ;................................................................
1474+ FDA4 00 00        ClipSign                dw      0
1475+ FDA6              ClipLL118Elite:        ;break
1476+ FDA6 2A 95 F5     .checkX1IsNegative      ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 is negative
1477+ FDA9 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1478+ FDAB CA CA FD                             jp      z,.x1GTE0                       ; .
1479+ FDAE 3E FF        .x1LT0:                 ld      a,255                           ;       clip sign = -1
1480+ FDB0 32 A4 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1481+ FDB3 CD 32 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;       calc ll120
1482+ FDB6 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       x1 = 0
1483+ FDB9 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1484+ FDBC 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       y1 = y1 + result
1485+ FDBF ED 5B 64 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1486+ FDC3 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1487+ FDC4 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1488+ FDC7 C3 E7 FD                             jp      .checkY1IsNegative              ;       .
1489+ FDCA 7C           .x1GTE0:                ld      a,h                             ; else
1490+ FDCB A7                                   and     a                               ;       if x1 > 255
1491+ FDCC CA E7 FD                             jp      z,.checkY1IsNegative            ;       .
1492+ FDCF                                      ZeroA                                   ;               sign must be 0 for postive adjustment
1492+ FDCF AF          >                        xor a
1493+ FDD0 32 A4 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;               .
1494+ FDD3 CD 32 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;               Calc LL120
1495+ FDD6 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                          ;               x1 = 255
1496+ FDD9 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;               .
1497+ FDDC 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y1 = y1 + result
1498+ FDDF ED 5B 64 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;               . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1499+ FDE3 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;               .
1500+ FDE4 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;               .
1501+ FDE7                                                                              ; end if
1502+ FDE7 2A 97 F5     .checkY1IsNegative:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 <0) [if we don;t need to clip x1 then we need to load hl with y1 as it never got loaded]
1503+ FDEA CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1504+ FDEC CA 08 FE                             jp      z,.checkY1LT128                 ; .
1505+ FDEF 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set sign to -1 for calc
1506+ FDF1 32 A4 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1507+ FDF4 CD 7F FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ;       calc LL123
1508+ FDF7 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       x1 = x1 + result
1509+ FDFA ED 5B 64 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       .
1510+ FDFE 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1511+ FDFF 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1512+ FE02 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       y1 = 0
1513+ FE05 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1514+ FE08 7C           .checkY1LT128:          ld      a,h                             ; finished if y < 128
1515+ FE09 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1516+ FE0A C2 10 FE                             jp      nz,.mopUpY1                     ; . [jump to mop up if y1 high <> 0, wehave already dealt with negatvies so don't need to consider that]
1517+ FE0D 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; . [now check y1 low and return if y1 low > 127]
1518+ FE0E A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1519+ FE0F F0                                   ret     p                               ; . [ if y1 low was positive then we are done as it means y1 < 128]
1520+ FE10 11 80 00     .mopUpY1:               ld      de,128                          ; y1 = y1 - 128
1521+ FE13                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1521+ FE13 B7          >                        or a
1522+ FE14 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1523+ FE16 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1524+ FE19                                      ZeroA                                   ; set clip sign to 0
1524+ FE19 AF          >                        xor a
1525+ FE1A 32 A4 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ; to get to here if y1 < 0, y is set to 0, if its < 128 then it never reaches here, so y1 must be > 128 to get here
1526+ FE1D CD 7F FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ; calc LL123
1527+ FE20 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1 = x1 + result
1528+ FE23 ED 5B 64 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ; .
1529+ FE27 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; .
1530+ FE28 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ; .
1531+ FE2B 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                          ; y1 = 127
1532+ FE2E 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1533+ FE31 C9                                   ret
1534+ FE32
1535+ FE32 2A 95 F5     CalcLL120:              ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1= |x1|
1536+ FE35                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1536+ FE35 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1536+ FE37 CA 40 FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1536+ FE3A AF          >					xor 	a
1536+ FE3B 95          >					sub 	l
1536+ FE3C 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1536+ FE3D 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1536+ FE3E 94          >					sub 	h
1536+ FE3F 67          >					ld 		h,a
1536+ FE40             >.alreadyABS:
1537+ FE40 3A CD F5                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if (tslope == 0)
1538+ FE43 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1539+ FE44 C2 63 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1540+ FE47 55           .tSlopeZero:            ld      d,l                             ;       d = x1 & 255
1541+ FE48 3A CB F5                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1542+ FE4B 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;
1543+ FE4C ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = x1 & 255 * gradient
1544+ FE4E 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = x1 * gradient /256
1545+ FE4F 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1546+ FE51 3A A4 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1547+ FE54 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1548+ FE55 CA 5E FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeZeroDone               ;       .
1549+ FE58              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16de                         ;               result = - result
1549+ FE58 AF          >					xor 	a
1549+ FE59 93          >                    sub 	e
1549+ FE5A 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1549+ FE5B 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1549+ FE5C 92          >                    sub 	d
1549+ FE5D 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1550+ FE5E ED 53 64 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),de                     ;
1551+ FE62 C9                                   ret                                     ;
1552+ FE63              .tSlopeNonZero:         ;ld      a,(gradient)                    ; else  c = gradient
1553+ FE63                                      ;ld      c,a                             ;       .
1554+ FE63                                      ;ld      a,l                             ;       a = x1 & 255
1555+ FE63                                      ;call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = a * 256/c
1556+ FE63
1557+ FE63 ED 5B CB F5                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1558+ FE67 45                                   ld      b,l
1559+ FE68 0E 00                                ld      c,0
1560+ FE6A                                      ;; CORRECTED TO LADO INTO B ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1561+ FE6A CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ
1562+ FE6D
1563+ FE6D 3A A4 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1564+ FE70 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1565+ FE71 CA 7A FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;       .
1566+ FE74              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16bc                         ;               result = - result
1566+ FE74 AF          >					xor 	a
1566+ FE75 91          >                    sub 	c
1566+ FE76 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1566+ FE77 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1566+ FE78 90          >                    sub 	b
1566+ FE79 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1567+ FE7A ED 43 64 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),bc
1568+ FE7E C9                                   ret
1569+ FE7F              ;.......................LL123
1570+ FE7F              CalcLL123:              ;break
1571+ FE7F 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; hl = |y1|
1572+ FE82                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1572+ FE82 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1572+ FE84 CA 8D FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1572+ FE87 AF          >					xor 	a
1572+ FE88 95          >					sub 	l
1572+ FE89 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1572+ FE8A 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1572+ FE8B 94          >					sub 	h
1572+ FE8C 67          >					ld 		h,a
1572+ FE8D             >.alreadyABS:
1573+ FE8D 3A CD F5                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if tSlope = 0
1574+ FE90 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1575+ FE91 C2 AF FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1576+ FE94              .tSlopeZero:           ; ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       c = gradient
1577+ FE94              ;                        ld      c,a                             ;       .
1578+ FE94              ;                        ld      a,l                             ;       hl = y1 (which is now abs and < 256)
1579+ FE94              ;                        call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = A * 256 / c
1580+ FE94 ED 5B CB F5                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1581+ FE98 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1582+ FE9A CD F5 95                             call    Floor_DivQ
1583+ FE9D 3A A4 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1584+ FEA0 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1585+ FEA1 CA AA FE                             jp      z, .tSlopeZeroDone              ;       .
1586+ FEA4              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16bc                         ;               result = -result
1586+ FEA4 AF          >					xor 	a
1586+ FEA5 91          >                    sub 	c
1586+ FEA6 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1586+ FEA7 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1586+ FEA8 90          >                    sub 	b
1586+ FEA9 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1587+ FEAA ED 43 64 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),bc                     ;       . save result in either case
1588+ FEAE C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1589+ FEAF 55           .tSlopeNonZero:         ld      d,l                             ; else  d = |y1| low
1590+ FEB0 3A CB F5                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1591+ FEB3 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;       .
1592+ FEB4 ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = l * gradient
1593+ FEB6 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = l * gradient /256
1594+ FEB7 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1595+ FEB9 3A A4 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1596+ FEBC A7                                   and     a                               ;
1597+ FEBD CA C6 FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;
1598+ FEC0              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16de                         ;               result = -result
1598+ FEC0 AF          >					xor 	a
1598+ FEC1 93          >                    sub 	e
1598+ FEC2 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1598+ FEC3 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1598+ FEC4 92          >                    sub 	d
1598+ FEC5 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1599+ FEC6 ED 53 64 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),de                     ;       . save result in either case
1600+ FECA C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1601+ FECB
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
1215  FECB                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
   1+ FECB              ; ClearLines (LL155)
   2+ FECB              ;   y = 0
   3+ FECB              ; 	XX20 = UbnkEdgeHeapSize
   4+ FECB              ;   exit if XX20 < 4
   5+ FECB              ;   ++y
   6+ FECB              ;   do
   7+ FECB              ;		X1 = XX19(Y) ;	Y1 = XX19(++Y) ;	X2 = XX19(++Y);	Y2 = XX19(++Y)
   8+ FECB              ;   	call DrawLine (x1,y1 to x2,y2) two's compliment (we will do 0)
   9+ FECB              ;		++y
  10+ FECB              ;	until Y > XX20
  11+ FECB
  12+ FECB              clearLines:
  13+ FECB              layer2_clearLines:
  14+ FECB 3A EA C3     LL155cl:                ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)
  15+ FECE 47                                   ld		b,a
  16+ FECF 21 30 C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  17+ FED2 C5           clearLinesLoop:         push	bc
  18+ FED3 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  19+ FED4 23                                   inc		hl
  20+ FED5 4F                                   ld		c,a
  21+ FED6 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  22+ FED7 23                                   inc		hl
  23+ FED8 47                                   ld		b,a
  24+ FED9 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  25+ FEDA 23                                   inc		hl
  26+ FEDB 5F                                   ld		e,a
  27+ FEDC 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  28+ FEDD 23                                   inc		hl
  29+ FEDE 57                                   ld		d,a
  30+ FEDF 3E E3                                ld		a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT		; we erase here
  31+ FEE1 E5                                   push	hl
  32+ FEE2 CD 68 F5                             call    l2_draw_any_line
  33+ FEE5 E1                                   pop		hl
  34+ FEE6 C1                                   pop		bc
  35+ FEE7 10 E9                                djnz	clearLinesLoop
  36+ FEE9 C9                                   ret
  37+ FEEA
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
1216  FEEA                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ FEEA              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ FEEA              ;
   3+ FEEA              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
