   4+ FEEA              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ FEEA              ;
   6+ FEEA              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ FEEA              ;
   8+ FEEA              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ FEEA              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ FEEA              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ FEEA              ;
  12+ FEEA              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ FEEA              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ FEEA              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ FEEA              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ FEEA              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ FEEA              ;
  18+ FEEA              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ FEEA              ;
  20+ FEEA              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ FEEA              ;
  22+ FEEA              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ FEEA              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ FEEA              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ FEEA              ;
  26+ FEEA              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ FEEA              ;
  28+ FEEA              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ FEEA              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ FEEA              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ FEEA              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ FEEA              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ FEEA              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ FEEA              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ FEEA              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ FEEA              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ FEEA              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ FEEA              ;
  39+ FEEA              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ FEEA              ;
  41+ FEEA              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ FEEA              ;
  43+ FEEA              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ FEEA              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ FEEA              ;
  46+ FEEA              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ FEEA              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ FEEA              ;		H = x
  49+ FEEA              ;		L = y
  50+ FEEA              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ FEEA              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ FEEA              ;	else
  53+ FEEA              ;		H = y
  54+ FEEA              ;		L = x
  55+ FEEA              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ FEEA              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ FEEA              ;	endif
  58+ FEEA              ;
  59+ FEEA              ;	B = H
  60+ FEEA              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ FEEA              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ FEEA              ;		i = i + L
  63+ FEEA              ;		if i	< H
  64+ FEEA              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ FEEA              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ FEEA              ;		else
  67+ FEEA              ;			i = i - H
  68+ FEEA              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ FEEA              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ FEEA              ;		endif
  71+ FEEA              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ FEEA              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ FEEA              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ FEEA              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ FEEA              ;
  76+ FEEA              ;
  77+ FEEA              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ FEEA              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ FEEA              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ FEEA              ;
  81+ FEEA 00 00        line_gfx_coords         dw  0
  82+ FEEC
  83+ FEEC              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ FEEC 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ FEED FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ FEEF 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ FEF1 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ FEF2 FE C0                                cp	192
  89+ FEF4 30 21                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y1	coordinate out	of range
  90+ FEF6 22 EA FE                             ld	(line_gfx_coords),hl		; the starting	point is now default
  91+ FEF9 E5                                   push	hl
  92+ FEFA D5                                   push	de
  93+ FEFB 6C                                   ld	l,h				; L = x0
  94+ FEFC 62                                   ld	h,d				; H = x1
  95+ FEFD 7C           distanceX:		        ld	a,h
  96+ FEFE 95                                   sub	l
  97+ FEFF 6F                                   ld	l,a
  98+ FF00 26 00                                ld	h,0
  99+ FF02 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceXDone
 100+ FF04 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 101+ FF06 D1           distanceXDone:          pop	de
 102+ FF07 E3                                   ex	(sp),hl			; L = y0
 103+ FF08 63                                   ld	h,e				; H = y1
 104+ FF09 7C           distanceY:		        ld	a,h
 105+ FF0A 95                                   sub	l
 106+ FF0B 6F                                   ld	l,a
 107+ FF0C 26 00                                ld	h,0
 108+ FF0E 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceYDone
 109+ FF10 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 110+ FF12 D1           distanceYDone:          pop	de
 111+ FF13 EB                                   ex	de,hl			; h.dist.	= HL, v.dist. = DE
 112+ FF14 CD 18 FF                             call	DrawLineRelative			; draw line...
 113+ FF17 C9           exit_line:              ret
 114+ FF18
 115+ FF18              ; ***************************************************************************
 116+ FF18              ;
 117+ FF18              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
 118+ FF18              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
 119+ FF18              ;
 120+ FF18              ; OUT: h - l distance in	HL
 121+ FF18              ;
 122+ FF18
 123+ FF18 D5           DrawLineRelative:       push	de
 124+ FF19 E5                                   push	hl
 125+ FF1A D9                                   exx
 126+ FF1B E1                                   pop	hl					; get relative	horisontal movement
 127+ FF1C CD 93 FF                             call	sgn
 128+ FF1F 57                                   ld	d,a					; direc_x	= SGN(x) installed d = +/-1 for horizontal update
 129+ FF20 CD A0 FF                             call	absValue
 130+ FF23 45                                   ld	b,l					; x = ABS(x)
 131+ FF24 E1           DrawLineGetVertRelative:pop	hl					; get relative	vertical movement
 132+ FF25 CD 93 FF                             call	sgn
 133+ FF28 5F                                   ld	e,a					; direc_y	= SGN(y) installed  = +/-1 for vertical update
 134+ FF29 CD A0 FF                             call	absValue
 135+ FF2C 4D                                   ld	c,l					; y = ABS(y) so now bc = dxdy
 136+ FF2D              ; so by here BC = dx dy HL in increment/decrement x y
 137+ FF2D C5                                   push	bc
 138+ FF2E D9                                   exx
 139+ FF2F E1                                   pop	hl					; H = absolute	x dist., L = absolute y distance
 140+ FF30 7C                                   ld	a,h
 141+ FF31 BD                                   cp	l
 142+ FF32 38 0A                                jr	c, x_smaller_y		; if	x >=	y
 143+ FF34 B4           areXandYZero:           or	h					;	if x+y = 0
 144+ FF35 28 5B                                jr	z, exit_draw		;		return
 145+ FF37 D9           y_lessorequal_x:        exx						;	else
 146+ FF38 42                                   ld	b,d					;		ddx = direc_x
 147+ FF39 0E 00                                ld	c,0					;		ddy = 0
 148+ FF3B D9                                   exx
 149+ FF3C 18 08                                jr	init_drawloop		; else
 150+ FF3E 7C           x_smaller_y:	        ld	a,h
 151+ FF3F 65                                   ld	h,l					;	H = y
 152+ FF40 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	L = x
 153+ FF41 D9                                   exx
 154+ FF42 06 00                                ld	b,0					;	ddx = 0
 155+ FF44 4B                                   ld	c,e					;	ddy = direc_y
 156+ FF45 D9                                   exx
 157+ FF46 44           init_drawloop:	        ld	b,h
 158+ FF47 4C                                   ld	c,h					; B = H
 159+ FF48 CB 39                                srl	c					; i = INT(B/2)
 160+ FF4A              										; FOR N=B	TO 1	STEP	-1
 161+ FF4A 79           drawloop:		        ld	a,c
 162+ FF4B 85                                   add	a,l
 163+ FF4C 38 09                                jr	c, i_greater		;	i + L > 255  (i > H)
 164+ FF4E BC                                   cp	h
 165+ FF4F 30 06                                jr	nc, i_greater		;	if i	< H
 166+ FF51 4F                                   ld	c,a					;		i = i + L
 167+ FF52 D9                                   exx
 168+ FF53 C5                                   push	bc				;		ix =	ddx:	iy =	ddy
 169+ FF54 D9                                   exx
 170+ FF55 18 05                                jr	check_plot			;	else
 171+ FF57 94           i_greater:		        sub	h					;		i = i - H
 172+ FF58 4F                                   ld	c,a
 173+ FF59 D9                                   exx
 174+ FF5A D5                                   push	de				;		ix =	direc_x: iy = direc_y
 175+ FF5B D9                                   exx						;	endif
 176+ FF5C E3           check_plot:		        ex	(sp),hl				;	preserve H,L distances on stack
 177+ FF5D EB                                   ex	de,hl				;	D,E = ix,	iy
 178+ FF5E 2A EA FE                             ld	hl,(line_gfx_coords)
 179+ FF61 7D                                   ld	a,l
 180+ FF62 83                                   add	a,e					;
 181+ FF63 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	y0 =	y0 +	iy (y0 is	checked by plot)
 182+ FF64 7A                                   ld	a,d
 183+ FF65 3C                                   inc	a
 184+ FF66 84                                   add	a,h
 185+ FF67 38 04                                jr	c, check_range		;	check out	of range
 186+ FF69 28 26                                jr	z, range_error		;	Fz=1	& Fc=0 denotes	x0 <	0
 187+ FF6B 18 02                                jr	plot_point
 188+ FF6D 20 22        check_range:            jr	nz, range_error	;	Fz=0	& Fc=1 denotes	x0 >	255
 189+ FF6F
 190+ FF6F 3D           plot_point:             dec	a
 191+ FF70 C5                                   push	bc
 192+ FF71 F5                                   push	af
 193+ FF72 47                                   ld	    b,a					;	x0 =	x0 +	ix
 194+ FF73 4D                                   ld		c,l
 195+ FF74 3A B5 E2                             ld		a,(line_gfx_colour)
 196+ FF77 ED 43 EA FE                          ld      (line_gfx_coords),bc
 197+ FF7B                                      l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel:
 197+ FF7B 78          >                        ld      a,b
 197+ FF7C             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 197+ FF7C FE C0       >                        cp     192
 197+ FF7E D2 8A FF    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 197+ FF81 69          >                        ld      l,c
 197+ FF82 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 197+ FF85 67          >                        ld      h,a
 197+ FF86 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 197+ FF89 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 197+ FF8A             >.NoPlot:
 198+ FF8A F1                                   pop		af
 199+ FF8B C1                                   pop		bc
 200+ FF8C E1           plot_RET:		        pop	hl					;	restore H,L distances...
 201+ FF8D 10 BB                                djnz	drawloop		; NEXT N
 202+ FF8F 18 01                                jr	exit_draw
 203+ FF91
 204+ FF91 E1           range_error:	        pop	hl					; remove H,L distances...
 205+ FF92 C9           exit_draw:		        ret
 206+ FF93
 207+ FF93
 208+ FF93              ; ******************************************************************************
 209+ FF93              ;
 210+ FF93              ;	SGN (Signum value) of 16	bit signed integer.
 211+ FF93              ;
 212+ FF93              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 213+ FF93              ;	OUT:		A = result: 0,1,-1 (if zero, positive, negative)
 214+ FF93              ;
 215+ FF93              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 216+ FF93              ;	..BCDEHL/IXIY	same
 217+ FF93              ;	AF....../....	different
 218+ FF93              ;
 219+ FF93 7C           sgn:				    ld	a,h
 220+ FF94 B5                                   or	l
 221+ FF95 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is zero, return 0...
 222+ FF96 CB 7C                                bit	7,h
 223+ FF98 20 03                                jr	nz, negative_int
 224+ FF9A 3E 01                                ld	a,1
 225+ FF9C C9                                   ret
 226+ FF9D 3E FF        negative_int:		    ld	a,-1
 227+ FF9F C9                                   ret
 228+ FFA0
 229+ FFA0
 230+ FFA0              ; ******************************************************************************
 231+ FFA0              ;
 232+ FFA0              ;	ABS (Absolute value) of 16 bit signed integer.
 233+ FFA0              ;
 234+ FFA0              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 235+ FFA0              ;	OUT:		HL =	converted	integer
 236+ FFA0              ;
 237+ FFA0              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 238+ FFA0              ;	A.BCDE../IXIY	same
 239+ FFA0              ;	.F....HL/....	different
 240+ FFA0              ;
 241+ FFA0 CB 7C        absValue:			    bit	7,h
 242+ FFA2 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is positive...
 243+ FFA3 D5                                   push	de
 244+ FFA4 EB                                   ex	de,hl
 245+ FFA5 21 00 00                             ld	hl,0
 246+ FFA8 BF                                   cp	a				; Fc	= 0,	may not be used...
 247+ FFA9 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de			; convert	negative integer
 248+ FFAB D1                                   pop	de
 249+ FFAC C9                                   ret
 250+ FFAD
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
1217  FFAD                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER2," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER2Addr), " - BankLAYER2"

  26+ E03F
  27+ E03F              ; "l2_hilight_row, d = row, e = colour"
  28+ E03F 21 0F E0     l1_hilight_row:         ld      hl, L1AttrRow00
  29+ E042 4B                                   ld      c,e
  30+ E043 7A                                   ld      a,d
  31+ E044 CB 27                                sla     a
  32+ E046 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  33+ E048 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  34+ E049 5F                                   ld      e,a
  35+ E04A 23                                   inc     hl
  36+ E04B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  37+ E04C 57                                   ld      d,a
  38+ E04D EB                                   ex      hl,de
  39+ E04E 79                                   ld		a,c

# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_cls.asm
   1+ E056 AF           l1_cls_top:             xor     a
   2+ E057 21 00 40                             ld      hl, $4000
   3+ E05A 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
   4+ E05D CD FD 7C                             call    memfill_dma
   5+ E060 C9                                   ret
   6+ E061
   7+ E061 AF           l1_cls_mid:             xor     a
   8+ E062 21 00 48                             ld      hl, $4800
   9+ E065 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
  10+ E068 CD FD 7C                             call    memfill_dma
  11+ E06B C9                                   ret
  12+ E06C
  13+ E06C AF           l1_cls_bottom:          xor     a
  14+ E06D 21 00 50                             ld      hl, $5000
  15+ E070 11 00 08                             ld      de, $0800
  16+ E073 CD FD 7C                             call    memfill_dma
  17+ E076 C9                                   ret
  18+ E077
  19+ E077              ; Designed specifically to clear a whole character aligned line

  21+ E079 ED 94                                pixelad
  22+ E07B 11 00 01                             ld      de,32 * 8
  23+ E07E AF                                   xor     a
  24+ E07F CD FD 7C                             call    memfill_dma
  25+ E082 C9                                   ret
  26+ E083
  27+ E083              ; Designed specifically to clear a whole character aligned 2 lines line, used for say clearing hyperspace message
  28+ E083 1E 00        l1_cls_2_lines_d:       ld      e,0
  29+ E085 ED 94                                pixelad

  31+ E08A AF                                   xor     a
  32+ E08B CD FD 7C                             call    memfill_dma

  38+ E096 CD FD 7C                             call	memfill_dma

1226  E0BA                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
   1+ E0BA              ; "l1 print char a = character, de = Ypixel Xchar of print"
   2+ E0BA D5 E5        l1_print_char:          push	de,,hl
   3+ E0BC ED 94                                pixelad								; hl = address of de
   4+ E0BE E5                                   push	hl							; save hl for loop
   5+ E0BF 26 00                                ld		h,0
   6+ E0C1 6F                                   ld		l,a
   7+ E0C2 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
   8+ E0C3 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
   9+ E0C4 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  10+ E0C5 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  11+ E0C9 EB                                   ex		de,hl						; save address into de
  12+ E0CA E1                                   pop		hl							; get back hl for loop
  13+ E0CB 06 08                                ld		b,8							; do 8 rows
  14+ E0CD 1A           .PrintCharLoop:         ld		a,(de)						; row byte
  15+ E0CE 13                                   inc		de							; next byte
  16+ E0CF 77                                   ld		(hl),a						; poke to screen
  17+ E0D0 ED 93                                pixeldn								; Down 1 row
  18+ E0D2 10 F9                                djnz	.PrintCharLoop				; loop for 8 bytes
  19+ E0D4 E1 D1                                pop		de,,hl					    ; restore hl
  20+ E0D6 C9                                   ret
  21+ E0D7
  22+ E0D7              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  23+ E0D7              ; now skips ascii code < 32 but moves on cursor by 1 char
  24+ E0D7              l1_print_at:
  25+ E0D7 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
  26+ E0D8 FE 00                                cp		0
  27+ E0DA C8                                   ret		z
  28+ E0DB                                      CallIfAGTENusng " ", l1_print_char
  28+ E0DB FE 20       >                        cp      " "
  28+ E0DD D4 BA E0    >                        call	nc,l1_print_char
  29+ E0E0 23                                   inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  30+ E0E1 7B                                   ld		a,e
  31+ E0E2 C6 08                                add		a,8
  32+ E0E4 5F                                   ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  33+ E0E5 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
  34+ E0E7              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;pop		de                      ; TODO LOOOKS TO BE A ROGUE POPDE
  35+ E0E7 C9                                   ret
  36+ E0E8
  37+ E0E8              ;l1_print_at_wrap:
  38+ E0E8              ;; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  39+ E0E8              ;	ld      iyh,e
  40+ E0E8              ;.PrintLoop:
  41+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  42+ E0E8              ;	cp		0
  43+ E0E8              ;	ret		z
  44+ E0E8              ;.CountWordCharLen
  45+ E0E8              ;; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
  46+ E0E8              ;; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
  47+ E0E8              ;; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
  48+ E0E8              ;
  49+ E0E8              ;
  50+ E0E8              ;    push    iy
  51+ E0E8              ;    call	l1_print_char
  52+ E0E8              ;    pop     iy
  53+ E0E8              ;	inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  54+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,e
  55+ E0E8              ;    cp      238
  56+ E0E8              ;    jr      nc,.NextLine
  57+ E0E8              ;	add		a,8
  58+ E0E8              ;	ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  59+ E0E8              ;	jr		.PrintLoop
  60+ E0E8              ;.Clearstackandfinish:
  61+ E0E8              ;	pop		de
  62+ E0E8              ;	ret
  63+ E0E8              ;.NextLine:
  64+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  65+ E0E8              ;    cp      " "
  66+ E0E8              ;    ld      e,iyh
  67+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,d
  68+ E0E8              ;    add     a,8
  69+ E0E8              ;    ld      d,a
  70+ E0E8              ;    jr		.PrintLoop
  71+ E0E8
  72+ E0E8              ; Counts next word at hl, uses e and forces a wrap if it would over flow puts value in c
  73+ E0E8 E5           L1LenWordAtHL:          push    hl
  74+ E0E9 D5                                   push    de
  75+ E0EA 7E           .CountLoop:             ld      a,(hl)
  76+ E0EB FE 00                                cp      0
  77+ E0ED 28 0F                                jr      z,.CountDone
  78+ E0EF FE 20                                cp      32
  79+ E0F1 28 0B                                jr      z,.CountDone
  80+ E0F3 7B                                   ld      a,e
  81+ E0F4 C6 08                                add     a,8
  82+ E0F6 5F                                   ld      e,a
  83+ E0F7 FE EE                                cp      238
  84+ E0F9 30 07                                jr      nc,.TooLong
  85+ E0FB 23                                   inc     hl
  86+ E0FC 18 EC                                jr      .CountLoop
  87+ E0FE D1           .CountDone:             pop     de
  88+ E0FF E1                                   pop     hl
  89+ E100 AF                                   xor     a
  90+ E101 C9                                   ret
  91+ E102 D1           .TooLong                pop     de
  92+ E103 E1                                   pop     hl
  93+ E104 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  94+ E106 C9                                   ret
  95+ E107
  96+ E107 7E           L1PrintWordAtHL:        ld      a,(hl)
  97+ E108 FE 00                                cp      0
  98+ E10A C8                                   ret     z
  99+ E10B FE 20                                cp      32
 100+ E10D 28 0F                                jr      z,.ItsASpace
 101+ E10F FD E5                                push    iy
 102+ E111 CD BA E0                             call	l1_print_char
 103+ E114 FD E1                                pop     iy
 104+ E116 7B                                   ld      a,e
 105+ E117 C6 08                                add     a,8
 106+ E119 5F                                   ld      e,a
 107+ E11A 23                                   inc     hl
 108+ E11B C3 07 E1                             jp      L1PrintWordAtHL
 109+ E11E 23           .ItsASpace:             inc     hl      ;  Just a bodge for now
 110+ E11F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 111+ E120 C6 08                                add     a,8
 112+ E122 5F                                   ld      e,a
 113+ E123 C9                                   ret
 114+ E124
 115+ E124
 116+ E124              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 117+ E124              ; Now has full word level wrapping
 118+ E124 FD 63        l1_print_at_wrap:       ld      iyh,e
 119+ E126 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
 120+ E127 FE 00                                cp		0
 121+ E129 C8                                   ret		z
 122+ E12A CD E8 E0     .CountWordCharLen:      call    L1LenWordAtHL
 123+ E12D FE FF                                cp      $FF
 124+ E12F 28 06                                jr      z,.WrapNextLine
 125+ E131 CD 07 E1     .NotTooLong:            call    L1PrintWordAtHL
 126+ E134              ; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
 127+ E134              ; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
 128+ E134              ; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
 129+ E134 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
 130+ E136              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;op		de
 131+ E136 C9                                   ret
 132+ E137              .WrapNextLine:
 133+ E137 FD 5C        .NextLine:              ld      e,iyh
 134+ E139 7A                                   ld      a,d
 135+ E13A C6 08                                add     a,8
 136+ E13C 57                                   ld      d,a
 137+ E13D 18 E7                                jr		.PrintLoop
 138+ E13F
 139+ E13F
# file closed: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
1227  E13F                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER1," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER1Addr), " - BankLAYER1"
1228  E13F              ; Bank 59  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1229  E13F              ; In the first copy of the banks the "Non number" labels exist. They will map directly in other banks
1230  E13F              ; as the is aligned and data tables are after that
1231  E13F              ; need to make the ship index tables same size in each to simplify further
1232  E13F                  SLOT    ShipModelsAddr
1233  E13F                  PAGE    BankShipModels1
1234  E13F              	ORG     ShipModelsAddr, BankShipModels1
1235  E000                  INCLUDE "./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm"
# file opened: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm
   1+ E000              MShipBankTable          MACRO
   2+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels1
   3+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels2
   4+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels3
   5+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels4
   6+ E000                                      ENDM
   7+ E000              ; For ship number A fetch
   8+ E000              ;           the adjusted ship number in B , C = original number
   9+ E000              ;           bank number in A for the respective ship based on the ship table
  10+ E000              MGetShipBankId:         MACRO   banktable
  11+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  12+ E000 ~                                    ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
  13+ E000 ~            .ShiftLoop:             srl     a
  14+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  15+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  16+ E000 ~                                    srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
  17+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
  18+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,c
  19+ E000 ~                                    ld      d,b
  20+ E000 ~                                    ld      e,16
  21+ E000 ~                                    mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
  22+ E000 ~                                    sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
  23+ E000 ~            .SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
  24+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
  25+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
  26+ E000 ~            ;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
  27+ E000 ~                                    ld      hl,banktable                        ; a= bank index
  28+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  29+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
  31+ E000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
  32+ E000 ~                                    ret
  33+ E000                                      ENDM
  34+ E000
  35+ E000              McopyVertsToUniverse:   MACRO
  36+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  37+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
  38+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  39+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
  40+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  41+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  42+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  43+ E000 ~                                    ret
  44+ E000                                      ENDM
  45+ E000
  46+ E000              McopyEdgesToUniverse:   MACRO
  47+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  48+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
  49+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  50+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
  51+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  52+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  53+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  54+ E000 ~                                    ret
  55+ E000                                      ENDM
  56+ E000
  57+ E000              McopyNormsToUniverse:   MACRO
  58+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  59+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
  60+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  61+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
  62+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  63+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  64+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  65+ E000 ~                                    ret
  66+ E000                                      ENDM
  67+ E000
  68+ E000              ; Passes in ship nbr in A and bank is part of MACRO
  69+ E000              MCopyShipToUniverse:    MACRO       banklabel
  70+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
  71+ E000 ~                                    ld          (hl),banklabel
  72+ E000 ~                                    push        af
  73+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,iyl
  74+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelId),a
  75+ E000 ~                                    pop         af
  76+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelNbr),a
  77+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
  78+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  79+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
  80+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,(hl)
  81+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  82+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
  83+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
  84+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  85+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
  86+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(hl)
  87+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  88+ E000 ~                                    ld          h,(hl)
  89+ E000 ~                                    ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
  90+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
  91+ E000 ~                                    ld          bc,ShipDataLength
  92+ E000 ~                                    ldir
  93+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyVertsToUniv
  94+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyEdgesToUniv
  95+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyNormsToUniv
  96+ E000 ~            .ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
  97+ E000 ~                                    ld          a," "
  98+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
  99+ E000 ~            .fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
 100+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 101+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .fillLoop
 102+ E000 ~            .SetName:               ld          a,(UBnKShipModelId)
 103+ E000 ~                                    call        ShipIndexToAddress
 104+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 105+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
 106+ E000 ~            .CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 107+ E000 ~                                    cp          0
 108+ E000 ~                                    jr          z,.CopyDone
 109+ E000 ~                                    ld          (de),a
 110+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 111+ E000 ~                                    inc         de
 112+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .CopyLoop
 113+ E000 ~            .CopyDone:              ret
 114+ E000                                      ENDM
 115+ E000
 116+ E000              MCopyBodyToUniverse:    MACRO       copyRoutine
 117+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,13
 118+ E000 ~                                    call        copyRoutine
 119+ E000 ~                                    ret
 120+ E000                                      ENDM
 121+ E000
 122+ E000
 123+ E000              MCopyShipIdToUniverse:  MACRO
 124+ E000 ~                                    call        GetShipModelId
 125+ E000 ~                                    MMUSelectShipBankA
 126+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,b
 127+ E000 ~                                    jp          CopyShipToUniverse
 128+ E000                                      ENDM
# file closed: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm

 161+ C1CC 18 AE                                jr		MPD_Num1
 162+ C1CE 0E F6        .NotHundredsZero:       ld	c,-10
 163+ C1D0 CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1
 164+ C1D3 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 165+ C1D5 18 A5                                jr		MPD_Num1
 166+ C1D7 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 167+ C1D9 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 168+ C1DA 09                                   add	hl,bc
 169+ C1DB 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 170+ C1DD FE 30                                cp	'0'
 171+ C1DF 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 172+ C1E1 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 173+ C1E3 ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 174+ C1E5 12                                   ld	(de),a
 175+ C1E6 13                                   inc	de
 176+ C1E7 C9                                   ret
 177+ C1E8 3E 20        .NoStock:               ld	a,' '
 178+ C1EA 12                                   ld	(de),a
 179+ C1EB 13                                   inc	de
 180+ C1EC 12                                   ld	(de),a
 181+ C1ED 13                                   inc	de
 182+ C1EE 3E 2D                                ld	a,'-'
 183+ C1F0 12                                   ld	(de),a
 184+ C1F1 13                                   inc de
 185+ C1F2 C9                                   ret
 186+ C1F3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ C1F3              MPD_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C1F3
   2++C1F3              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C1F3 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C1F4 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C1F5 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C1F6 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C1F7 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C1F8 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C1F9 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C1FA 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C1FB 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C1FC E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C1FD EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C1FE 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C200 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C201 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C202                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C202 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C206 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C209 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C20A C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C20B 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C20D C9                                   ret
  23++C20E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

1265  E00F              GetShipBank2Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable2
1265  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1265  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1265  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1265  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1265  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1265  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1265  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1265  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1265  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1265  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1265  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1265  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1265  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1265  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1265  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1265  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1265  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable2                        ; a= bank index
1265  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1265  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1265  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1265  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1265  E02D B7          >                        or a
1265  E02E C9          >                        ret

   1++EA73              ;    DEFINE DEBUGMODEL 1
   2++EA73 00           Missile:	            DB $00                     ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   3++EA74 40 06                                DW $0640                   ; Ship's targetable area LoHi
   4++EA76 F8 EA                                DW MissileEdges            ; Edge Data
   5++EA78 60                                   DB MissileEdgesSize        ; Size of Edge Data
   6++EA79 00                                   DB $00                     ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   7++EA7A 0A                                   DB $0A                     ; Explosion Count
   8++EA7B 11                                   DB MissileVertSize /6      ; Vertex Count /6
   9++EA7C 66                                   DB MissileVertSize         ; Vertex Count
  10++EA7D 18                                   DB MissileEdgesCnt         ; Edges Count
  11++EA7E 00 00                                DW $0000                   ; Bounty LoHi
  12++EA80 24                                   DB MissileNormalsSize      ; Face (Normal) Count
  13++EA81 0E                                   DB $0E                     ; Range when it turns to a dot
  14++EA82 02                                   DB $02                     ; Energy Max
  15++EA83 2C                                   DB $2C                     ; Speed Max
  16++EA84 58 EB                                DW MissileNormals          ; Normals
  17++EA86 02                                   DB $02                     ; Q scaling
  18++EA87 00                                   DB $00                     ; Laser power and Nbr Missiles
  19++EA88 92 EA                                DW MissileVertices         ; Verticles Address
  20++EA8A 01                                   DB ShipTypeMissile         ; Ship Type
  21++EA8B 00                                   DB 0                       ; NewB Tactics
  22++EA8C 00                                   DB 0                       ; AI Flags
  23++EA8D 00                                   DB $00                     ; chance of ECM module
  24++EA8E FF                                   DB $FF                              ; Supports Solid Fill = false
  25++EA8F 00 00                                DW $0000                            ; no solid data
  26++EA91 00                                   DB $00                              ; no solid data
  27++EA92
  28++EA92
  29++EA92              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  30++EA92              ;;;		Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  31++EA92              ;;;		Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  32++EA92              ;;;		Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
  33++EA92              ;;;		Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
  34++EA92              ;;;		Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
  35++EA92              MissileVertices:    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
  36++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$50,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 00 00 Y Tip (Roof)
  37++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 01 04 Y base for all nodes
  38++EA92 ~                                    DB $50,$00,$00,$1F,$01,$01  ; 02 08 X Tip (Side)
  39++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$01,$01  ; 03 0C X Base
  40++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$30,$1F,$02,$02  ; 04 10 Z Tip (Nose1)
  41++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$02,$03  ; 05 14 Z base
  42++EA92 ~                                    DB $04,$00,$25,$9F,$03,$03  ; 06 18 Z Trangle point 1
  43++EA92 ~                                    DB $04,$00,$25,$1F,$03,$03  ; 07 1C Z Trangle point 2
  44++EA92 ~                                    DB $05,$10,$00,$9F,$00,$00  ; 08 20 Y Cross Member 1
  45++EA92 ~                                    DB $05,$10,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 09 24 Y Cross Member 2
  46++EA92 ~                                    DB $10,$05,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 10 28 X Cross Member 1
  47++EA92 ~                                    DB $20,$00,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 11 2C X Cross Member 2
  48++EA92 ~                                    DB $10,$05,$00,$5F,$00,$00  ; 12 30 X Cross Member 3
  49++EA92                                  ELSE
  50++EA92 00 00 44 1F                          DB $00, $00, $44, $1F, $10, $32
  50++EA96 10 32
  51++EA98 08 08 24 5F                          DB $08, $08, $24, $5F, $21, $54
  51++EA9C 21 54
  52++EA9E 08 08 24 1F                          DB $08, $08, $24, $1F, $32, $74
  52++EAA2 32 74
  53++EAA4 08 08 24 9F                          DB $08, $08, $24, $9F, $30, $76
  53++EAA8 30 76
  54++EAAA 08 08 24 DF                          DB $08, $08, $24, $DF, $10, $65
  54++EAAE 10 65
  55++EAB0 08 08 2C 3F                          DB $08, $08, $2C, $3F, $74, $88
  55++EAB4 74 88
  56++EAB6 08 08 2C 7F                          DB $08, $08, $2C, $7F, $54, $88
  56++EABA 54 88
  57++EABC 08 08 2C FF                          DB $08, $08, $2C, $FF, $65, $88
  57++EAC0 65 88
  58++EAC2 08 08 2C BF                          DB $08, $08, $2C, $BF, $76, $88
  58++EAC6 76 88
  59++EAC8 0C 0C 2C 28                          DB $0C, $0C, $2C, $28, $74, $88
  59++EACC 74 88
  60++EACE 0C 0C 2C 68                          DB $0C, $0C, $2C, $68, $54, $88
  60++EAD2 54 88
  61++EAD4 0C 0C 2C E8                          DB $0C, $0C, $2C, $E8, $65, $88
  61++EAD8 65 88
  62++EADA 0C 0C 2C A8                          DB $0C, $0C, $2C, $A8, $76, $88
  62++EADE 76 88
  63++EAE0 08 08 0C A8                          DB $08, $08, $0C, $A8, $76, $77
  63++EAE4 76 77
  64++EAE6 08 08 0C E8                          DB $08, $08, $0C, $E8, $65, $66
  64++EAEA 65 66
  65++EAEC 08 08 0C 28                          DB $08, $08, $0C, $28, $74, $77
  65++EAF0 74 77
  66++EAF2 08 08 0C 68                          DB $08, $08, $0C, $68, $54, $55
  66++EAF6 54 55
  67++EAF8                                  ENDIF
  68++EAF8              MissileVertSize: equ $ - MissileVertices
  69++EAF8
  70++EAF8              ;;;     Byte 0 = Edge visbility Distance if > XX4 distance then won't show
  71++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 1 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
  72++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 2 = Byte offset to Point 1 (divide by 4 for index)
  73++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 3 = Byte offset to Point 2 (divide by 4 for index)
  74++EAF8
  75++EAF8              MissileEdges:	    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
  76++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$04 ; Y
  77++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$08,$0C ; X
  78++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$14 ; Z
  79++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$18 ; Z Tip Traingle 1
  80++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$1C ; Z Tip Traingle 2
  81++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$1C,$18 ; Z Tip Traingle 2
  82++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$20,$24 ; Y Cross memeber
  83++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$28,$2C ; X Triangle
  84++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$2C,$30 ; X Triangle
  85++EAF8 ~                                    ;DB $1F,$00,$18,$1C
  86++EAF8                                  ELSE
  87++EAF8 1F 21 00 04                          DB $1F, $21, $00, $04
  88++EAFC 1F 32 00 08                          DB $1F, $32, $00, $08
  89++EB00 1F 30 00 0C                          DB $1F, $30, $00, $0C
  90++EB04 1F 10 00 10                          DB $1F, $10, $00, $10
  91++EB08 1F 24 04 08                          DB $1F, $24, $04, $08
  92++EB0C 1F 51 04 10                          DB $1F, $51, $04, $10
  93++EB10 1F 60 0C 10                          DB $1F, $60, $0C, $10
  94++EB14 1F 73 08 0C                          DB $1F, $73, $08, $0C
  95++EB18 1F 74 08 14                          DB $1F, $74, $08, $14
  96++EB1C 1F 54 04 18                          DB $1F, $54, $04, $18
  97++EB20 1F 65 10 1C                          DB $1F, $65, $10, $1C
  98++EB24 1F 76 0C 20                          DB $1F, $76, $0C, $20
  99++EB28 1F 86 1C 20                          DB $1F, $86, $1C, $20
 100++EB2C 1F 87 14 20                          DB $1F, $87, $14, $20
 101++EB30 1F 84 14 18                          DB $1F, $84, $14, $18
 102++EB34 1F 85 18 1C                          DB $1F, $85, $18, $1C
 103++EB38 08 85 18 28                          DB $08, $85, $18, $28
 104++EB3C 08 87 14 24                          DB $08, $87, $14, $24
 105++EB40 08 87 20 30                          DB $08, $87, $20, $30
 106++EB44 08 85 1C 2C                          DB $08, $85, $1C, $2C
 107++EB48 08 74 24 3C                          DB $08, $74, $24, $3C
 108++EB4C 08 54 28 40                          DB $08, $54, $28, $40
 109++EB50 08 76 30 34                          DB $08, $76, $30, $34
 110++EB54 08 65 2C 38                          DB $08, $65, $2C, $38
 111++EB58                                  ENDIF
 112++EB58              MissileEdgesSize: equ $ - MissileEdges
 113++EB58
 114++EB58
 115++EB58              MissileEdgesCnt: equ MissileEdgesSize/4
 116++EB58
 117++EB58              ;;;		Byte 0 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z, bits 4 to 0 are distance for always visible
 118++EB58              ;;;		Byte 1 = X Lo
 119++EB58              ;;;		Byte 2 = Y Lo
 120++EB58              ;;;		Byte 3 = Z Lo
 121++EB58              MissileNormals:	    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
 122++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$00
 123++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$10,$00,$00
 124++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$10
 125++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$10
 126++EB58                                  ELSE
 127++EB58 9F 40 00 10                          DB $9F, $40, $00, $10
 128++EB5C 5F 00 40 10                          DB $5F, $00, $40, $10
 129++EB60 1F 40 00 10                          DB $1F, $40, $00, $10
 130++EB64 1F 00 40 10                          DB $1F, $00, $40, $10
 131++EB68 1F 20 00 00                          DB $1F, $20, $00, $00
 132++EB6C 5F 00 20 00                          DB $5F, $00, $20, $00
 133++EB70 9F 20 00 00                          DB $9F, $20, $00, $00
 134++EB74 1F 00 20 00                          DB $1F, $00, $20, $00
 135++EB78 3F 00 00 B0                          DB $3F, $00, $00, $B0
 136++EB7C                                  ENDIF
 137++EB7C
 138++EB7C              MissileNormalsSize: equ $ - MissileNormals
 139++EB7C              MissileLen: equ $ - Missile
 140++EB7C
# file closed: ./Data/ships/Missile.asm
  92+ EB7C                                      include "Data/ships/Monitor.asm"
# file opened: ./Data/ships/Monitor.asm
   1++EB7C 04           Monitor:	            DB $04                     ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   2++EB7D 00 36                                DW $3600                   ; Ship's targetable area LoHi
   3++EB7F 01 EC                                DW MonitorEdges            ; Edge Data
   4++EB81 5C                                   DB MonitorEdgesSize        ; Size of Edge Data
   5++EB82 00                                   DB $00                     ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   6++EB83 2A                                   DB $2A                     ; Explosion Count
   7++EB84 11                                   DB MonitorVertSize /6      ; Vertex Count /6
   8++EB85 66                                   DB MonitorVertSize         ; Vertex Count
   9++EB86 17                                   DB MonitorEdgesCnt         ; Edges Count
  10++EB87 90 01                                DW $0190                   ; Bounty LoHi
  11++EB89 2C                                   DB MonitorNormalsSize      ; Face (Normal) Count
  12++EB8A 28                                   DB $28                     ; Range when it turns to a dot
  13++EB8B 84                                   DB $84                     ; Energy Max

1281  E00F              GetShipBank3Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable3
1281  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1281  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1281  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1281  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1281  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1281  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1281  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1281  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1281  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1281  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1281  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1281  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1281  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1281  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1281  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1281  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1281  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable3                        ; a= bank index
1281  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1281  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1281  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1281  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1281  E02D B7          >                        or a
1281  E02E C9          >                        ret
1282  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv3:       McopyVertsToUniverse
1282  E02F 2A 0B C4    >                        ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
1282  E032 11 11 C4    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
1282  E035 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1282  E037 3A FF C3    >                        ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
1282  E03A 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1282  E03B EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1282  E03C CD 23 7D    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1282  E03F C9          >                        ret
1283  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv3:       McopyEdgesToUniverse
1283  E040 2A F9 C3    >                        ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
1283  E043 11 01 C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
1283  E046 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1283  E048 3A FB C3    >                        ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
1283  E04B 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1283  E04C EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1283  E04D CD 23 7D    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1283  E050 C9          >                        ret
1284  E051              CopyNormsToUniv3:       McopyNormsToUniverse
1284  E051 2A 07 C4    >                        ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
1284  E054 11 C9 C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
1284  E057 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1284  E059 3A 03 C4    >                        ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
1284  E05C 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1284  E05D EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1284  E05E CD 23 7D    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1284  E061 C9          >                        ret

1286  E06A              CopyShipToUniverse3     MCopyShipToUniverse     BankShipModels3
1286  E06A 21 41 C0    >                        ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
1286  E06D 36 44       >                        ld          (hl),BankShipModels3
1286  E06F F5          >                        push        af
1286  E070 FD 7D       >                        ld          a,iyl
1286  E072 32 43 C0    >                        ld          (UBnKShipModelId),a
1286  E075 F1          >                        pop         af
1286  E076 32 42 C0    >                        ld          (UBnKShipModelNbr),a
1286  E079 21 46 E1    >.GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
1286  E07C ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1286  E07E ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
1286  E080 4E          >                        ld          c,(hl)
1286  E081 23          >                        inc         hl
1286  E082 46          >                        ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
1286  E083 21 C6 E0    >.GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
1286  E086 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1286  E088 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
1286  E08A 7E          >                        ld          a,(hl)
1286  E08B 23          >                        inc         hl
1286  E08C 66          >                        ld          h,(hl)
1286  E08D 6F          >                        ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
1286  E08E 11 F6 C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
1286  E091 01 1B 00    >                        ld          bc,ShipDataLength
1286  E094 ED B0       >                        ldir
1286  E096 CD 2F E0    >                        call        CopyVertsToUniv
1286  E099 CD 40 E0    >                        call        CopyEdgesToUniv
1286  E09C CD 51 E0    >                        call        CopyNormsToUniv
1286  E09F 21 10 C0    >.ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
1286  E0A2 3E 20       >                        ld          a," "
1286  E0A4 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1286  E0A6 77          >.fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
1286  E0A7 23          >                        inc         hl
1286  E0A8 10 FC       >                        djnz        .fillLoop
1286  E0AA 3A 43 C0    >.SetName:               ld          a,(UBnKShipModelId)
1286  E0AD CD 82 8E    >                        call        ShipIndexToAddress
1286  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
1286  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1286  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
1286  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
1286  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
1286  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
1286  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
1286  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
1286  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
1286  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret

  74+ E000              HideSprite:                 MACRO   spritenbr
  75+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,spritenbr
  76+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,$00
  77+ E000                                          ENDM
  78+ E000
  79+ E000              ; " sprite_big BC = rowcol, D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
  80+ E000              sprite_big:
  81+ E000 7A           .SetAnchor:	                ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
  82+ E001 F5                                       push	af									; save id for next few
  83+ E002 D5                                       push	de
  84+ E003 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
  85+ E006              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
  86+ E006 79                                       ld		a,c
  87+ E007 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
  88+ E00A ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
  89+ E00C 7D                                       ld		a,l
  90+ E00D ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
  91+ E010              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
  92+ E010 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
  93+ E011 78                                       ld		a,b
  94+ E012 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
  95+ E015 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
  96+ E017 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
  97+ E018 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
  98+ E01B              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
  99+ E01B 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 100+ E01C ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 101+ E01F              ; write out sprite pattern
 102+ E01F D1                                       pop		de                                  ; de = pattern and sprite nbr
 103+ E020 7B                                       ld		a,e
 104+ E021 F6 C0                                    or		%11000000							;
 105+ E023 ED 92 38                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 106+ E026              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 107+ E026 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 108+ E028 B4                                       or		h									; MSB Y
 109+ E029 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 110+ E02C F1           .BigSprite1:                pop		af
 111+ E02D 3C                                       inc		a
 112+ E02E F5                                       push	af
 113+ E02F ED 92 34                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 114+ E032 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 115+ E034 ED 92 35                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 116+ E037 AF                                       xor 	a
 117+ E038 ED 92 36                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 118+ E03B ED 92 37                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 119+ E03E 3E C1                                    ld		a,%11000001							; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 1
 120+ E040 ED 92 38                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 121+ E043 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001							; big unified composite
 122+ E045 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 123+ E048 F1           .BigSprite2:                pop		af
 124+ E049 3C                                       inc		a
 125+ E04A ED 92 34                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 126+ E04D AF                                       xor		a
 127+ E04E ED 92 35                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 128+ E051 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 129+ E053 ED 92 36                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 130+ E056 AF                                       xor		a
 131+ E057 ED 92 37                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 132+ E05A 3E C2                                    ld		a,%11000010							; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 2
 133+ E05C ED 92 38                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 134+ E05F 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001							; big unified composite
 135+ E061 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 136+ E064 C9                                       ret
 137+ E065
 138+ E065              ; for a sinle sprite within 256x192 area
 139+ E065 7A           sprite_single:          ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
 140+ E066 D5                                   push    de
 141+ E067 ED 92 34                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 142+ E06A              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 143+ E06A 79                                   ld		a,c                                 ; a = column (c)
 144+ E06B 21 20 00                             ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 145+ E06E ED 31                                add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 146+ E070 EB                                   ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 147+ E071 7B                                   ld		a,e
 148+ E072 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 149+ E075              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 150+ E075 78                                   ld		a,b                                 ; a = row
 151+ E076 21 20 00                             ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 152+ E079 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 153+ E07B 7D                                   ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 154+ E07C ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 155+ E07F              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 156+ E07F 7A                                   ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 157+ E080 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 158+ E083              ; write out sprite pattern
 159+ E083 D1                                   pop     de
 160+ E084 7B                                   ld		a,e
 161+ E085 F6 80                                or		%10000000							;
 162+ E087 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 163+ E08A              ; write out extended attribute
 164+ E08A 3E 00                                ld      a,%00000000                         ; its a single sprite
 165+ E08C B4                                   or      h
 166+ E08D ED 92 39                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a
 167+ E090 C9                                   ret
 168+ E091              ; ">sprite_galactic_cursor BC = rowcol"
 169+ E091 16 00        sprite_galactic_cursor:     ld		d,galactic_cursor_sprite
 170+ E093 1E 00                                    ld		e,0
 171+ E095 78                                       ld		a,b
 172+ E096 C6 18                                    add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset
 173+ E098 47                                       ld		b,a
 174+ E099 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 175+ E09C C9                                       ret

 181+ E0A1 16 04                                    ld		d,galactic_hyper_sprite

 187+ E0A9              ; moves hyperspace cursor to target system x position
 188+ E0A9 3E 04        sprite_ghc_move:            ld		a,galactic_hyper_sprite
 189+ E0AB ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 190+ E0AE              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 191+ E0AE 79                                       ld		a,c
 192+ E0AF 21 1C 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_x_offset
 193+ E0B2 ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 194+ E0B4 7D                                       ld		a,l
 195+ E0B5 ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 196+ E0B8              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 197+ E0B8 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 198+ E0B9 CB 38                                    srl		b			    					; row is row / 2
 199+ E0BB 78                                       ld      a,b
 200+ E0BC 21 34 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_y_offset
 201+ E0BF ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 202+ E0C1 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 203+ E0C2 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 204+ E0C5              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 205+ E0C5 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 206+ E0C6 ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 207+ E0C9              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 208+ E0C9 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 209+ E0CB B2                                       or		d									; MSB Y
 210+ E0CC ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 211+ E0CF C9                                       ret

 333+ E16C
 334+ E16C 3E 0C        sprite_reticule:        ld      a,reticlule_sprite1                 ; LEFT ARM
 335+ E16E ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 336+ E171 3E 87                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX -16 - ReticuleOffset
 337+ E173 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 338+ E176 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 339+ E178 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 340+ E17B AF                                   xor     a
 341+ E17C ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 342+ E17F 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 343+ E181 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 344+ E184 3E 0D        .rightReticule          ld      a,reticlule_sprite2                 ; RIGHT ARM
 345+ E186 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 346+ E189 3E A7                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX + ReticuleOffset
 347+ E18B ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 348+ E18E 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 349+ E190 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 350+ E193 3E 08                                ld      a,%00001000
 351+ E195 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2 including mirroring horizontal
 352+ E198 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 353+ E19A ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 354+ E19D 3E 0E        .topReticule            ld      a,reticlule_sprite3
 355+ E19F ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 356+ E1A2 3E 9F                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX
 357+ E1A4 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 358+ E1A7 3E 67                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY-16 - ReticuleOffset
 359+ E1A9 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 360+ E1AC AF                                   xor     a
 361+ E1AD ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 362+ E1B0 3E 8A                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_1 | %10000000
 363+ E1B2 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 364+ E1B5 3E 0F        .bottomReticule         ld      a,reticlule_sprite4
 365+ E1B7 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 366+ E1BA 3E 9F                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX
 367+ E1BC ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 368+ E1BF 3E 87                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY + ReticuleOffset
 369+ E1C1 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 370+ E1C4 3E 04                                ld      a,%00000100
 371+ E1C6 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2 including mirroring vertical
 372+ E1C9 3E 8A                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_1 | %10000000
 373+ E1CB ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 374+ E1CE C9                                   ret
 375+ E1CF
 376+ E1CF              laserbasex              equ 6
 377+ E1CF              laserbasey              equ 14
 378+ E1CF
 379+ E1CF              ShowSprite              MACRO   spritenbr, patternnbr
 380+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a, spritenbr
 381+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 382+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a,patternnbr | %10000000
 383+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 384+ E1CF                                      ENDM
 385+ E1CF
 386+ E1CF              LeftLaser:              MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 387+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 388+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 389+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a,((laserbasex + xoffset) *8) + 32
 390+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 391+ E1CF ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 392+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 393+ E1CF ~                                    xor     a
 394+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 395+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 396+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 397+ E1CF                                      ENDM
 398+ E1CF
 399+ E1CF              RightLaser:             MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 400+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 401+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 402+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a,(((30-laserbasex) - xoffset) *8) + 32 -2
 403+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 404+ E1CF ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 405+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 406+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a,%00001000
 407+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 408+ E1CF ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 409+ E1CF ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 410+ E1CF                                      ENDM
 411+ E1CF
 412+ E1CF              show_ecm_sprite:        ShowSprite  ECM_sprite, ecm_pattern

 412+ E1D4 3E 99       >                        ld      a,ecm_pattern | %10000000
 412+ E1D6 ED 92 38    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
