1196+ D757                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D757
   2++D757              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D757              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D757              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D757              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D757 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D757 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D757 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D757 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D757 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D757 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D757 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D757 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D757 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D757 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D757 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D757 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D757 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D757                                      ENDM
  20++D757
  21++D757              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D757 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D757 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D757 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D757 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D757 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D757 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D757 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D757 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D757 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D757 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D757 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D757 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D757 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D757 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D757                                      ENDM
  37++D757
  38++D757
  39++D757              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D757              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D757              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D757 3A 49 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D75A FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D75C 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D75E                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D75E 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D75F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D761 CA A3 D7    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D764 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D765 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D767 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D768 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D76B 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D76C E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D76E 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D76F 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D772 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D773 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  46++D776                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D776 21 2F C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D779 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D77C 21 35 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D77F 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D782 CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D785 21 31 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D788 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D78B 21 37 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D78E 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D791 CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D794 21 33 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D797 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D79A 21 39 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D79D 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D7A0 CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D7A3 3A 48 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D7A6 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D7A8 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D7AA                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D7AA 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D7AB E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D7AD A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D7AE C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D7AF 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D7B0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D7B2 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D7B3 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D7B6 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D7B7 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D7B9 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++D7BA 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++D7BD B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D7BE 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++D7C1 21 2F C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++D7C4 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D7C7 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D7CA 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D7CD CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D7D0 21 31 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D7D3 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D7D6 21 2B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D7D9 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D7DC CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D7DF 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D7E2 22 47 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D7E5 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D7E8 22 49 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D7EB CD EF D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D7EE C9                                   ret
  82++D7EF
  83++D7EF
  84++D7EF
  85++D7EF              ; Roate around axis
  86++D7EF              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D7EF              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D7EF              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D7EF              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D7EF              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D7EF              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D7EF              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D7EF              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D7EF              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D7EF 2A 47 7D     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D7F2 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D7F3 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D7F4 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D7F5 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D7F6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D7F7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D7F9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D7FB 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D7FC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D7FE CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D800 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D801 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D803 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D804 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D805 CD 4F 90                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D808              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D808 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D809 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D80A 32 62 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D80D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D80E 32 63 7E                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D811              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D811 2A 49 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D814 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D815 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D816 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D817 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D818 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D81A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D81C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D81D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D81F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D820                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D820 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D822 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D824                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D824 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D826 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D828                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D828 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D82A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D82C                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D82C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D82E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D830 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D833 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D835 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D837 B2                                   or      d
 136++D838 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D839              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D839              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D839              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D839              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D839 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D83A                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D83A              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D83A CD 80 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D83D E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D83E              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D83E              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D83E 2A 49 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D841 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D842 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D843 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D844 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D845 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D846 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D848 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D84A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D84B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D84D CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D84F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D850 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D852 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D853 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D854 CD 4F 90                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D857              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D857 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D858 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D859 32 62 7D                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D85C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D85D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D85F 32 7D 7E                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D862              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D862 2A 47 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D865              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D865 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D866 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D867 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D868 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D869 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D86B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D86D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D86E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D870 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D871                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D871 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D873 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D875                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D875 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D877 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D879                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D879 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D87B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D87D                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D87D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D87F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D881 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D884 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D886 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D888 B2                                   or      d
 191++D889 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D88A              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D88A              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D88A              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D88A E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D88B              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D88B CD 4F 90                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D88E              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D88E EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D88F 2A 49 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D892 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D893 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D894 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D895              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D895 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D896 2A 47 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D899 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D89A 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D89B 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D89C C9                                   ret
 211++D89D
 212++D89D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm

  10++D89D              ;                        ENDM

  15++D8A0 FE 00                                cp      0
  16++D8A2 C8                                   ret     z
  17++D8A3 CB 27                                sla     a
  18++D8A5 CB 27                                sla     a
  19++D8A7 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  20++D8A9              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  20++D8A9 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  20++D8AA 2A 35 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  20++D8AD 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D8AE             >                        ClearSignBitA

  20++D8B0 57          >                        ld      d,a
  20++D8B1 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  20++D8B3 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D8B4             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  20++D8B4 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit

1366+ DAAC CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1366+ DAAE C2 57 DA    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot

1368+ DAB4 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1369+ DAB5                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1369+ DAB5 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1369+ DAB7 DA BF DA    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1370+ DABA 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1371+ DABC C3 CA DA                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1372+ DABF              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1372+ DABF CB 25       >			   sla l
1372+ DAC1 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1373+ DAC3                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1373+ DAC3 CB 25       >			   sla l
1373+ DAC5 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1374+ DAC7                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1374+ DAC7 37          >                        scf
1375+ DAC8 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1376+ DACA 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1377+ DACC 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1378+ DACD 3A 5F C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1379+ DAD0                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1380+ DAD0 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1381+ DAD0 ~                                    ld      b,h
1382+ DAD0 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1383+ DAD0 ~                                    ld      d,a
1384+ DAD0 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1385+ DAD0                      ELSE
1386+ DAD0 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1387+ DAD1 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1388+ DAD3 CD 4E 94                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1389+ DAD6 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1390+ DAD7                      ENDIF
1391+ DAD7                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1391+ DAD7 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1391+ DAD9 DA E1 DA    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1392+ DADC 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1393+ DADE C3 ED DA                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1394+ DAE1              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1394+ DAE1 CB 23       >			   sla e
1394+ DAE3 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1395+ DAE5                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1395+ DAE5 CB 23       >			   sla e
1395+ DAE7 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1396+ DAE9                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1396+ DAE9 CB 23       >			   sla e
1396+ DAEB CB 12       >			   rl  d
1397+ DAED 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1398+ DAEE 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1399+ DAF1 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1400+ DAF3 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1401+ DAF6 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1402+ DAF8 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1403+ DAFA CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1404+ DAFC 21 6E DB                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1405+ DAFF ED 31                                add     hl,a
1406+ DB01 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1407+ DB02 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1408+ DB04 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1409+ DB07                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1409+ DB07 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1409+ DB09 CA 0E DB    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1409+ DB0C ED 44       >                        neg
1409+ DB0E             >.DoneABSa:
1410+ DB0E CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1411+ DB10 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1412+ DB12 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1413+ DB14 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1414+ DB16 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1415+ DB18 3A FE C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1416+ DB1B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1417+ DB1C 21 F0 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1418+ DB1F C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1419+ DB21 DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1420+ DB23 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1421+ DB24 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1422+ DB25 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1423+ DB26 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1424+ DB27 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1425+ DB28 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1426+ DB29 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1427+ DB2A DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1428+ DB2C FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1429+ DB2E                                          ;break
1430+ DB2E D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1431+ DB30 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1432+ DB31 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1433+ DB33 CD 76 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1434+ DB36 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1435+ DB37                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1435+ DB37 A7          >                        and     a
1435+ DB38 C2 53 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1436+ DB3B EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1437+ DB3C E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1438+ DB3D E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1439+ DB3E D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1440+ DB3F DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1441+ DB41 CD 76 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1442+ DB44 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1443+ DB45 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1444+ DB46                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1444+ DB46 A7          >                        and     a
1444+ DB47 C2 53 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1445+ DB4A 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1446+ DB4B 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1447+ DB4C                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1447+ DB4C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1448+ DB50 CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1449+ DB53 C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1450+ DB55 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1451+ DB57 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1452+ DB59 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1453+ DB5B 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1454+ DB5D ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1455+ DB5F 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1456+ DB61 C9                                   ret
1457+ DB62              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1458+ DB62 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1459+ DB65 CD D8 83                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1460+ DB68                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1460+ DB68 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1460+ DB6B CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1461+ DB6D C9                                   ret
1462+ DB6E
1463+ DB6E
1464+ DB6E FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1464+ DB72 6C 48 24 25
1465+ DB76                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1466+ DB76
1467+ DB76              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1468+ DB76              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1469+ DB76              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1470+ DB76              ; uses registers hl, de
1471+ DB76 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1472+ DB77 CD A9 84                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1473+ DB7A E1                                   pop     hl
1474+ DB7B 17                                   rla                                 ;
1475+ DB7C 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1476+ DB7E 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1477+ DB7F ED 30                                mul
1478+ DB81 5A                                   ld  e,d
1479+ DB82 16 00                                ld  d,0
1480+ DB84                                      ClearCarryFlag
1480+ DB84 B7          >                        or a
1481+ DB85 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1482+ DB87 C9                                   ret
1483+ DB88 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1484+ DB89 ED 30                                mul
1485+ DB8B 5A                                   ld  e,d
1486+ DB8C 16 00                                ld  d,0
1487+ DB8E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1487+ DB8E B7          >                        or a
1488+ DB8F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1489+ DB91 C9                                   ret
1490+ DB92
1491+ DB92              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1492+ DB92                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1493+ DB92 C9                                   ret
1494+ DB93
1495+ DB93              ; ......................................................
1496+ DB93 3A 0D C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1497+ DB96 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1498+ DB98 C8                                   ret     z
1499+ DB99 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1500+ DB9C F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1501+ DB9E E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1502+ DBA0 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1503+ DBA3                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1503+ DBA3 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1503+ DBA5 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1504+ DBA8                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1504+ DBA8 AF          >                        xor      a
1504+ DBA9 32 58 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1505+ DBAC 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1506+ DBAF 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1507+ DBB1 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1508+ DBB4                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1509+ DBB4 C9                                   ret
1510+ DBB5
1511+ DBB5              ; in a = damage
1512+ DBB5 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1513+ DBB6 3A 0D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1514+ DBB9 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1515+ DBBB C8                                   ret     z
1516+ DBBC 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1517+ DBBF                                      ClearCarryFlag
1517+ DBBF B7          >                        or a
1518+ DBC0 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1519+ DBC1 D2 C8 DB     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1520+ DBC4 CD 93 DB                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1521+ DBC7 C9                                   ret
1522+ DBC8 32 58 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1523+ DBCB C9                                   ret

1525+ DBCC              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1526+ DBCC

1528+ DBCC              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1529+ DBCC              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1530+ DBCC              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1531+ DBCC              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated

1534+ DBCC              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1535+ DBCC              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1536+ DBCC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1537+ DBCC              AddLaserBeamLine:
1538+ DBCC              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1539+ DBCC              GetGunVertexNode:

1541+ DBCF 21 F0 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1542+ DBD2 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1543+ DBD4 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1544+ DBD7              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1545+ DBD7 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1546+ DBD8 23                   inc         hl
1547+ DBD9 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1548+ DBDA 23                   inc         hl
1549+ DBDB ED 43 A6 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1550+ DBDF 0C                   inc         c
1551+ DBE0 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1552+ DBE1 04                   inc         b
1553+ DBE2 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1554+ DBE3              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1555+ DBE3 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1556+ DBE4 23                   inc         hl
1557+ DBE5 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1558+ DBE6 23                   inc         hl
1559+ DBE7 ED 43 A8 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1560+ DBEB              SetX2PointToXX15:
1561+ DBEB 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1562+ DBEE ED 43 AA C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1563+ DBF2 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1564+ DBF5 4F                   ld          c,a
1565+ DBF6              SetY2PointToXX15:
1566+ DBF6 ED 43 AC C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1567+ DBFA 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1568+ DBFD                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1568+ DBFD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1568+ DBFF CA 07 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1569+ DC02              LL74DecX2:
1570+ DC02 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1571+ DC04 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1572+ DC07              LL74SkipDec:
1573+ DC07 CD C7 CB             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1574+ DC0A 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1575+ DC0C              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1576+ DC0C              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1577+ DC0C 2A 64 7E             ld          hl,(varU16)
1578+ DC0F 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1579+ DC12 77                   ld          (hl),a
1580+ DC13 23                   inc         hl
1581+ DC14 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1582+ DC17 77                   ld          (hl),a
1583+ DC18 23                   inc         hl
1584+ DC19 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1585+ DC1C 77                   ld          (hl),a
1586+ DC1D 23                   inc         hl
1587+ DC1E 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1588+ DC21 77                   ld          (hl),a
1589+ DC22 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1590+ DC24 23                   inc         hl
1591+ DC25 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1592+ DC27 22 64 7E             ld          (varU16),hl
1593+ DC2A C9                   ret

   1++DC2B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   3++DC2B 21 F0 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC2E ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC30 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge

   8++DC35 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DC37 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DC39 C9                                   ret

  12++DC3A                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DC3A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC3A              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DC3A ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DC3A ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DC3A ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DC3A                                  ENDM
   7++DC3A
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DC3A                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DC3A
  15++DC3A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DC3A              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DC3A               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DC3A 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DC3B
  20++DC3B              PrepLines:
  21++DC3B              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DC3B
  23++DC3B              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DC3B              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DC3B              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DC3B              ;        or          8
  27++DC3B              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DC3B              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DC3B              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DC3B              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DC3B              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DC3B              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DC3B              ;
  34++DC3B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DC3B
  36++DC3B              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DC3B                      ;break
  38++DC3B                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DC3B AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DC3C 32 EA C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DC3F 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DC42 32 3A DC             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DC45 3A 00 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DC48 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DC4A FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DC4D 21 30 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DC50 22 64 7E             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DC53                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DC53 3A 00 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DC56 32 68 7E    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DC59 3A 51 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DC5C                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DC5C CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DC5E CA 66 DC    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DC61 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DC63 32 51 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DC66              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DC66              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DC66              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DC66              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DC66              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DC66 21 01 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DC69                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DC69 22 67 7D             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DC6C 3A FB C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DC6F 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DC70              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DC70              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DC70 2A 67 7D             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DC73 E5                   push        hl
  65++DC74 FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DC76                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  67++DC76 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  68++DC76                      ENDIF
  69++DC76 3A 53 7D             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  70++DC79 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  71++DC7A              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  72++DC7A FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  73++DC7D                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  73++DC7D BA          >                        cp      d
  73++DC7E DA D9 DC    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  74++DC81              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  75++DC81              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  76++DC81              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  77++DC81 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  78++DC84 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  79++DC85 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  80++DC87                      GetFaceAtA
  80++DC87 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  80++DC8A ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  80++DC8C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  81++DC8D              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  82++DC8D                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  82++DC8D A7          >                        and     a
  82++DC8E C2 A2 DC    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  83++DC91              IsFace2Visibile:
  84++DC91 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  85++DC92 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  86++DC94 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  87++DC96 E5                   push        hl
  88++DC97                      GetFaceAtA
  88++DC97 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  88++DC9A ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  88++DC9C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  89++DC9D E1                   pop         hl
  90++DC9E                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  90++DC9E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  90++DC9F CA D9 DC    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  91++DCA2              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  92++DCA2              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  93++DCA2              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  94++DCA2 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  95++DCA5 11 A6 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  96++DCA8 CD 2B DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  97++DCAB FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  98++DCAE 11 AA C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
  99++DCB1 CD 2B DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 100++DCB4
 101++DCB4                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 102++DCB4 ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 103++DCB4 ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 104++DCB4 ~                        nop
 105++DCB4 ~                        nop
 106++DCB4 ~                        ;break
 107++DCB4 ~            .SkipBreak1:
 108++DCB4 ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 109++DCB4 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 110++DCB4 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 111++DCB4 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 112++DCB4                      ENDIF
 113++DCB4              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 114++DCB4                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 115++DCB4 ED 5B 64 7E                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 116++DCB8 21 A6 C0                     ld          hl,UbnkPreClipX1
 117++DCBB                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 117++DCBB ED A0       >                        ldi
 117++DCBD ED A0       >                        ldi
 117++DCBF ED A0       >                        ldi
 117++DCC1 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCC3                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DCC3 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCC5 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCC7 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCC9 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DCCB ED 53 64 7E                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 120++DCCF                      ELSE
 121++DCCF ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 122++DCCF ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 123++DCCF ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 124++DCCF ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 125++DCCF                      ENDIF
 126++DCCF 21 EA C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 127++DCD2 34                   inc         (hl)
 128++DCD3 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 129++DCD4                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 129++DCD4 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 129++DCD6 D2 EF DC    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 130++DCD9              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 131++DCD9              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 132++DCD9              LL78:
 133++DCD9 2A 67 7D             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 134++DCDC 3E 04                ld          a,4
 135++DCDE ED 31                add         hl,a
 136++DCE0 22 67 7D             ld          (varV),hl
 137++DCE3 21 3A DC             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 138++DCE6 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 139++DCE7 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 140++DCE8                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 140++DCE8 21 68 7E    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 140++DCEB BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 140++DCEC C2 70 DC    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 141++DCEF              CompletedLineGeneration:
 142++DCEF              LL81:
 143++DCEF              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 144++DCEF 3A EA C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 145++DCF2 CB 27                sla         a
 146++DCF4 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 147++DCF6                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 148++DCF6 CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 149++DCF8                      ENDIF
 150++DCF8 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 151++DCFB              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 152++DCFB C9                   ret
 153++DCFC
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1598+ DCFC
1599+ DCFC                  DISPLAY "Tracing XX", $
1600+ DCFC
1601+ DCFC              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1602+ DCFC
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm

   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK

   1++C01D              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C01D              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C01D 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C01F              SBnKrotmatSidev             equ SBnKrotmatSidevX
   5++C01F 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C021 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
   7++C023 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15

   9++C025 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17

   1++C07E              ;-- transmat0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   3++C07E 00           SBnKXX12xLo                 DB  0               ; XX12+0

   7++C082 00           SBnKXX12zLo                 DB  0               ; XX12+4
   8++C083 00           SBnKXX12zSign               DB  0               ; XX12+5
   9++C084 00 00 00...  SXX12Save                   DS  6
  10++C08A 00 00 00...  SXX12Save2                  DS  6

  96+ C1BE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  97+ C1BF                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 2                      ; hard liit along z axis

  97+ C1C1 D8          >                        ret	 c

 100+ C1C4
 101+ C1C4              ; It should normally be behind but someone could fly past a planet, turn aroudn and jump
 102+ C1C4 21 18 C0     WarpSunFurther:         ld      hl,SBnKzsgn
 103+ C1C7 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 104+ C1C8                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng $7F                   ; this is the hard limit else it woudl turn negative and flip to -0
 104+ C1C8 FE 7F       >                        cp    $7F
 104+ C1CA D0          >                        ret	 nc
 105+ C1CB 34                                   inc     (hl)                           ; if its negative it will still increase as we will block insane values
 106+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 107+ C1CD              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
 108+ C1CD              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
 109+ C1CD              ; counter is current row y pos
 110+ C1CD              ; byte 1 is start x pos
 111+ C1CD              ; byte 2 is end x pos
 112+ C1CD              ; if they are both 0 then skip
 113+ C1CD              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 114+ C1CD

 116+ C1CD

 118+ C1CD              .SunNoDraw:             SetCarryFlag                    ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 118+ C1CD 37          >                        scf
 119+ C1CE C9                                   ret

 122+ C1CF
 123+ C1CF              SunBankDraw:            MACRO
 124+ C1CF ~            .drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 125+ C1CF ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 126+ C1CF ~                                    inc     hl
 127+ C1CF ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 128+ C1CF ~                                    inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 129+ C1CF ~                                    push    hl,,bc
 130+ C1CF ~                                    cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 131+ C1CF ~                                    IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 132+ C1CF ~                                    ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 133+ C1CF ~                                    sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 134+ C1CF ~                                    inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 135+ C1CF ~                                    call    z, .FixWidth
 136+ C1CF ~                                    ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 137+ C1CF ~                                    ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 138+ C1CF ~                                    call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 139+ C1CF ~            .NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 140+ C1CF ~                                    inc     b
 141+ C1CF ~                                    dec     iyh
 142+ C1CF ~                                    IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 143+ C1CF                                      ENDM
 144+ C1CF
 145+ C1CF
 146+ C1CF
 147+ C1CF              SunDraw:                MMUSelectLayer2
 147+ C1CF ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 148+ C1D3 3A B3 C5     .OptimiseStartPos:      ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 149+ C1D6                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetIsZero     ; if offset is 0 then just initate as normal
 149+ C1D6 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 149+ C1D7 CA E7 C1    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetIsZero
 150+ C1DA                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64, .OffsetLT64  ; if offset >=64 then we adjust and mve to bank 0
 150+ C1DA FE 40       >                        cp      64
 150+ C1DC DA F4 C1    >                        jp		c, .OffsetLT64
 151+ C1DF D6 40        .OffsetGTE64:           sub     64
 152+ C1E1 32 B3 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; adjust offset for bank 2
 153+ C1E4 C3 2C C2                             jp      .StartBank2
 154+ C1E7 06 00        .OffsetIsZero:          ld      b,0                     ; row
 155+ C1E9 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                  ; counter
 156+ C1EC 21 A3 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; set hl to start of array
 157+ C1EF C3 06 C2                             jp      .StartBank1
 158+ C1F2              ;-- Snuck routine in here so that the macro will be happier
 159+ C1F2 3D           .FixWidth:              dec     a                       ; if carry resulted in a value of zero then correct
 160+ C1F3 C9                                   ret
 161+ C1F4 21 A3 C0     .OffsetLT64:            ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; adjust hl for line array offset
 162+ C1F7 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 163+ C1F9 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 164+ C1FB 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; set b row to the actual offset
 165+ C1FC 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - Y offset
 166+ C1FD 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 167+ C1FF 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 168+ C200 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 169+ C202 AF                                   xor     a                       ; Ready bank 2 with no offset
 170+ C203 32 B3 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; .
 171+ C206 D9           .StartBank1:            exx
 172+ C207 3E 00                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_TOP
 173+ C209 CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; get in the first bank, we will only then bank select when needed
 174+ C20C D9                                   exx
 175+ C20D                                      SunBankDraw
 175+ C20D 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 175+ C20E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 175+ C20F 23          >                        inc     hl
 175+ C210 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 175+ C211 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 175+ C212 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 175+ C214 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 175+ C215             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 175+ C215 CA 24 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 175+ C218 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 175+ C219 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 175+ C21A 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 175+ C21B CC F2 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 175+ C21E 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 175+ C21F 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 175+ C221 CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 175+ C224 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 175+ C226 04          >                        inc     b
 175+ C227 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 175+ C229             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 175+ C229 C2 0D C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 176+ C22C 3A B3 C5     .StartBank2:            ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 177+ C22F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetBank2IsZero; if offset is 0 then we just continue, offset can never be >127 else there would be no draw
 177+ C22F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 177+ C230 CA 44 C2    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetBank2IsZero
 178+ C233 21 23 C1     .NotZeroOffset:         ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); adjust to correct offset
 179+ C236 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 180+ C238 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 181+ C23A 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - offset
 182+ C23B 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 183+ C23D 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 184+ C23E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                   ; .
 185+ C240 41                                   ld      b,c                     ; b = offset row
 186+ C241 C3 4C C2                             jp      .drawLineBank2
 187+ C244 21 23 C1     .OffsetBank2IsZero:     ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); start with offset adjusted
 188+ C247 06 00                                ld      b,0
 189+ C249 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64
 190+ C24C D9           .drawLineBank2:         exx
 191+ C24D 3E 40                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_MIDDLE
 192+ C24F CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; now do the lower bank
 193+ C252 D9                                   exx
 194+ C253              ; Could make this a sub routine but unwrapping saves a call
 195+ C253                                      SunBankDraw
 195+ C253 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 195+ C254 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 195+ C255 23          >                        inc     hl
 195+ C256 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 195+ C257 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 195+ C258 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 195+ C25A BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 195+ C25B             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 195+ C25B CA 6A C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 195+ C25E 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 195+ C25F 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 195+ C260 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 195+ C261 CC F2 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 195+ C264 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 195+ C265 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 195+ C267 CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 195+ C26A C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 195+ C26C 04          >                        inc     b
 195+ C26D FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 195+ C26F             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 195+ C26F C2 53 C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 196+ C272 C9                                   ret

 198+ C273              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ C273              ; This sets current universe object to a star / sun, they use sign + 23 bit positions
 200+ C273 CD A5 C1     CreateSun:              call    ResetSBnKData
 201+ C276 3A E8 7E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 202+ C279 E6 07                                and     %00000111
 203+ C27B F6 81                                or      %10000001
 204+ C27D 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 205+ C280 3A EA 7E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 206+ C283 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 207+ C285 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 208+ C288 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 209+ C28B 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000
 210+ C28E 22 17 C0                             ld      (SBnKzhi),hl
 211+ C291 3E E3                                ld      a, $E3
 212+ C293 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a
 213+ C296 C9                                   ret
 214+ C297              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 215+ C297              ; This creates a sun relative to space station on launch
 216+ C297 CD A5 C1     CreateSunLaunched:      call    ResetSBnKData
 217+ C29A 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 218+ C29D 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 219+ C29F 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),hl
 220+ C2A2 22 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),hl
 221+ C2A5 21 00 E0                             ld      hl,$E000
 222+ C2A8 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl
 223+ C2AB 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 224+ C2AE 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 225+ C2B1 3E 06                                ld      a,$06
 226+ C2B3 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 227+ C2B6 C9                                   ret
